name: Suzuha
line: So that’s when I heard you guys talking from the second floor.

name: Suzuha
line: I got interested and looked it up online. Now I know all the rumors about SERN.

name: Rintaro
line: ...A-anyway, you must not tell anyone else.

name: Suzuha
line: Ah, yeah. I understand. I’m actually tight lipped, so don’t worry.

name: Rintaro
line: Where’s the manager?

name: Suzuha
line: He left right after he finished repairing your TV.

name: Suzuha
line: Sooo, here’s the fixed TV.

name: Suzuha
line: He said to charge 1000 yen.

name: Suzuha
line: Thanks for your patronage. Well, just take it away.

name: Rintaro
line: By myself? Are you joking?

name: Suzuha
line: Huh? Didn’t you bring it here by yourself?

name: Suzuha
line: I guess I can help, but... oh, I see. So we’re already in the age where women do physical labor.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph. I don’t remember anyone asking for your help. Honestly, getting help from a girl like you would just hurt my pride.

name: Suzuha
line: Wow!

name: Suzuha
line: That was so manly! I might be falling for you.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph, you think you can trick me like that? You’re lying, aren’t you?

name: Suzuha
line: Eh? What makes you think that?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s one of my powers... Coloring Gentleman.

name: Suzuha
line: Y-you have powers?

name: Suzuha
line: Are you some kind of esper?

name: Suzuha
line: Are there a lot of espers like you?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course not. I am special!

name: Suzuha
line: Oh... You had me scared for a second there. But still, it’s amazing that people like you exist. Maybe SERN is the reason there aren’t more where I came from...

name: Suzuha
line: By the way, does the ability to see through lies have any combat application at all?

name: Suzuha
line: If it were me, I’d want perfect accuracy within a thousand meters, or ultra-fast reflexes that let me tear my enemy’s limbs off before they can react.

name: Rintaro
line: You... you’re an Organization assassin, aren’t you? You must be the one they call Miss Golgo! Who hired you!?

name: Suzuha
line: Nobody hired me. What’s a Golgo?

name: Suzuha
line: Anyway, do you have any other powers?

name: Rintaro
line: Even if I did, there’s no way I’d tell a hitman hired to kill me.

name: Suzuha
line: I’m not going to kill you.

name: Rintaro
line: Revealing my powers would be suicide. They are most effective with the element of surprise. In other words, they’re for me to know and you to find out!

name: Suzuha
line: Meanie.

name: Rintaro
line: Say what you like.

name: Suzuha
line: Why the frown? Did you get a death notice?

name: Rintaro
line: A what?

name: Suzuha
line: ...J-just wondering.

name: Suzuha
line: Umm, what I meant to ask was if you got some unpleasant news.

name: Rintaro
line: ...You could say that.

name: Rintaro
line: There’s this woman who’s obsessed with finding an IBN 5100.

name: Suzuha
line: An IBN 5100?

name: Rintaro
line: You know about them?

name: Suzuha
line: Yeah...

name: Rintaro
line: I see. So the IBN 5100 legend is famous, huh.

name: Suzuha
line: Y-yeah, that’s it. I heard the urban legend from someone. How much do you know about it?

name: Rintaro
line: I actually tried looking for an IBN 5100, but in the end, I came to the conclusion that there isn’t one in Akiba.

name: Suzuha
line: ...I see. Well, that’s true.

name: Rintaro
line: You sound like you know something.

name: Suzuha
line: Eh? Well, I do and I don’t, I guess.

name: Suzuha
line: I don’t know about it personally, but I happened to hear about it from a knowledgeable acquaintance of mine or something like that. Aha, ahaha.

name: Rintaro
line: Who are you?

name: Suzuha
line: Haaahh...

name: Suzuha
line: I was thinking of giving you a bunch of interesting information on the IBN 5100...

name: Suzuha
line: But when you look at me like that, I don’t feel like it anymore.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not even interested in the IBN 5100.

name: Rintaro
line: You don’t have a shred of credibility. I have no way of knowing if that ’interesting information’ of yours is true or not.

name: Suzuha
line: Wow, that’s harsh! Well, I admit I am acting kinda suspicious.

name: Suzuha
line: I won’t tell you, but I’ll give you a hint.

name: Suzuha
line: And then you’ll writhe in agony when you can’t figure it out!

name: Suzuha
line: Truth is, the IBN 5100 has a hidden function.

name: Rintaro
line: If I remember correctly, the IBN 5100 can do something or other with a proprietary programming language.

name: Suzuha
line: No way! How did you know!? Tell me, tell me!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s another one of my powers -- Leading Question. I can read your heart of hearts.

name: Suzuha
line: What!? No fair!

name: Rintaro
line: I see everything, Amane Suzuha! Resistance is futile.

name: Suzuha
line: Kuh!

name: Suzuha
line: Anyway, the IBN 5100 has a hidden function!

name: Suzuha
line: It can decipher IBN’s proprietary programming language, which was written before APL and BASIC became widespread. Isn’t that surprising?

name: Suzuha
line: Now it’s a dead programming language that can only be deciphered with an IBN 5100.

name: Suzuha
line: That’s why IBN 5100s are so rare.

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Good morning!

name: Rintaro
line: What are you doing here so early?

name: Mayuri
line: Well, I heard you guys had stayed up two nights in a row, so I brought you some goodies.

name: Rintaro
line: Excellent. Good job.

name: Mayuri
line: Tada! Canned oden!

name: Mayuri
line: It’s a present from Mayushii. They’re 270 yen each, so savor it, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: I’ve been getting tired of eating bananas and chicken lately. Buy these instead from now on.

name: Mayuri
line: But Mayushii doesn’t have enough pocket money to splurge like this all the time.

name: Mayuri
line: And Mayushii loves bananas and chicken, so she’ll keep buying them.

name: Mayuri
line: But wait, there’s more. Tada♪

name: Mayuri
line: RaiNet sausage! It comes with an Upa bottle cap as a bonus! I really wanted it, so I bought it.

name: Mayuri
line: So how’s Daru-kun?

name: Rintaro
line: He’s in the midst of a hard fight. He should at least rest a little. I mean, I never said he had to do it all at once.

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun’s super hacka spirit is on fire!

name: Itaru
line: Don’t say hacka!

name: Mayuri
line: He sure is tense...

name: Mayuri
line: But, isn’t hacking bad? Mayushii doesn’t want you to do bad things...

name: Rintaro
line: I would be a fool to let Daru’s super hacka... I mean, hacker skills go to waste.

name: Rintaro
line: Besides, we’re doing this to expose SERN’s wrongdoings. This is a war against the dark forces that secretly rule the world!

name: Mayuri
line: Bad things are bad.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri, want to trade my sweet potatoes for your beef?

name: Mayuri
line: Ehh? If you want to trade, I’d rather have your quail egg.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t be ridiculous! Next to beef, quail eggs are my favorite.

name: Mayuri
line: But Mayushii likes quail eggs too.

name: Rintaro
line: Settle for my chikuwa.

name: Mayuri
line: Mm... okay. Chikuwa’s better than sweet potatoes.

name: Itaru
line: Soon... If I can just get the SQL table, I’ll have more than enough passwords... geheheh... you’re no match for me...

name: Itaru
line: Oho! Comeoncomeoncomeon, mmyes, mmyes, hooah! You can’t hide from me, you naughty thing you! How does it feel to be naked? Hyahaaa! Hahaha!

name: Itaru
line: Oh yes! YESSSSSSS! Matching ID and password! Login complete, hell yeah! Taste it! YESYESYES!

name: Rintaro
line: Did you get it!?

name: Itaru
line: Mission complete.

name: Rintaro
line: Really!?

name: Mayuri
line: Wow, that’s amazing! I don’t really get it, though.

name: Itaru
line: An oden can’s the best after a job well done.

name: Rintaro
line: Well done! You really are the world’s greatest super hacka!

name: Itaru
line: Hacker.

name: Rintaro
line: H-hacker! I’m glad you’re on my side.

name: Rintaro
line: So, did you find out how they’re planning to destroy the world?

name: Itaru
line: I haven’t looked yet, man. All I did was get us connected.

name: Itaru
line: But it’s all downhill from here.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry if you’re tired, but please start checking. The keys to this conspiracy have got to be in there.

name: Itaru
line: Yeah, yeah, I’ll do it. But let me eat this oden can first.

name: Itaru
line: The question is who this password belongs to.

name: Mayuri
line: Why is that?

name: Itaru
line: I went into SERN’s database and got a data table. From there, I focused on people with simple passwords like 11111111 and ABCDEFGH to get my hands on an ID.

name: Itaru
line: It’d be awesome if this turns out to be the server admin’s logon, but I don’t think we’re that lucky.

name: Mayuri
line: In Japanese please?

name: Rintaro
line: Same.

name: Itaru
line: Basically, if this is the server admin’s password, we can taste every inch of SERN’s luscious, luscious flesh. But if it’s just an ordinary researcher’s password, then we can only see SERN’s boobs.

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun, that’s naughty!

name: Rintaro
line: Quit the erotic examples. Basically, you mean there’ll be limits to what information we can access.

name: Itaru
line: Exactly.

name: Itaru
line: Anyway, it’s only a matter of time before I get a server admin’s password. Let’s save that for later. I’m really sleepy now.

name: Itaru
line: Oh! Looks like our ID belongs to an accelerator division chief.

name: Rintaro
line: So it’s not a server admin...

name: Itaru
line: It would take a miracle to get one on our first try. How many staff members do you think SERN has?

name: Mayuri
line: How many?

name: Itaru
line: Over 6000.

name: Itaru
line: Well, for now, let’s look at this accelerator division chief. Uh, his name is...

name: Itaru
line: Jack. Let’s look at his email log.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh no... that makes Mayushii’s head hurt...

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, what does that say?

name: Itaru
line: Need to translate it...

name: Rintaro
line: This is a job for Dr.Excite!

name: Itaru
line: Nah. I’ve got a better idea.

name: Itaru
line: Looks like a new year’s greeting. Something about going on vacation in Spain... lucky bastard.

name: Itaru
line: If we keep scouring the log like this, we can also identify the server manager.

name: Mayuri
line: You know, looking through someone else’s email without permission makes me feel really guilty...

name: Rintaro
line: I abandoned guilt when I chose the path of Evil long ago! Muhahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: Let the responsibility be mine. I will not ask you to answer for my crimes.

name: Itaru
line: What a guy! I’d let Okarin do me in the butt.

name: Rintaro
line: I decline your offer.

name: Rintaro
line: Now get peeking, Daru!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin, you’re bad... You make Mayushii sad.

name: Rintaro
line: LHC experiment reports? There could be a hint about time machines in there. We should try reading them.

name: Itaru
line: This is definitely a crime, though...

name: Itaru
line: This is encrypted.

name: Rintaro
line: Tch, of course it isn’t that simple...

name: Itaru
line: Well, cracking this should be a piece of cake.

name: Itaru
line: Umm, translated into proper Japanese, it’s...

name: Itaru
line: ’Hi, Pole!’

name: Rintaro
line: That acting’s completely unnecessary.

name: Itaru
line: Aw...

name: Itaru
line: ’Uploaded today’s data to the server. The LHC is performing admirably. Can’t say the same about the rest, though.’

name: Itaru
line: ’This baby’s fickle as a cat, but it was surprisingly obedient this month. It would be great if it stayed like this forever.’

name: Itaru
line: ’But don’t you think this work is unrewarding? This kitten -- this 27-kilometer long kitten, HAHAHAHA -- has been in operation for nine years.’

name: Itaru
line: ’Our research will change the course of history, yet only a small group of people are allowed to see it.’

name: Itaru
line: ’Of course, if it were ever officially released, it would be one hell of a scandal.’

name: Itaru
line: ’People would probably say something like, ’Call Robert Zemeckiff to SERN right away. He could build it in less than a year.’’

name: Rintaro
line: ...Nine years?

name: Rintaro
line: Do you think there were any translation errors in that email?

name: Itaru
line: If you trust the translation software, then that’s what it says. The Japanese is strange in places, though.

name: Rintaro
line: But that doesn’t make sense.

name: Rintaro
line: I thought the LHC was only put into operation around spring last year. But this email makes it sound like it’s been in operation for nine years.

name: Itaru
line: That is strange.

name: Rintaro
line: Keep looking, Daru. Search for anything related to time machine research.

name: Itaru
line: Seriously?

name: Itaru
line: Hmm, there aren’t any emails with the phrase ’time machine’ in them...

name: Itaru
line: But the phrase ’Z Program’ was used hundreds of times in the past few months.

name: Itaru
line: Do you think it could be about the current LHC experiments?

name: Rintaro
line: What is it specifically? Black hole formation experiments?

name: Itaru
line: Hmmm, let’s try looking for a document... ah, found one.

name: Itaru
line: Oho! Looks like this is top secret stuff from France, England, and Holland.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Government secrets?

name: Itaru
line: SERN’s not even a government organization, so why?

name: Itaru
line: Wait, should we be looking at this stuff? We might be in a little deep here.

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t care. Get me details.

name: Itaru
line: Hold on. If we get caught, we’re not getting off with an apology.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you so incompetent as to let yourself be traced?

name: Itaru
line: ...I took the necessary precautions.

name: Rintaro
line: Then I fail to see the problem.

name: Itaru
line: Well, thanks.

name: Itaru
line: Hmm... ’May 14th, 137th Z Program Experiment Report’...

name: Itaru
line: ’Because we have already succeeded at creating mini black holes, the report is omitted. First--’

name: Rintaro
line: Stop! Stooopp!

name: Rintaro
line: So SERN did use the LHC to generate mini black holes!

name: Itaru
line: But they announced that their experiments still haven’t succeeded, so why...

name: Itaru
line: But the goal of the experiment wasn’t even to generate mini black holes. It was to create new elementary particle reactions...

name: Rintaro
line: But in reality, they’re already generating those mini black holes.

name: Itaru
line: Sure does seem like it.

name: Rintaro
line: What does it say next?

name: Itaru
line: Umm...

name: Itaru
line: ’Results: Error. Human is dead, mismatch. For details, consult Jellyman’s Report No.14.’

name: Itaru
line: ’We propose that further experiments be halted until the lifter is perfected and all local field conformity points are online.’

name: Rintaro
line: Wh-what does that mean?

name: Itaru
line: ’Human is dead’ means somebody died, right?

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...

name: Rintaro
line: What is this Jellyman’s Report?

name: Itaru
line: I can’t find it in Jack’s email. We’ll need an account with more privileges.

name: Rintaro
line: Then we’ll save that for next time. Search for something related to time machines.

name: Itaru
line: You know we’re not going to find anything, right?

name: Itaru
line: Words like ’accelerator technical committee,’ and ’LHC project lead’ came up, so I guess we should look for an ID from there. Maybe then we can get more information.

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t look it up with the ID you have?

name: Rintaro
line: Well, I guess let’s call it a day.

name: Itaru
line: By the way, what we just saw was SERN’s biggest server, but I also found a strange database on the network.

name: Rintaro
line: Strange how?

name: Itaru
line: It was buggy.

name: Rintaro
line: Buggy?

name: Itaru
line: I mean, it was full of some kind of code...

name: Itaru
line: But the code was gibberish. Utterly impossible to decode, thank you very much.

name: Rintaro
line: Could it be encrypted?

name: Itaru
line: Not by any algorithm I’ve ever seen. It wouldn’t even work as a program. It just bothers me. Why would they have a database that nobody could ever use?

name: Rintaro
line: That is strange.

name: Itaru
line: I’ll see what I can find out.

name: Itaru
line: Agh! I don’t get it! I don’t get it at all!

name: Itaru
line: You call this a program, dumbass!? Go to hell!

name: Mayuri
line: I think you should stop...

name: Itaru
line: My head is spinning... I can’t take it any more... fweh, fweheh...

name: Rintaro
line: Good work. Go rest, Daru.

name: Itaru
line: Yeah... I’ll do that.

name: Itaru
line: Anyway, even if it isn’t a bug, but an actual program, only the guys who made it could understand it.

name: Itaru
line: I’ve never seen anything like it...

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... of course. Everything is falling into place.

name: Mayuri
line: Whatcha talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: John Titor... SERN... the time machine...

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, I think I know how we can read that program.

name: Itaru
line: Seriously? How?

name: Rintaro
line: If my hunch is correct, John Titor should know!

name: Itaru
line: What? There’s no way!

name: Rintaro
line: Say what you like. We’ll know soon enough.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s here!

name: Rintaro
line: Heh, heh heh heh... Just as I suspected.

name: Itaru
line: Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: I was right, Daru.

name: Rintaro
line: I know where that data comes from.

name: Itaru
line: An IBN 5100!

name: Suzuha
line: It can also decipher IBN’s proprietary programming language, which was written before APL and BASIC became widespread. Isn’t that surprising?

name: Suzuha
line: Now it’s a dead programming language only decipherable with an IBN 5100.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh. No... NO, I SAY! This discovery of ours was inevitable from the start! For this is the choice of Steins Gate!!

name: Itaru
line: Wait, so SERN has an IBN 5100 database? Those machines aren’t compatible with any modern software. Why would they do something like that?

name: Rintaro
line: Answer me this. What is the best way to secure a machine against external cracking?

name: Itaru
line: Well, make it standalone, of course.

name: Itaru
line: If only IBN 5100s can read it, then I guess that’s kind of standalone...

name: Rintaro
line: Which means that SERN’s keeping their most important secrets hidden there!

name: Itaru
line: How do you know about that hidden function anyway?

name: Rintaro
line: It is recorded in my brain’s extensive Index Librorum Prohibitorum.

name: Itaru
line: Very original.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri! We have important matters to discuss. Assemble!

name: Mayuri
line: Hm? I can hear you fine from here.

name: Rintaro
line: It doesn’t matter whether you can hear or not!

name: Rintaro
line: This meeting concerns the fate of the Future Gadget Laboratory -- nay, the fate of mankind!

name: Rintaro
line: So I want it to feel more secretive, like we’re scheming or something!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii won’t participate in your evil schemes.

name: Rintaro
line: Listen, you two! Henceforth, the Future Gadget Laboratory shall begin emergency top secret operations!

name: Rintaro
line: This shall be the first stage in our war against the dark powers that manipulate the world from the shadows! Our enemy is SERN, a scientific institute engaged in the most evil research imaginable!

name: Itaru
line: Okarin, you’re too loud... and I’ve been up all night.

name: Rintaro
line: Understand? The world has no need for two mad scientists. Before they can get ahead of us, we must outwit them!

name: Itaru
line: Who are they?

name: Rintaro
line: You know... them.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Mayushii doesn’t get it at all...

name: Rintaro
line: Basically, we must obtain the phantom retro PC... the IBN 5100, said to be located somewhere in Akiba.

name: Itaru
line: I’ll pass on the search. I’m seriously tired. Besides, I want to keep combing SERN’s server.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s true...

name: Rintaro
line: Well, you’re the only one who can do that, Daru, so I’ll leave it to you.

name: Rintaro
line: So, the IBN 5100 investigation squad shall consist of Mayuri and me--

name: Mayuri
line: I can’t...

name: Mayuri
line: I have to make costumes, and I have work, too.

name: Rintaro
line: Fine. I’ll manage alone somehow. It’s useless to try and stop me. Understood?

name: Mayuri
line: Are you going to do something bad again?

name: Itaru
line: Nah, he’s all talk.

name: Suzuha
line: Hiya, Okabe Rintaro.

name: Rintaro
line: Pretty nice technique there.

name: Suzuha
line: Bicycles are fun, aren’t they? I’d never ridden one before coming here.

name: Rintaro
line: You’d never ridden a bicycle!?

name: Suzuha
line: Nope. I had ridden motorcycles before, though.

name: Rintaro
line: Going to work now?

name: Suzuha
line: Yup.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s perfect. There’s something we need to talk about.

name: Suzuha
line: Ehh? But I need to get the shop ready for business.

name: Rintaro
line: Just what does this crumbly old Braun Tube Workshop need to get ’ready’?

name: Suzuha
line: Nothing, really. Geez. I just mindlessly sweep in front of the shop. If I clean inside, the boss gets angry. ’Everything’s where it needs to be,’ he says.

name: Rintaro
line: So hear me out, then.

name: Suzuha
line: But I’m so tired.

name: Rintaro
line: You would be... unwise to anger me.

name: Suzuha
line: Does it have to be right now?

name: Suzuha
line: Then go ahead.

name: Suzuha
line: But keep it short, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Where is the IBN 5100?

name: Suzuha
line: No intel yet.

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Suzuha
line: I don’t know.

name: Rintaro
line: But by the way you talked yesterday, it sure sounded like you knew.

name: Suzuha
line: No, I know someone who knows.

name: Rintaro
line: Then take me to them. I won’t take no for an answer. Refuse, and I’ll show you a living hell.

name: Suzuha
line: I can’t.

name: Suzuha
line: I can’t introduce you even if I wanted to.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean? Don’t tell me they’re an imaginary--

name: Suzuha
line: They’ve been dead for years.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry.

name: Suzuha
line: Nah, it’s okay. Anyway, there’s nothing I can tell you. Honestly, I’m hoping you can tell me something.

name: Tennouji
line: Hey, part-timer! It’s only your third day and you’re late!?

name: Suzuha
line: Sorry, boss! The streets were a little crowded this morning.

name: Tennouji
line: If you’re not gonna take this seriously, I can always give you the boot, hear?

name: Tennouji
line: As for you, Okabe, don’t you lay a finger on my part-timer.

name: Rintaro
line: Aren’t you the lecherous one here, Mister Braun?

name: Tennouji
line: Why you. Just try saying something like that in front of Nae. I’ll murder ya. Gotta keep my honor as a father.

name: Tennouji
line: Besides, I ain’t got no use for a skinny kid like her.

name: Suzuha
line: What was that!? Take that back, boss!

name: Tennouji
line: What, you mad?

name: Suzuha
line: I’m not a kid! I’m a warrior!

name: Tennouji
line: Hah? What’re you talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: I like the look in your eyes, you Part-Time Warrior. They shine with the radiance of the beast unseen in modern men.

name: Rintaro
line: Never forget those eyes of yours, and you shall surely change class from Part-Time Warrior... to True Warrior.

name: Suzuha
line: But I’m already a warrior!

name: Rintaro
line: Stay diligent in your training, and you shall have a place at my side on the field of Ragnarok.

name: Suzuha
line: Ragnarok?

name: Suzuha
line: What’s that?

name: Rintaro
line: The final battle against SERN.

name: Suzuha
line: You’ve got something like that planned? Count me in if you do, but I’ve never heard of it.

name: Rintaro
line: Of course you haven’t. This is the first time I’ve revealed it. For I shall be the one to initiate Ragnarok! And the world shall be reborn!

name: Suzuha
line: Wow! You sure are brave, Okabe Rintaro. You’ll probably fail, but I like your spirit.

name: Suzuha
line: I wish my comrades were as spirited as you are.

name: Tennouji
line: Why does my store attract nothing but weirdos? Damn.

name: Tennouji
line: Whatever, part-timer. Just come inside.

name: Suzuha
line: Coming!

name: Suzuha
line: Later, Okabe Rintaro!

name: Mayuri
line: Wait up, Okarin!

name: Rintaro
line: So you’re going to help me search after all? That’s the lab mem spirit.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, no, that’s not it. I was thinking about buying lunch.

name: Rintaro
line: So, where do you plan to go?

name: Mayuri
line: Hmmm, what to eat...

name: Mayuri
line: Sanbo’s beef bowl sounds good!

name: Rintaro
line: But Sanbo isn’t open this earl--

name: Mayuri
line: I feel like I can reach the stars.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s too early for stars, Mayuri.

name: Mayuri
line: Did you know? Even during the day, the stars are still up there.

name: Rintaro
line: Getting philosophical is nice and all, but it’s dangerous to stop in the middle of the street.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! That’s true.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, just now, when I was looking at the stars, I decided to have ramen for lunch today!

name: Kurisu
line: Ah.

name: Rintaro
line: Well, if it isn’t my assistant. What are you doing here?

name: Kurisu
line: Hey. When did I become your assistant?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Why are you glaring at me?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry about it. You’re not the cause of my frustration.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, so you’re just raging? Don’t glare at me.

name: Rintaro
line: You’ve glared at me before, haven’t you?

name: Kurisu
line: That’s because you keep doing pervy--

name: Kurisu
line: Ah, no, I’m not saying anything.

name: Kurisu
line: Are the emails you’re getting really that unpleasant?

name: Rintaro
line: They’re more... unreasonable than unpleasant.

name: Rintaro
line: So, Christina, what brings you here?

name: Kurisu
line: If you’re going to call me names, could you at least be consistent?

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, my business here doesn’t concern you.

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you pouting?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not pouting. I just don’t want to get involved in your silly games again.

name: Rintaro
line: Nonsense. You’re already a lab mem. You have a duty to work for the benefit of the lab!

name: Kurisu
line: ...I regret losing myself to curiosity back then.

name: Rintaro
line: Did you come to see the satellite?

name: Kurisu
line: ...I guess.

name: Kurisu
line: It doesn’t make sense. Normally, they calculate satellites’ orbits so that they burn up in the atmosphere when they fall. So how can that thing be in such perfect condition?

name: Rintaro
line: Where’s this satellite from, anyway?

name: Kurisu
line: They still don’t know. Rumors say it’s from the former Soviet Union, but Russia denies it. So it looks like they can’t remove it yet.

name: Rintaro
line: So it’s another Organization cover-up! They knew I’d be at Radi-Kan and tried to erase me!

name: Kurisu
line: Organization? What’s that?

name: Rintaro
line: The Organization is the Organization. Its formal name is something else, but all those who know of its existence call it the Organization out of fear.

name: Rintaro
line: They rule the world from the shadows, transcending nations, with politics, economics, religion, even science in their clutches.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s obviously a crackpot conspiracy theory, thank you very mu--

name: Rintaro
line: What’s wrong?

name: Kurisu
line: N-nothing! Really, nothing, okay? Say another word and I hit you!

name: Kurisu
line: A-anyway! What’s happened with the PhoneWave!?

name: Rintaro
line: I thought you didn’t want to get involved. And it’s not the PhoneWave, it’s the PhoneWave (name subject to change)--

name: Kurisu
line: Just answer me. Have you learned anything?

name: Rintaro
line: No progress. We’ve tried repeating the experiment, but at present, we haven’t been able to reproduce the discharge phenomenon or send another email to the past.

name: Kurisu
line: I see...

name: Kurisu
line: Hello? Can you put your phone away when you’re talking with someone?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t be like that. Rather, you should praise me, for I have taught a foul mail demon to behave like a civilized human being.

name: Kurisu
line: Why are you so pompous?

name: Rintaro
line: I’d ask you the same thing, Christina.

name: Kurisu
line: Are you done with your little mail exchange? Hououin-san?

name: Rintaro
line: Oh? So you remember my true name. Indeed, I am Hououin Kyouma.

name: Kurisu
line: I was being facetious.

name: Rintaro
line: How was that facetious? You called me by my correct name. You made no mistake. You’ll make a good assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe-san... have you sought professional help?

name: Rintaro
line: I am not Okabe!

name: Kurisu
line: This is exhausting...

name: Kurisu
line: You’re pompous, but at least you have some manners.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Kurisu
line: I hate people who play with their phones in the middle of a conversation.

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, so that’s why you grabbed my phone when we first met.

name: Kurisu
line: When we first met? I didn’t do that.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah you did. There I was, giving my report, when you grabbed my--

name: Kurisu
line: What? What do you mean ’giving your report’?

name: Rintaro
line: No. It’s nothing.

name: Rintaro
line: So, about the PhoneWave (name subject to change).

name: Rintaro
line: After the experiment, you screamed something like ’A time machine? It can’t be!’ Did something awaken a past trauma?

name: Kurisu
line: No. And don’t go making one up either.

name: Rintaro
line: Back when she was five years old, Christina was on the plains of Arkansas when lightning--

name: Kurisu
line: I wasn’t hit by lightning! And I was still living in Japan when I was five! And why Arkansas?

name: Rintaro
line: I was trying to imagine tranquil scenery, and the first state to come to mind was Arkansas. Second was Oregon.

name: Kurisu
line: Not Utah? I mean, relatively speaking, isn’t Utah more suitable?

name: Rintaro
line: Then answer me, Christina! Why did you freak out back then!?

name: Kurisu
line: ...No reason. I simply didn’t want to believe. Fringe science should stay in the realm of fiction.

name: Rintaro
line: Fringe science? Don’t be ridiculous.

name: Rintaro
line: You saw it with your own eyes. You saw the email leap to the past! You saw the banana travel instantly through space!

name: Kurisu
line: I saw... but we must be missing something. Or maybe we’re just seeing what we want to see.

name: Kurisu
line: Remember what I said at ATF? Time machines are just a pipe dream given modern technology.

name: Kurisu
line: And yet a bunch of amateurs like you just stick a phone and a microwave together and expect time travel to occur? Ridiculous.

name: Rintaro
line: But it did occur! Will you deny what you saw with your own eyes? Are you saying that theories trump reality? Then I hope you enjoy sophistry and word games, because that’s all you’ll ever have!

name: Kurisu
line: What do you mean, word games?

name: Rintaro
line: Quantum theory, for example. If you ask me, theories like that are nothing but word games!

name: Kurisu
line: Wait, are you rejecting modern physics? Who do you think you are?

name: Rintaro
line: Trust what you see! The only things that matter are things that happen; things that don’t happen, things that aren’t observed, are just hypotheses!

name: Kurisu
line: When hypotheses pile up, and theories are verified, they become reality.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s how modern physics comes to understand the truth of the universe.

name: Rintaro
line: But sometimes your hypotheses are mistaken! Even Einstein was wrong about some things!

name: Kurisu
line: So you’re going to do nothing, just because you could be wrong? Then enjoy your dirty little lab and your silly gadgets, because that’s all you’ll ever have.

name: Kurisu
line: You’ll never reach the truth that way. Failure teaches success.

name: Rintaro
line: I see. Nice rebuttal.

name: Kurisu
line: ...You’re never getting off your high horse, are you?

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, Christina, I have always felt that physicists are hypocrites.

name: Kurisu
line: ...What?

name: Rintaro
line: There are phenomena that everyone knows occur in reality, but which physicists refuse to research. What do you think about that?

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t know what to say unless you can give me some examples.

name: Rintaro
line: Ghosts, for instance.

name: Kurisu
line: The occult? Really?

name: Rintaro
line: You refuse to research it just because it’s the occult? That contradicts what you just said!

name: Rintaro
line: ’You’ll never reach the truth that way!’

name: Rintaro
line: People have seen ghosts. There is even photographic evidence.

name: Rintaro
line: So where are the theories? Why do physicists refuse to speak?

name: Kurisu
line: ...It’s a different field of study.

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t call physics the study of natural phenomena, then decide some things don’t count!

name: Kurisu
line: True, but...

name: Rintaro
line: And that’s why we must investigate the phenomenon of sending emails to the past. You shall assist me!

name: Kurisu
line: No.

name: Kurisu
line: I won’t have a hand in your fringe science. I won’t make the same mistake my father did.

name: Rintaro
line: Your father?

name: Kurisu
line: You make a fine argument, but it won’t work in the scientific community.

name: Kurisu
line: The day you decide to research time travel is the day you’re out of a job.

name: Rintaro
line: How can you be so certain?

name: Kurisu
line: Because that’s what happened to my father.

name: Kurisu
line: My father, a physicist, loved time machines. He was so fascinated by Wells’s ’The Time Machine’ that he seriously studied time travel.

name: Kurisu
line: But because of his obsession, he was practically exiled from the scientific community.

name: Kurisu
line: I will never get involved with time travel research!

name: Kurisu
line: ...I’m sorry. I got emotional.

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! Don’t worry about it! I wanted to test your character, so I made you angry on purpose!

name: Kurisu
line: ...Huh?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Anyway, the PhoneWave isn’t a time machine.

name: Kurisu
line: Email is a manmade system, so this phenomenon should be explainable in the scope of that system.

name: Rintaro
line: I understand. I had no idea you hate time machines that much. It’s almost like an allergy.

name: Rintaro
line: I apologize for forcing you to become a lab mem. You don’t have to come again.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I wasn’t planning on it.

name: Rintaro
line: But know this, Christina.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t call me Christina.

name: Rintaro
line: Lab Mem Number 004 will be a retired number. That number... is yours forever.

name: Kurisu
line: You look ridiculous!

name: Rintaro
line: What are you doing!? You’ve ruined my perfectly-staged exit scene! And you call yourself my assistant!?

name: Kurisu
line: No, I don’t call myself your assistant! And besides, I still have something to ask you!

name: Kurisu
line: I asked you about this before, but you said I got stabbed, right? I demand an explanation.

name: Rintaro
line: That was just something I hallucinated.

name: Kurisu
line: Why would you dream about me?

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t know. And it wasn’t a dream. It was a hallucination.

name: Kurisu
line: You said something about Doctor Nakabachi, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Doctor Nakabachi held a time machine presentation at Radi-Kan that day.

name: Kurisu
line: That presentation was canceled because of the satellite crash.

name: Rintaro
line: So it seems. But in my hallucination, the presentation proceeded as planned. Mayuri and I went to see it, and you came over to flirt with me.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t flirt. Especially not with idiots like you.

name: Rintaro
line: Like I said, it wasn’t real, okay? No... maybe this world is what isn’t real.

name: Rintaro
line: That would explain the riddle of the PhoneWave (name subject to change). If this world is some kind of simulation, then we can disregard the laws of physics.

name: Kurisu
line: Escapism? That’s unexpectedly chicken of you.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s a hypothesis. Your favorite thing.

name: Kurisu
line: So who stabbed me? Don’t tell me it was you.

name: Rintaro
line: You were already dead when I got there. I didn’t see who did it.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t get it. Why do I have to die in your mind? You have something against me?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course not. At that point in time, we had only spoken once. We were just strangers.

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, we didn’t know each other. That’s why I ran away instead of calling for an ambulance.

name: Kurisu
line: My hero.

name: Rintaro
line: What? You want me to go back in time and give you CPR or something? I’d need to use the PhoneWave (name subject to change) for that.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I’ve heard enough. No more hallucinating about me, okay? Dying isn’t fun, even if it’s in someone else’s head.

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t make any guarantees. That would require perfect 24-hour surveillance inside my brain.

name: Kurisu
line: You have a comeback for everything, don’t you.

name: Kurisu
line: Kyah! What now!?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not done talking!

name: Kurisu
line: You trying to pick a fight?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s revenge for ruining my farewell scene, Christina! You shall regret your thoughtless actions!

name: Kurisu
line: Okay, okay, fine. What is it?

name: Rintaro
line: About the IBN 5100.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

name: Rintaro
line: ...If you don’t know, then forget about it. Farewell! We will not meet again.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey! Don’t tell me to forget about it!

name: Kurisu
line: What is the IBN five... whatever?

name: Rintaro
line: Then IBN 5100. It’s a retro PC from 1975. I’m looking for one.

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah? What are you going to do with it?

name: Rintaro
line: Interested?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re interested, aren’t you?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Just a little.

name: Rintaro
line: Then I shall answer! The IBN 5100 is the key to unlocking SERN’s most closely guarded secrets.

name: Kurisu
line: SERN? You mean... the SERN?

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. Through the tireless efforts of my faithful lab mems, we have uncovered evidence that SERN is researching time travel.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Great. I shouldn’t have asked.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmmm...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. What’s up?

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Mayushii here.

name: Rintaro
line: I thought I told you not to contact me on this line. It could be tapped.

name: Mayuri
line: Huhwha?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m telling you to not be so careless. Anyway, give me a sitrep.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Okarin? Mayushii doesn’t know what that means...

name: Rintaro
line: I’m asking why you’re calling.

name: Mayuri
line: Why didn’t you just say that?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, what are you doing now?

name: Rintaro
line: Executing the mission.

name: Mayuri
line: Executing the missus?

name: Rintaro
line: The mission! I’m looking for an IBN 5100!

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! Well why didn’t you say so? Mayushii heard something amazing just now.

name: Mayuri
line: Wanna hear?

name: Rintaro
line: If it’s valuable information, then by all means.

name: Mayuri
line: Well, then come to MayQueen! I’ll be waiting♪

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, tell me over the phone! Hey, Mayuri!

name: Rintaro
line: Why do I have to go all the way to MayQueen...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii went to the convenience store during lunch break.

name: Mayuri
line: Now there’s only five minutes left!

name: Rintaro
line: Good work. So, what was that amazing thing you heard?

name: Mayuri
line: Before that, food.

name: Rintaro
line: Let me have one.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay.

name: Mayuri
line: Here you go♪

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t do that in front of the store. You’re supposed to be a maid.

name: Mayuri
line: So?

name: Rintaro
line: Here, you’re not Shiina Mayuri, but Mayushii NyanNyan.

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t ’say aah’ in front of the store! Your customers are going to see that as an act of betrayal.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh! Mayushii didn’t think of that.

name: Rintaro
line: Well? What was that amazing thing you heard?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, right! Actually, it’s about the IBN 5100.

name: Rintaro
line: You found a lead!? Of course, it was at MayQueen! I can’t believe I missed it!

name: Mayuri
line: No it’s not! That’s silly!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii was thinking of the IBN 5100 during work, so I asked the other girls if they knew anything.

name: Mayuri
line: First I asked Makki-chan, but Makki-chan said she’s not good with computers.

name: Mayuri
line: And then there’s LisaLisa-chan, but she only knows about the latest PCs. And she’s actually a Machead...

name: Rintaro
line: Just get to the point. I don’t really care how much trouble you went through.

name: Mayuri
line: Hm? Um, well, I think Feris-chan knows.

name: Rintaro
line: What!? Is that true!?

name: Mayuri
line: Yup. Did you know she’s a retro PC maniac?

name: Rintaro
line: Faris?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Looks like we’ve got a lead on the IBN 5100. Are you ready for this? It’s Faris NyanNyan.

name: Rintaro
line: It turns out that catgirl’s an expert on retro PCs. There’s probably another side to this. Let’s keep our eyes peeled.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hmph. I suppose I’m the only man for the job. Very well. I’ll make the approach.

name: Rintaro
line: If you don’t hear from me by 2000 hours tonight, then forget about me and commence the strike on MayQueen.

name: Rintaro
line: Everything is the choice of Steins Gate... El Psy Kongroo.

name: Mayuri
line: Ahh! I didn’t say you could have two!

name: Rintaro
line: Well done, Mayuri! I’ll see that your information is put to good use!

name: Mayuri
line: My chicken...

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, what’s this Feris Cup about?

name: Mayuri
line: My chicken...

name: Rintaro
line: Well, whatever. I’m uneasy about the lack of intel, but the mission must go on.

name: Rintaro
line: Wait here, Mayuri. If I don’t return within the hour, go home immediately. Understood?

name: Mayuri
line: I can’t! I have to work.

name: Faris
line: Welcome, Myaster♪

name: Faris
line: Nyanya♪ Is Kyouma gonna join too?

name: Faris
line: Today’s the Faris Cup, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Run a search on the Faris Cup.

name: Rintaro
line: ...What!? A battle to the death where the winner gets to use Faris however he pleases!?

name: Rintaro
line: Looks like I’ve stepped into one hell of a mess. ...No, there’s no problem. I’ll survive... by any means necessary. El Psy Kongroo.

name: Rintaro
line: The Faris Cup is a battle royale, isn’t it?

name: Faris
line: No, nya. It’s a cat-eat-cat battle royale where the winner gets to make Faris his slave, nya.

name: Faris
line: Ahh, no, you can’t! You can’t claw at each other’s throats over Faris, nya! Please, stop nya!

name: Faris
line: Kyouma, please, nya. Stop them.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. There’s nobody for me to stop. Everyone’s sitting silently in their seats.

name: Rintaro
line: No, seriously, what’s the Faris Cup?

name: Faris
line: A paw-to-paw contest with Faris nya. Faris goes at it with everyone at the same time nyan. A reward goes to those Faris finds worthy, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: Faris, are you serious!?

name: Faris
line: ...If you don’t do something, Faris is gonna become everyone’s plaything, nya.

name: Faris
line: Save Faris’s fur, Kyouma...

name: Rintaro
line: I refuse!

name: Faris
line: NyaNya!?

name: Rintaro
line: I didn’t come to fight. I only came to talk to you.

name: Faris
line: If you’re not going to play, then I’m sorry, but I’ll have to ask you to leave, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: What’s this? A maid, sending a customer away?

name: Faris
line: Faris is the organyaizer of the Faris Cup today. Only participants are allowed inside the shop, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: I only need two minutes. The IBN--

name: Faris
line: Not listening, nyan!

name: Faris
line: If you want to talk to Faris, you have no choice but to join the Faris Cup, nyan.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Now that’s just low.

name: Faris
line: So, what’ll it be nyan? You can’t survive unless you fight with your own paws, nyan!

name: Rintaro
line: There’s no choice. I accept your challenge. But on one condition.

name: Rintaro
line: If I face you, you’ll tell me everything you know!

name: Faris
line: NyaNya? Well, fine by me nya...

name: Faris
line: Well then, Master, this way, nyannyan♪

name: Itaru
line: Huh? Why are you here? You don’t do RaiNet.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha, Daru!?

name: Rintaro
line: What are you doing here!? What about SERN!?

name: Itaru
line: Let me rest for one day, man. You should treat me better after two consecutive all-nighters.

name: Rintaro
line: SERN’s power grows stronger by the day, and here you are without a care in the world.

name: Itaru
line: You’re here too.

name: Rintaro
line: I came here for an unrelated matter and got dragged into this nonsense. I’m not interested in RaiNet or Faris’s home cooking.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, Operation Sigma.

name: Itaru
line: What’s that?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m saying we should cooperate. We’ll be the strongest if we team up, right?

name: Itaru
line: More like you’re gonna drag me down. You’re a noob at this game, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: But you’re my right-hand man. As long as we’re together, we have nothing to fear.

name: Itaru
line: But I refuse. I’m in this thing to win.

name: Rintaro
line: And you call yourself my friend!?

name: Itaru
line: In this tournament, we’re enemies.

name: Rintaro
line: You traitor! Why do you think I sent you into this cafe as a spy?

name: Itaru
line: But you didn’t send me. I’m Faris-tan’s biggest fan. I check her blog every day and--

name: Faris
line: Hi everyone♪ Thanks for waiting, nyan! The afternoon Faris Cup is about to begin nya!

name: Faris
line: Thank you, nya!

name: Faris
line: The rules are simple. Faris will face off against each one of you nya.

name: Faris
line: Faris will even go paw-to-paw with ten people at once, nyan.

name: Faris
line: If you beat Faris, you’ll get her home cooking as a reward, nya.

name: Faris
line: Now then, everyone! Enjoy the contest!

name: Itaru
line: Gwah... strong Faris is strong...

name: Faris
line: Nyahaha♪ I hope the next group tries a little harder nyan.

name: Mayuri
line: Feris-chan sure is strong.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s bad at RaiNet, so I’m really jealous.

name: Rintaro
line: What would you do if you were good at it?

name: Mayuri
line: Don’t you know? RaiNet AccessBattlers isn’t just popular in Akiba. It’s a global blend!

name: Rintaro
line: I think you mean trend.

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah, that. So if you get good at it, you’re sure to be every kid’s hero!

name: Rintaro
line: Hero, huh... That doesn’t sound bad.

name: Mayuri
line: Besides, Upa is so cute♪

name: Rintaro
line: Wait. There’s something strange about your argument. How does RaiNet skill relate to Upa’s cuteness?

name: Mayuri
line: Feris-chan’s too busy to go to tournaments, but I she’s definitely a world-class player.

name: Faris
line: NyanNyan. Sorry, nya, but Faris never pulls punches in RaiNet.

name: Faris
line: I want someone who can go paw-to-paw with me, nyan.

name: Itaru
line: Gwohh! Feris-tan is too strong! We can’t win. It was hopeless from the get-go!

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph! You’re all pathetic.

name: Rintaro
line: But we’ve been saving the best for last.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru! Allow me to show you... how a true man fights.

name: Itaru
line: Don’t tell me you’ve got a plan?

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph. Indeed I do. Let’s just call this Operation ’Sweet Side’.

name: Faris
line: So Kyouma thinks he’s up to par, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: The tears of the fallen twenty... shall not be in vain.

name: Rintaro
line: Do you remember our promise, Faris? Once this match is over, you’ll tell me everything you know.

name: Itaru
line: Amazing! That crazy bastard actually means to win!

name: Mayuri
line: Go for it, Okarin♪

name: Rintaro
line: Five minutes. That’s all it will take to decide the match.

name: Faris
line: Okay! Round 3, start nya♪ RaiNet AccesssBattlers, duel access!

name: Rintaro
line: I give up.

name: Itaru
line: You’re weak! Too weak!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s disappointed...

name: Itaru
line: So it was all a bluff!? What happened to Operation ’Sweet Side’!?

name: Faris
line: It was almost like Kyouma committed suicide, nya.

name: Itaru
line: Wait, don’t tell me...

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! Yes! It’s exactly what you’re thinking!

name: Rintaro
line: Operation Sweet Side was a suicide attack!

name: Itaru
line: That’s gotta be the worst pun ever!

name: Faris
line: But why are you so proud even though I made kitty litter outta you, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh. Have you not figured it out, Faris NyanNyan!? Win or lose, it made no difference.

name: Faris
line: What’s that supposed to mean, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Do you remember the conditions I set?

name: Faris
line: Mya? If Faris lost, then she’d tell you everything--

name: Rintaro
line: No! You are wrong, Faris. What I said was...

name: Rintaro
line: ’If I face you, you’ll tell me everything you know!’ If I face you. Now do you understand?

name: Rintaro
line: I never needed to win!

name: Rintaro
line: No one else could have pulled it off. These fools were lured here by the prospect of Faris’s home cooking. They were obsessed with winning.

name: Rintaro
line: But not I! Your home cooking meant nothing to me! That difference in motivation is what allowed this suicide mission to succeed!

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh, muhahahaha, MUHAHAHAHAHA!

name: Mayuri
line: Wow, Okarin! You’re amazing!

name: Itaru
line: Th-that’s dirty...

name: Rintaro
line: I think you mean fiendishly clever! Behold the success of Operation Sweet Side!

name: Rintaro
line: Now, Faris. Answer me. Where is the IBN 5100!?

name: Faris
line: Nya? The IBN 5100?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t play dumb. I have a reliable source.

name: Rintaro
line: I know that you have information on the IBN 5100.

name: Faris
line: Nya... how do you expect me to remember that, nya? Though I think I’ve seen this computer before...

name: Rintaro
line: What!? I thought you were an expert on retro PCs! Mayuri told me so!

name: Itaru
line: Uh, you leaked your source...

name: Mayuri
line: Yup! Mayushii’s a reliable source!

name: Faris
line: I’m not an expert, nya. Papa collected them, so we’ve got tons at home, that’s all.

name: Rintaro
line: So that must be where the IBN 5100 is sealed! Take me there at once!

name: Faris
line: I can’t, nyan.

name: Rintaro
line: What!? Why!?

name: Faris
line: Because that’s the Faris Clan’s sanctuary.

name: Faris
line: The only ones who may enter are the Faris Clan’s cat-eared daughters: those who purrsue the knowledge of the meow miko.

name: Faris
line: In other words, it’s paws-off to everybody but Faris, nya. Try to force your way in... and you’ll grow dog ears, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: Like hell I will! Dog ears!? Yeah right!

name: Faris
line: I-it’s true, nya... Faris doesn’t tell tall tails, nya...

name: Rintaro
line: You coward! You’ve converted your believers into your personal army!

name: Faris
line: Faris is only telling the truth, nya...

name: Rintaro
line: Gwaahhh!

name: Rintaro
line: No, n-not now... it’s too soon!

name: Faris
line: No! Don’t tell me! Is the Anti-RaiNet System activating!? I warned you playing RaiNet could kill you!

name: Rintaro
line: Damn, empty handed...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin!

name: Rintaro
line: What happened? Is the Faris Cup already over?

name: Mayuri
line: Nope. Well, just about. After this, the customers get to chat with Feris-chan.

name: Mayuri
line: I wanted to tell you about that IBN 5100 thing. I showed Feris-chan the picture again.

name: Rintaro
line: Good work, Mayuri! Completely different from a certain useless super hacka! So?

name: Mayuri
line: Feris-chan said it was probably around the time she was in elementary school.

name: Mayuri
line: On a cold autumn day, while Feris-chan was shivering from the cold, her butler Kuroki-san came to help--

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t care about her butler! Just get to the point!

name: Mayuri
line: So basically, she ended up donating one of her dad’s computers to a shrine. She says it looked just like the one you’re looking for.

name: Rintaro
line: Donated it... to a shrine?

name: Rintaro
line: Which shrine?

name: Mayuri
line: Dunno. Where could it be?

name: Rintaro
line: Whatever. It’s a lead.

name: Rintaro
line: Good work, Mayuri. Continue your espionage mission.

name: Mayuri
line: SPN hodge?

name: Rintaro
line: Whatever, it doesn’t matter. Bye.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay! Bye bye♪

name: Rintaro
line: Shining Finger!

name: Rintaro
line: Finger!

name: Rintaro
line: Can’t you hear me?

name: Moeka
line: ...Who?

name: Rintaro
line: Hououin Kyouma! The mad scientist.

name: Moeka
line: ...Who?

name: Rintaro
line: What? Can’t you even remember people’s faces?

name: Rintaro
line: I agreed to help you find an IBN 5100, remember? And this is the thanks I get?

name: Moeka
line: Okabe-kun...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s Hououin.

name: Moeka
line: Sent... email.

name: Rintaro
line: Email?

name: Rintaro
line: I suppose it is quite a coincidence. Were you looking through the parts stores too?

name: Rintaro
line: Why won’t you speak!?

name: Moeka
line: ...too hard.

name: Rintaro
line: Isn’t it harder to type everything out!?

name: Moeka
line: Ah, Okabe-kun...

name: Rintaro
line: Want one?

name: Rintaro
line: Why don’t you talk?

name: Moeka
line: Emailing... is easier.

name: Rintaro
line: Of course. So that’s what it is!

name: Moeka
line: I’m... weird, aren’t I...

name: Rintaro
line: No, you’re normal.

name: Moeka
line: Really...?

name: Rintaro
line: You have nothing to be ashamed of. In this world, there exists something called absolute eternal truth. It’s a wall, immovable no matter how much you struggle.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s why people give up, abandon their dreams, choose a different path.

name: Rintaro
line: But never forget this one thing. You hold within your heart your own Steins Gate.

name: Moeka
line: Steins Gate...

name: Rintaro
line: All people, without exception, possess their own Steins Gate. As long as you have yours, you may follow any path without losing your way... just as I follow mine.

name: Rintaro
line: So, on to business. Do you have any information on the IBN 5100?

name: Rintaro
line: How long have you been searching?

name: Moeka
line: ...About two months.

name: Rintaro
line: Where have you looked?

name: Rintaro
line: Have you tried talking to PC store employees? They’d know more than anyone else.

name: Rintaro
line: So what’s your actual goal? To obtain an IBN 5100, or to investigate the urban legend?

name: Moeka
line: Both.

name: Rintaro
line: I see.

name: Rintaro
line: Where do you plan to search next?

name: Moeka
line: That’s...

name: Rintaro
line: Hm? I didn’t quite hear you.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. I have a network of informants at my disposal. Finding a retro PC should be no trouble at all.

name: Rintaro
line: Have you forgotten who I am? Hououin Kyouma! I will stop at nothing to destroy the System and usher in a new era of chaos! Muhahaha!

name: Moeka
line: That’s... Okabe-kun’s Steins Gate...

name: Rintaro
line: Not Okabe! Hououin!

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Mayushii here.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. What’s the situation?

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin!

name: Mayuri
line: I just called you!

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah. Did something happen?

name: Mayuri
line: Actually, try calling Daru-kun.

name: Rintaro
line: What? Why?

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun’s at MayQueen right now. You should call him. He’ll tell you.

name: Mayuri
line: Bye bye!

name: Rintaro
line: Wait! Hey, Mayuri! Hey!

name: Itaru
line: What’s up?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Report the situation.

name: Itaru
line: Okarin? You’re the only one who talks like that. Did you hear from Mayu-shi?

name: Rintaro
line: No, she didn’t tell me anything.

name: Itaru
line: Well, I’m at MayQueen right now.

name: Itaru
line: Mayu-shi did some investigating. Sounds like Faris-tan knows about the IBN 5100.

name: Rintaro
line: What!? Faris!?

name: Itaru
line: I understand your confusion, but apparently there are a lot of retro PCs at her home.

name: Rintaro
line: This too is the choice of Steins Gate!

name: Itaru
line: I don’t get you.

name: Rintaro
line: So, is Faris there?

name: Itaru
line: Of course. Today’s the Faris Cup.

name: Itaru
line: When I showed Faris-tan an image of the IBN 5100, she said she donated a similar PC to a shrine ten years ago. Dunno if it’s the one we want, though.

name: Rintaro
line: She donated it... to a shrine?

name: Rintaro
line: Which shrine?

name: Itaru
line: Uh, didn’t ask. My bad.

name: Rintaro
line: Whatever. It’s a lead.

name: Itaru
line: Well, I’m hanging up. The Faris Cup is about to begin.

name: Rintaro
line: I see. Daru, I’m sure you can do it. Be sure to win.

name: Itaru
line: Leave it to me!

name: Rintaro
line: Who is this?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re from the Organization, aren’t you? Is this a warning? You telling me to stop getting involved with SERN?
Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re not from the Organization?
...No. It’s Makise.

name: Rintaro
line: Makise...

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry, but I don’t remember. Tell me where we met. Paris? Or London, perh--

name: Woman Named Makise
line: Akihabara. We saw each other yesterday, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: Oh! My assistant!

name: Kurisu
line: Not your assistant! Makise Kurisu!

name: Rintaro
line: If you don’t say Christina, then I have no way of knowing it’s you.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not Christina either! How many times do I have to tell you?

name: Rintaro
line: You never stop complaining, do you?

name: Kurisu
line: Whose fault is that? Whose?

name: Rintaro
line: Wait a minute. How do you know my phone number?

name: Kurisu
line: Hashida-san told me.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, that’s boring. So, what is it, assistant?

name: Kurisu
line: I said I’m not your assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: Haah, what’s the point... Where are you now?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m headed to Yanabayashi Shrine.

name: Kurisu
line: Ah, okay. Bye then.

name: Rintaro
line: Huh? What!? What was that!? Is she messing with me!? She’s messing with me!

name: Rintaro
line: Your accomplishments mean nothing to me.

name: Kurisu
line: What are you talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: What was that phone call about?

name: Kurisu
line: I just wanted to ask you where you were. And since you said you were coming here, I came.

name: Rintaro
line: Nobody asked you to come.

name: Kurisu
line: And yet, here I am.

name: Rintaro
line: Why did you come to see me?

name: Kurisu
line: Not because I wanted to or anything. Don’t get me wrong.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I can’t stop thinking about what you said yesterday.

name: Rintaro
line: What I said?

name: Kurisu
line: About the IBN 5100. And SERN.

name: Rintaro
line: Of course! You’re working for SERN, not the Organization! You’re here to kill me, aren’t you!? That’s what I thought! You have the face of a killer!

name: Kurisu
line: What’s wrong with my face? How rude!

name: Kurisu
line: Can you calm down a bit? You’re always screwing around. I can’t believe you’re older than me.

name: Rintaro
line: Calm down? Hmph! You don’t understand what it’s like to live on the run, never knowing when the next assassin will strike.

name: Kurisu
line: All I’m hearing is gibberish.

name: Rintaro
line: You come here to pick a fight?

name: Kurisu
line: I just want to know how the IBN 5100 and SERN are related.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you mean you’re interested in SERN’s time machine research? Be honest with yourself.

name: Kurisu
line: Sh-shut up. I’m not interested in time machines at all.

name: Kurisu
line: More importantly, did you find an IBN 5100?

name: Rintaro
line: That’s why I’m here.

name: Kurisu
line: A shrine?

name: Rintaro
line: Correct.

name: Luka
line: Ah, Oka... Kyouma-san, hello.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Lukako, why don’t you have it?

name: Luka
line: Huh? Um, are you talking about Demon Sword Samidare?

name: Rintaro
line: I thought I told you to carry it at all times!

name: Luka
line: I’m sorry, but, it gets in the way when I’m cleaning, so...

name: Rintaro
line: What if they attack while you’re cleaning? Nobody’s going to come to your rescue, you know.

name: Luka
line: Th-that’s true... I’ll be more careful from now on.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey. What are you two talking about?

name: Luka
line: Um... who might this be?

name: Rintaro
line: My assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: No! What kind of introduction is that!?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m only telling the truth, Christina.

name: Luka
line: You’re n-not Japanese?

name: Kurisu
line: I am Japanese.

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, Lukako. I need to talk to your father about--

name: Kurisu
line: Wait! Introduce me properly!

name: Rintaro
line: You want to be introduced? Properly?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s unnatural not to be introduced in this situation!

name: Rintaro
line: I didn’t come here to introduce you to Lukako!

name: Kurisu
line: An introduction wouldn’t take more than ten seconds! What’s wrong with you?

name: Luka
line: Um... please don’t fight...

name: Rintaro
line: This is Makise Kurisu. My assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah, whatever. Assistant, whatever... sigh.

name: Luka
line: Nice to meet you, Makise-san. I’m Urushibara L-Luka.

name: Kurisu
line: Nice to meet you too. How old are you?

name: Luka
line: 17 this year.

name: Kurisu
line: A year younger than me...

name: Luka
line: Oh, really? Makise-san, you’re so grown up, I can’t believe we’re only a year apart.

name: Rintaro
line: That means you look old.

name: Luka
line: No, that’s not what I... um, I mean you’re very beautiful!

name: Kurisu
line: Thanks. I think you’re very cute.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re introduced. Happy? Can we move on now?

name: Kurisu
line: You are such a jerk.

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, Lukako, I require an audience with your father. Can you make it happen?

name: Luka
line: Yes, sure, but why do you need to talk to my dad?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s a grave matter that concerns the future of mankind.

name: Luka
line: The future...

name: Kurisu
line: Of mankind?

name: Luka
line: I’ll go get him!

name: Kurisu
line: Achoo!

name: Kurisu
line: Oh no, did I catch a cold?

name: Luka
line: Hurry, Dad! Hurry!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Slow down a little. If you rush me, I’m going to fall.

name: Luka
line: But the future of mankind is at stake!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Oh. Well. That’s certainly serious.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Ah, Hououin-kun. It’s been a while. Thank you for always taking care of Luka.

name: Rintaro
line: The honor is mine.

name: Kurisu
line: ...His name isn’t Hououin. It’s Okabe.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Oh. Really?

name: Rintaro
line: You there, assistant! Stop making things complicated!

name: Kurisu
line: I’m just telling the truth.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Luka told me his name was Hououin. Hmm, maybe Luka was just playing a trick on me. Hahaha.

name: Luka
line: Th-that’s not it, Dad. Okabe-san is his real name, and Hououin is, umm...

name: Rintaro
line: I am Hououin.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe Rintaro is the name your parents gave you, right? Are you denying that?

name: Rintaro
line: Just be quiet, Zombie!

name: Kurisu
line: Who’s a zombie!?

name: Luka’s Father
line: Hahaha. It’s great that you all get along.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Are you one of Luka’s friends too? Please get along with Luka from now on too.

name: Kurisu
line: Um, I’m...

name: Luka’s Father
line: As you can see, this child of mine is so delicate.

name: Luka
line: C-come on, Dad...

name: Luka’s Father
line: So, Hououin-kun. Did you need me for something?

name: Luka’s Father
line: I don’t know if ’donated’ is the right word to use...

name: Luka’s Father
line: But an old computer was entrusted to this shrine about nine years ago.

name: Rintaro
line: Eh...

name: Rintaro
line: That’s it! That has to be it!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Please wait here. I’ll go get it.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Whew, it was hard to dig out. I think this is what you’re looking for.

name: Luka
line: Ah, look at this.

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! MUHAHAHAHA! Finally, I have solved Akiba’s urban legend!

name: Rintaro
line: Urushibara-shi. I’ll be blunt.

name: Rintaro
line: May I borrow this computer?

name: Luka’s Father
line: Sure.

name: Rintaro
line: Seriously!?

name: Luka’s Father
line: When this was entrusted to us, the owner said this.

name: Luka’s Father
line: ’If a young man ever appears and says that he needs this computer no matter what, please lend it to him with my blessings.’

name: Luka’s Father
line: I didn’t think it would actually happen. To be honest, I’d forgotten about it entirely until you reminded me.

name: Luka’s Father
line: I’m happy to lend it to you, Hououin-kun. But please be sure to return it when you’re done, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course! Thank you!

name: Rintaro
line: Can’t Americans start driving at 16? How come you don’t have a license?

name: Kurisu
line: What, something wrong with that? I spend all my time doing research.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re wasting your youth.

name: Kurisu
line: I thought so too, until I met you. Now I realize I’m doing just fine.

name: Luka
line: Umm, no fighting please...

name: Rintaro
line: You’re a lifesaver, Lukako. Thank your father again for me.

name: Kurisu
line: Your father is a lovely man.

name: Luka
line: Eh...

name: Luka
line: M-my father is m-married... a-ad-adultery... is bad!

name: Kurisu
line: Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: I see, assistant. So you like older men.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, wait! Don’t misunderstand, you two. That’s not what I meant!

name: Luka
line: I-I won’t give up my father...

name: Kurisu
line: P-please don’t cry...

name: Kurisu
line: I just meant I was jealous of how well you get along with your father. That’s all.

name: Luka
line: Eh, ah, of course... I’m sorry for the weird misunderstanding! That was so rude of me!

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t cry. We’ve resolved the misunderstanding, so it’s all okay.

name: Rintaro
line: ...but in the depths of your heart lie feelings for Luka’s dad.

name: Kurisu
line: Die.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, don’t forget your practice swings with Samidare.

name: Luka
line: Y-yes sir. I’ll do my best... Umm, El Psy Kongalee...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s Kongroo! Don’t forget it.

name: Luka
line: I’m sorry!

name: Kurisu
line: Hey! What kind of lowlife teases a girl?

name: Rintaro
line: Hng! ...Gah, it’s heavy!

name: Luka
line: Is it that heavy?

name: Kurisu
line: Pathetic. It’s only as big as a CRT monitor.

name: Rintaro
line: Then why don’t you try carrying it? Then you’ll understand.

name: Kurisu
line: Wheugh...!

name: Kurisu
line: ...It’s r-really heavy.

name: Kurisu
line: This thing’s gotta weigh like 30 kilos.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe we should’ve borrowed a push cart. Urushibara-san, is there one in the shrine?

name: Luka
line: Umm, there is one, but actually, it’s broken... I’m sorry.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh. Is there some other place we could borrow--

name: Rintaro
line: No, we don’t need a push cart.

name: Kurisu
line: Then how are you going to bring it back? It takes about ten minutes to walk to your run-down lab from here.

name: Rintaro
line: It may be too heavy for one person, but it’s a different story for two. You and I just need to carry it together. Why else do you think I made you my assistant?

name: Kurisu
line: So that’s why...

name: Kurisu
line: Well, if we carry it together, we might be able to manage, but...

name: Kurisu
line: But I refuse.

name: Rintaro
line: ...huh?

name: Kurisu
line: I... I said ’no!’

name: Rintaro
line: I’m pretty sure you said ’but I refuse.’

name: Kurisu
line: Sh-shut up. I said no.

name: Kurisu
line: The whole reason you made me a lab mem was to ’borrow my knowledge’. From this, it is elementary to derive the following: ’I won’t do physical labor.’

name: Rintaro
line: I see. Then I guess I have no choice. I’ll do my best to carry it, but...

name: Luka
line: Um, th-then, I will...

name: Kurisu
line: Eh? You’re going to help? Will you be okay?

name: Luka
line: Yes, I’ll d-do my best.

name: Rintaro
line: No, Lukako. I shouldn’t make you help me. I can manage by myself.

name: Luka
line: But... we’re friends, Okabe-san. I want to help you.

name: Rintaro
line: No, I’ll do it myself.

name: Luka
line: I-I’ll help you!

name: Kurisu
line: Th-then, umm... me too...

name: Rintaro
line: Please, go ahead.

name: Kurisu
line: Eh? Wha!?

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! Don’t you know, Christina? This is what you call a Japanese Gag!

name: Kurisu
line: You sneaky...

name: Rintaro
line: Thanks for the backup, Lukako! Now that that’s settled, my assistant will help me carry the computer, so you don’t have to help. Thanks for the offer.

name: Luka
line: Ah, okay... if that’s how it is, then...

name: Rintaro
line: Now, assistant! Since you volunteered, I won’t let you refuse. Grab hold and heave!

name: Kurisu
line: ...Fine.

name: Kurisu
line: Why do we have to be face to face?

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s just go.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey! Stop stop stop! I said stop!

name: Rintaro
line: You’re a noisy one.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t walk forwards. Then I have to walk backwards. Let’s walk sideways.

name: Rintaro
line: Whatever. Get moving, assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, listen, please, just listen! I can’t walk backwards!

name: Rintaro
line: Of course you can. You’re my assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: I appreciate the vote of confidence, but I can’t! I’m asking you to go sideways! No, I’m telling you to go sideways! Sideways! I’m going to fall!

name: Kurisu
line: Haah, we finally made it... I’m exhausted...

name: Rintaro
line: If you didn’t complain so much about every little thing, we would’ve gotten here sooner.

name: Kurisu
line: Right back at you. You stopped to take a break at least five times along the way.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s because I wasn’t feeling well...

name: Kurisu
line: Are you okay?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s just... occasionally, my right arm aches... and when it does, dark destructive impulses overcome my soul--

name: Kurisu
line: Shut up, or I’ll tear the peripheral nerves out of that arm.

name: Kurisu
line: Shouldn’t you get your friends to help?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re right.

name: Suzuha
line: Huh?

name: Suzuha
line: If it isn’t Okabe Rintaro. What’cha got there?

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph, you want to know? Then I’ll tell you!

name: Kurisu
line: Wait! If you’re just going to stand and talk, shouldn’t we put the box down first?

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yeah... actually, wait, this will only take a second.

name: Suzuha
line: Well? What is it?

name: Rintaro
line: What if I told you... it’s an IBN 5100?

name: Suzuha
line: No way! You found it!? Wow! Way to go, Okabe Rintaro!

name: Suzuha
line: Where was it?

name: Kurisu
line: Ugh, it’s heavy...

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s put it down!

name: Kurisu
line: Haah...

name: Suzuha
line: So, where was it?

name: Rintaro
line: Yanabayashi Shrine.

name: Suzuha
line: Yanabayashi Shrine? You mean like a Shinto shrine?

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah.

name: Suzuha
line: Why was it there...

name: Kurisu
line: Y-yes?

name: Suzuha
line: Makise Kurisu?

name: Kurisu
line: Yes...?

name: Kurisu
line: What is it? Have I done something wrong?

name: Suzuha
line: ...Hmph.

name: Kurisu
line: Who was that?

name: Rintaro
line: She works part-time at that store.

name: Kurisu
line: Why was she glaring at me?

name: Rintaro
line: How should I know? Did you do something to make her angry?

name: Kurisu
line: I’ve never seen her before in my life. How rude.

name: Rintaro
line: Good work, everyone. With this, we can fight.

name: Kurisu
line: Who are you fighting?

name: Rintaro
line: SERN, and the system that rules the world.

name: Kurisu
line: If that’s what makes you happy...

name: Rintaro
line: Happy? I do not desire happiness. Have you forgotten? I am an insane mad scientist!

name: Rintaro
line: What I desire is chaos. The time machine exists to bring chaos to the world. MUHAHAHAHA!

name: Kurisu
line: Never mind happiness. You’re like a junkie hypersecreting beta endorphins.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? I don’t want you doing bad things, remember?

name: Itaru
line: But wow! I can’t believe you found one. You make the impossible look easy! That’s why we love you! That’s why we ad--

name: Kurisu
line: I certainly don’t admire him.

name: Rintaro
line: Eh?

name: Mayuri
line: It’s all thanks to Mayushii!

name: Mayuri
line: Without Mayushii’s info, Okarin would still be lost on the streets of Akiba.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri’s right. She did well this time.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! Anyway, it’s time for Mayushii to go home.

name: Mayuri
line: What about you, Chris-chan? Wanna go together?

name: Kurisu
line: Thanks. But I’m going to stay here a little longer.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay. But you should go home before it gets too late.

name: Mayuri
line: See you tomorrow! Tutturu♪

name: Rintaro
line: Now then, Daru. When do you think we can use the IBN 5100 to hack SERN?

name: Itaru
line: Hmm... well...

name: Itaru
line: Wow, it actually turned on.

name: Itaru
line: First I need to learn how to use this thing. It looks like hooking it up is gonna be a pain.

name: Itaru
line: It might take a while. I can’t play with this thing and search for the server admin’s ID at the same time.

name: Rintaro
line: Alright. Prioritize the ID search.

name: Rintaro
line: If possible, I’d like you to get the IBN 5100 ready to use this month, though.

name: Itaru
line: There’s still 30 days left this month. It’s not gonna take that long.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m wise to your tricks, fiend!

name: Luka
line: Ah, Oka... Kyouma-san, hello.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Lukako, why don’t you have it?

name: Luka
line: Huh? Um, are you talking about Demon Sword Samidare?

name: Rintaro
line: I thought I told you to carry it at all times!

name: Luka
line: I’m sorry, but it gets in the way when I’m cleaning...

name: Rintaro
line: What are you going to do if they attack while you’re cleaning? Nobody’s going to come to your rescue, you know.

name: Luka
line: Th-that’s true... I’ll be more careful from now on.

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, Lukako. I need to talk to your father. Can you go get him?

name: Luka
line: Yes, I can, but, what do you need to talk to him about?

name: Rintaro
line: Serious business, critical for the future of mankind.

name: Luka
line: The future... of mankind!?

name: Luka
line: I-I’ll go get him!

name: Luka
line: Hurry, dad! Hurry!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Slow down a little. If you rush me, I’m going to fall.

name: Luka
line: But the future of mankind is at stake!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Oh. Well. That’s certainly serious.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Ah, Hououin-kun. It’s been a while. Thank you for always taking care of Luka.

name: Rintaro
line: The honor is mine.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Did you need me for something?

name: Luka
line: Th-that’s right...! The future of mankind...!

name: Luka’s Father
line: That sounds serious.

name: Luka’s Father
line: I don’t know if ’donated’ is the right word to use...

name: Luka’s Father
line: But an old computer was entrusted to this shrine about nine years ago.

name: Rintaro
line: Eh...

name: Rintaro
line: That’s it! That has to be it!

name: Luka’s Father
line: Please wait here. I’ll go get it.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Whew, it was hard to dig out. I think this is what you’re looking for.

name: Luka
line: Ah, look at this.

name: Rintaro
line: Muhaha! MUHAHAHA! Finally, I have solved Akiba’s urban legend!

name: Rintaro
line: Urushibara-shi. I’ll be blunt.

name: Rintaro
line: May I borrow this computer?

name: Luka’s Father
line: Sure.

name: Rintaro
line: Seriously!?

name: Luka’s Father
line: When this was entrusted to us, the owner said this.

name: Luka’s Father
line: ’If a young man ever appears and says that he needs this computer no matter what, please lend it to him with my blessings.’

name: Luka’s Father
line: I didn’t think it would actually happen. To be honest, I’d forgotten about it entirely until you reminded me.

name: Luka’s Father
line: I’m happy to lend it to you, Hououin-kun. But please be sure to return it when you’re done, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course! Thank you!

name: Rintaro
line: So that means I have to carry it back.

name: Luka
line: It looks pretty heavy...

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph. No matter how heavy it may look, it’s still just a computer. I can manage.

name: Rintaro
line: Huff! ...Gah, it’s heavy!

name: Luka
line: A-are you okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Kuh... why now!?

name: Rintaro
line: My right hand... is aching!

name: Luka
line: B-but, that means...!

name: Luka
line: Umm, umm, I-I’ll perform an exorcism!

name: Rintaro
line: Wait... d-don’t go... I’m still okay...

name: Luka
line: B-but Kyouma-san, you look like you’re in pain! Wh-what should I do...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s okay... it’ll stop soon... you don’t need to worry...

name: Rintaro
line: But... I have a request. Will you hear me out?

name: Luka
line: Y-yes, if it’s something I can do!

name: Rintaro
line: Please help me... carry this box.

name: Luka
line: Eh...

name: Luka
line: B-but I’m not strong at all...

name: Rintaro
line: We can manage... together. You’re the only one I can depend on now.

name: Luka
line: Kyouma-san...

name: Luka
line: I don’t know if I can do it...

name: Rintaro
line: You can do it. I know you can.

name: Luka
line: ...Okay. But, um, if we can take breaks along the way, I’d be happy...

name: Rintaro
line: Alright, Lukako, grab the other side.

name: Luka
line: Um... is your arm... okay now?

name: Rintaro
line: No. We can’t let our guard down. This might only be temporary.

name: Rintaro
line: We need to get this to the lab before I have a relapse.

name: Luka
line: I’ll do my best! But I’m not confident...

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. I’ll support you.

name: Luka
line: Ugh! I-it’s heavy!

name: Rintaro
line: Brace your legs! Let’s keep going. We’ll move sideways, okay? Don’t move forwards or backwards!

name: Luka
line: Kayyy... Um, sideways, as in left? Right!?

name: Rintaro
line: Right... no, my right, so your left... go left!

name: Luka
line: Okaayyyyy...

name: Luka
line: B-but, my hand, my hand is cramping...

name: Rintaro
line: Fight, Lukako! And whatever you do, don’t drop it! We’re screwed if it breaks!

name: Luka
line: Ugh, ugghhh...

name: Luka
line: Haah... haah... we made it...

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah... thanks for the help... you’re... a lifesaver...

name: Rintaro
line: Phew, really... thanks...

name: Luka
line: Ah, no...

name: Luka
line: Since you’re my master, Kyouma-san, I’m happy... to be of use to you.

name: Rintaro
line: Come forth, my servants! By the covenant I command thee, grant me thy power!

name: Luka
line: K-Kyouma-san!?

name: Kurisu
line: You’re so annoying! What is it!?

name: Rintaro
line: Huh, I summoned an assistant. What are you doing here?

name: Kurisu
