line: Nwohh!? Wh-wh-what are you doing!?

name: Suzuha
line: Don’t move.

name: Suzuha
line: You’re okay. You haven’t been brainwashed.

name: Rintaro
line: ...What?

name: Suzuha
line: When you’re brainwashed, they usually put a chip on the inside of your lower eyelid.

name: Suzuha
line: Okabe Rintaro. Please keep that confidential.

name: Rintaro
line: So you’ve been captured by the Organization before. Just like me.

name: Suzuha
line: ...Huh? The Organization? Are you talking about SERN?

name: Rintaro
line: No! Say no more. I understand your pain all too well.

name: Suzuha
line: Y-you do?

name: Rintaro
line: The Organization’s secret brainwashing facility, known as Apocalypse of Galient. That place is a living hell.

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t want to revive any suppressed memories.

name: Suzuha
line: Um, right. I don’t think it was called Apokawhatever, though...

name: Suzuha
line: But it certainly was a living hell.

name: Rintaro
line: I can tell you’ll make a good comrade, Part-Time Warrior. The day of Ragnarok is near!

name: Suzuha
line: C-cool!

name: Nae
line: Suzuha, what’s ’brain watching’?

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh. I, Hououin Kyouma, shall be the one to answer that.

name: Nae
line: Eh!? No... that’s okay.

name: Suzuha
line: Ahaha! Looks like Nae’s afraid of you, Okabe Rintaro.

name: Rintaro
line: You do well to fear me, Sister Braun, but you should also pay me respect. For I am the world’s most infamous mad scientist!

name: Nae
line: You’re infamous?

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. World leaders would kill to get their hands on my genius brain cells.

name: Nae
line: Wow...

name: Suzuha
line: That’s how people talk when they’ve been brainwashed, Nae.

name: Nae
line: Eh?

name: Rintaro
line: Nonsense, Part-Time Warrior. My brain has not been washed since the day I was born.

name: Nae
line: Are you a liar, Mister Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t call me that!

name: Suzuha
line: You shouldn’t yell at children. Look, she’s shaking.

name: Kurisu
line: You’re even more of a perv than Okabe! I’m not using ’-san’ for you any more!

name: Itaru
line: I’m not a perv! I’m a pervy gentleman!

name: Kurisu
line: What does that even mean!?

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, guys? Do you think Okarin’s okay?

name: Rintaro
line: You heard everything, didn’t you?

name: Suzuha
line: Sorry, sorry. I didn’t mean to eavesdrop, but I just couldn’t help it!

name: Rintaro
line: Did you hear about the time machine too?

name: Suzuha
line: Oh, yeah. I heard. Way to go, you!

name: Rintaro
line: You haven’t told anyone, have you? If I can’t trust you to keep silent, I’ll have to take extreme--

name: Suzuha
line: I won’t say a thing, I swear! Your secret’s safe with me!

name: Rintaro
line: Great. There’s just one thing I’d like to ask.

name: Rintaro
line: Did you see some kind of electrical discharge on the second floor just now?

name: Suzuha
line: Electrical discharge? You mean like yesterday’s rumbling?

name: Suzuha
line: It happened once before. You’re lucky the boss wasn’t around.

name: Nae
line: It shook. It was scary.

name: Rintaro
line: Just now, about a minute ago, it should’ve happened again.

name: Suzuha
line: Oh, really? I didn’t see the second time.

name: Suzuha
line: Maybe I was too preoccupied polishing my baby.

name: Suzuha
line: Did you see it, Nae?

name: Nae
line: Nope.

name: Rintaro
line: You didn’t see the second one?

name: Nae
line: I didn’t see it.

name: Suzuha
line: Did something happen?

name: Rintaro
line: ...How much do you know about time travel?

name: Suzuha
line: ...What do you mean by that?

name: Suzuha
line: ...I don’t believe it.

name: Suzuha
line: I’ve never heard of anything like that. Is it true? Are you telling the truth?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course. We’ve created a bona-fide time machine. And we were able to change the past!

name: Rintaro
line: Nobody can deny our accomplishments. That’s right, nobody!

name: Suzuha
line: Geez! That’s not what I meant!

name: Suzuha
line: I don’t know if what you’re saying is true or not, but...

name: Suzuha
line: I think you should try asking John Titor.

name: Rintaro
line: ...John Titor?

name: Suzuha
line: I mean, he’s a hot topic now, isn’t he? A time traveler from the future!

name: Suzuha
line: He might know something. Since you’re both time travelers and all.

name: Rintaro
line: I see... You could be right! No, there’s no doubt about it!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. John Titor may have come from the future to guide me.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah, that’s right. His arrival here in 2010 must be the choice of Steins Gate. El Psy Kongroo.

name: Nae
line: Who is he talking to?

name: Suzuha
line: Dunno. Who could it be? Maybe it’s someone from the future.

name: Nae
line: From the future...!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Do you want to know who I’m talking to, Sister Braun?

name: Nae
line: N-no, I...

name: Rintaro
line: Good. Even if you are interested, never ask. I could tell you, but then I’d have to silence you. And I don’t want to have to do that to an innocent girl.

name: Suzuha
line: Come on, stop scaring her. She’s just a little girl.

name: Rintaro
line: I’ll get in touch with Titor immediately. Your advice is appreciated, Part-Time Warrior!

name: Suzuha
line: Ahaha, was I useful? That’s gr--

name: Suzuha
line: Oh crap! The boss is back! The boss is back!

name: Suzuha
line: Nae, if Manager asks, tell him I was doing my job!

name: Nae
line: Okay. But you have to let me ride your bike, okay?

name: Suzuha
line: Okay, okay!

name: Suzuha
line: Good luck, Okabe Rintaro! I’m rooting for you!

name: Nae
line: Welcome back, Daddy!

name: Tennouji
line: Nae! What did this nutjob do to you!?

name: Tennouji
line: You son of a... how dare you make moves on my precious daughter!? I’ll kill ya!

name: Rintaro
line: W-wait! I haven’t done anything!

name: Tennouji
line: Then why were you talking with Nae alone, huh!?

name: Rintaro
line: We weren’t alone! Suzuha was here too! That girl was skipping work to polish her bicycle!

name: Tennouji
line: ...Is that true, Nae?

name: Nae
line: She promised she’d let me ride her bike. So I gotta say she wasn’t skipping!

name: Tennouji
line: Skipping’s the only thing she’s good at, isn’t it? Worthless part-timer.

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, shouldn’t you apologize for making false accusations?

name: Tennouji
line: What? Hell no!

name: Tennouji
line: Understand? I won’t let you off easy next time you make moves on my daughter.

name: Rintaro
line: I wouldn’t do something so suicidal.

name: Tennouji
line: Nae, I bought some cream puffs, so let’s eat them together.

name: Nae
line: Okay!

name: Tennouji
line: Hey, part-timer! I know you were slacking off! Hey!

name: Tennouji
line: And why is the 42-inch on!? I thought I told you to turn it off!

name: Suzuha
line: I’m sorryyyyy!

name: Rintaro
line: Wait! We’ll talk when everything’s over.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, I’ll buy more bananas tomorrow, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: So for now, hug this little guy suuuuper tight and cheer up, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, assistant. You’re not going back to your hotel?

name: Kurisu
line: Is there a problem?

name: Rintaro
line: No, no problem. I was just wondering what you were still doing here.

name: Kurisu
line: Nothing. I just wanted to think for a bit.

name: Rintaro
line: Can’t you think at your hotel?

name: Kurisu
line: What? You’re kicking me out?

name: Rintaro
line: Ahh, I get it. You’d be lonely in your hotel room, but you have no friends, so you want me, the great Hououin Kyouma, to look after you. Isn’t that right, you spoiled Celeb Sev?

name: Kurisu
line: You’re the lonely one, aren’t you? You’ve been acting gloomy all day.

name: Kurisu
line: Do you need some advice? I’m an outsider, in a sense, so it should be easier to talk to me, right?

name: Kurisu
line: A man getting advice from a younger woman is kind of *mumble mumble*, but if you’re fine with that, then just ask away.

name: Rintaro
line: I need to send some emails. If you insist on staying here, then be quiet and stay out of my way. Okay, Zombie?

name: Kurisu
line: Of all your stupid names, that one’s the worst.

name: Rintaro
line: Want some coffee?

name: Kurisu
line: Sure.

name: Kurisu
line: What’s wrong with you? Stop fidgeting.

name: Kurisu
line: That was a pretty heavy sigh.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. There’s something I want to talk to you about.

name: Kurisu
line: Shouldn’t you answer your phone first?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s Daru. It’s probably something stupid.

name: Kurisu
line: You’re really self-righteous, you know.

name: Rintaro
line: You might not remember this, but earlier, I changed the past with a D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I haven’t known you long enough to tell whether you’re serious.

name: Rintaro
line: It happened. And then everyone except me forgot about it. Or rather, the fact that it happened was erased from history.

name: Kurisu
line: The past changed, so the present changed with it? The Butterfly Effect, huh. But what you’re saying is nonsense.

name: Rintaro
line: Why do you say that?

name: Kurisu
line: Why do you remember that the past changed?

name: Kurisu
line: If you used a time machine to physically travel to the past and change history, then that might explain it -- barely.

name: Kurisu
line: But with a D-Mail, you haven’t taken one step outside the present, have you?’

name: Kurisu
line: So if the present changed, and we changed with it, you would have to change too.

name: Kurisu
line: Or are you saying you didn’t change because you’re the observer? In that case, you’re claiming that you’re not a human being.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Everything is the choice of Steins Gate! This is the power of my magic eye, Reading Steiner! Muhahaha!

name: Kurisu
line: Aaaand he’s at it again.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not playing along with your games. I bet you came up with that Reading Whatever thing just now, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Hello?

name: Itaru
line: Okarin! I’ve made a terrible mistake!

name: Rintaro
line: Mistake?

name: Itaru
line: Actually...

name: Itaru
line: I left my wallet at the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: Wh...at?

name: Itaru
line: I can’t go to MayQueen like this! Can you bring me my wallet? I’ll buy you a drink.

name: Rintaro
line: Go jump in the river!

name: Rintaro
line: Tch, persistent little...

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah? I’m not delivering your wallet, okay!?

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Okarin, Okarin!

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, it’s you. You’re with Daru, right? You don’t have to lend that dumbass any money, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, okay♪

name: Mayuri
line: So, Okarin, I was wondering if you cheered up. Did you hug Upa like I said?

name: Rintaro
line: No! I am a mad scientist full of madness and ambition!

name: Mayuri
line: That’s good! You know, if you’re worried about anything, talk to Mayushii, okay? Mayushii doesn’t understand hard things, but she does understand Okarin♪

name: Rintaro
line: You understand me?

name: Mayuri
line: Sure! We’ve been together since we were little, after all. Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hmph. I’m hanging up. Work hard now.

name: Mayuri
line: Thanks! Bye!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hmph, she thinks she knows me.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe. You’re grinning.

name: Rintaro
line: N-nonsense, Celeb Sev!

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t call me Celeb Sev!

name: Kurisu
line: You look like a girl in love waiting for an email from her boyfriend.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you really that desperate for attention?

name: Kurisu
line: Just getting revenge. You’re always making fun of me, so I deserve at least this much.

name: Rintaro
line: Despite what you may think, I actually respect you.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s rich. You don’t even say my name right.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry about that.

name: Kurisu
line: Well, that’s unexpected... You actually apologized.

name: Rintaro
line: I do apologize. But I can’t help it.

name: Rintaro
line: For my brain has recorded you as my assistant, Christina, and I cannot correct it! MUHAHAHAHA!

name: Kurisu
line: I’m gonna crack your skull open and stick electrodes in your hippocampus.

name: Kurisu
line: Who are you talking to?

name: Rintaro
line: John Titor.

name: Kurisu
line: Huh? No way.

name: Rintaro
line: He’s open to discussion as long as you’re not trying to troll him, and his mail address is public. This is the second time we’ve exchanged mails.

name: Kurisu
line: No wonder you keep referencing Titor’s posts. You believe him, don’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Not entirely. But there are several points in his story I do agree with.

name: Kurisu
line: Really? I can’t see it as anything but fiction.

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahahahaha!

name: Kurisu
line: D-don’t just start laughing like that. It’s creepy.

name: Rintaro
line: Hehehe, but I must! He says I have powers! Isn’t that rich!?

name: Rintaro
line: You don’t have to tell me what I already know, John Titor!

name: Rintaro
line: My true power... is the magic eye, ’Reading Steiner’!

name: Kurisu
line: Sounds to me like you’ve got a bad case of chuunibyou.

name: Rintaro
line: Eh?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Tch.

name: Rintaro
line: John Titor is a fraud!

name: Rintaro
line: Me, the Messiah? Hmph. Ludicrous! To think that I would save humanity!

name: Rintaro
line: I am no Messiah! I am the insane mad scientist, Hououin Kyouma, who has walked through fire and bathed in an ocean of blood to escape the clutches of the Organization!

name: Rintaro
line: My desire is chaos unending. Do you think that destroying the System will bring peace to the world? The answer is no! No, I say!

name: Rintaro
line: Death to the naive fools who believe such lies! The collapse of authority means that lawless CHAOS shall reign! MUHAHAHAHA!

name: Itaru
line: Um, Makise-shi? What the hell happened to Okarin?

name: Kurisu
line: Beats me. A few hours ago, he was exchanging emails with John Titor, and then he suddenly got quiet.

name: Kurisu
line: And then he started ranting. He’s been like this for half an hour.

name: Itaru
line: He’s been acting strange all day, don’t you think?

name: Kurisu
line: Agreed.

name: Rintaro
line: Listen up, lab mems! It’s time to resume Operation Urd!

name: Itaru
line: Seriously? The manager’s still downstairs, you know?

name: Rintaro
line: Fret not. It’s almost closing time for the Braun Tube Workshop.

name: Kurisu
line: The PhoneWave doesn’t work at night, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s worth a try! We need to figure out how late the PhoneWave (name subject to change) works.

name: Rintaro
line: At the same time, I want to see if the two of you can use D-Mails to change the past.

name: Itaru
line: Change the past...!

name: Rintaro
line: Change the past to your liking. As long as it’s something easy to observe.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m going back to my hotel. Show me your report on today’s experiment tomorrow.

name: Rintaro
line: Hold it!

name: Kurisu
line: Hey! What’s your problem!?

name: Rintaro
line: Who’s writing that report?

name: Kurisu
line: You, of course. This is your operation.

name: Kurisu
line: And if we could get a report from the subject too, that would be even better.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Are you not interested in changing the past? What happened to your eagerness to experiment?

name: Kurisu
line: Did you forget what I said this afternoon? I’m against it.

name: Rintaro
line: But you were so enthusiastic when we began the experiments. You went along without a single complaint.

name: Kurisu
line: In your dreams, maybe.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re not being objective, Christi... Celeb Sev.

name: Kurisu
line: If you’re going to correct yourself, at least get it right.

name: Rintaro
line: We’ve already performed one experiment. I changed the past.

name: Itaru
line: Hey! No fair!

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, but you were in on it too. But when the past changed, you forgot that it had ever happened.

name: Itaru
line: Are you talking about this afternoon? I mean, when you suddenly started asking about the LOTO SIX.

name: Rintaro
line: Exactly.

name: Itaru
line: ...You’re not joking, are you?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m serious.

name: Itaru
line: ...Seriously?

name: Itaru
line: Okay! There’s one thing about the past I definitely want to change.

name: Rintaro
line: What? Are you going to tell yourself to go on a diet?

name: Itaru
line: I wouldn’t diet even if future me told me to.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re gonna change the result?

name: Itaru
line: I remember every move Faris-tan made. It’ll be easy to take her from behind. Aren’t I a genius?

name: Rintaro
line: Whatever. Daru, prepare to D-Mail!

name: Itaru
line: Hell yeah! I’ll give it my best shot!

name: Kurisu
line: So why do you think you’re the only one who remembers?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re awfully persistent. I see why they call you The Zombie.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t follow.

name: Rintaro
line: Zombies never stop coming. They’re persistent.

name: Kurisu
line: Cut the jokes. I’m serious here.

name: Rintaro
line: I think that the key is who receives the D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: Only the recipient himself is able to retain his memories. That would be my guess.

name: Kurisu
line: Hmmm...

name: Rintaro
line: After Daru, you’ll send the next D-Mail. Think about what you want to write.

name: Kurisu
line: No.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not sending one.

name: Rintaro
line: Scared?

name: Kurisu
line: That’s not it.

name: Rintaro
line: Then are you worried about time paradoxes?

name: Kurisu
line: Well, there’s that, but it’s more like a personal policy.

name: Kurisu
line: Changing the past feels like cheating.

name: Kurisu
line: I may only have 18 years of life experience, but I don’t want to change any of those memories.

name: Rintaro
line: I see. You’re perfect now, so you don’t want to change.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s not what I said...

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t want to deny who I’ve been. Because even my failures are a part of who I am today.

name: Rintaro
line: Even if we solved all of the PhoneWave (name subject to change)’s problems, you wouldn’t use it?

name: Rintaro
line: Even if John Titor said you could use his time machine to travel to whatever time you wish, you wouldn’t use it?

name: Rintaro
line: Even if a blue robot cat from the future were to jump out of your desk and give you a doorway to everywhere, you wouldn’t use it?

name: Kurisu
line: I wouldn’t.

name: Rintaro
line: But you love experiments. Don’t you?

name: Kurisu
line: S-something wrong with that?

name: Rintaro
line: So basically, you like to experiment on other people while you watch and cackle at the results! You truly are a mad scientist!

name: Kurisu
line: Why you--

name: Itaru
line: Done!

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t get it.

name: Itaru
line: It’s how Faris-tan placed her cards. Can’t you tell? You guys are lame.

name: Rintaro
line: Why do I remember?

name: Itaru
line: Did the past change?

name: Rintaro
line: Wait. Daru, you remember too?

name: Itaru
line: Huh? Remember what?

name: Rintaro
line: That you just sent a D-Mail!

name: Kurisu
line: Of course I remember. What are you...

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, I see. According to your hypothesis, you and I shouldn’t remember sending the D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, did you beat Faris in the Faris Cup?

name: Itaru
line: ...I dunno.

name: Rintaro
line: You said the winner gets Faris’s home cooking, right? Did you eat it? What happened?

name: Itaru
line: I don’t know... This sucks.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Maybe the past hasn’t changed?

name: Itaru
line: I’ll try calling Mayu-shi.

name: Itaru
line: Mayu-shi? You’re still at work, right? Is Faris-tan there? ...She is!?

name: Itaru
line: Um, can you ask her if I beat her in the Faris Cup? Did I get to eat her home cooking?

name: Itaru
line: ...Who lost? I did? Oh... Barely took five seconds? Oh... okay...

name: Kurisu
line: I guess that means the past hasn’t changed.

name: Itaru
line: Why!? It changed for Okarin, right!?

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe your foolproof plan wasn’t so foolproof. Like, maybe it only gave you a slight advantage.

name: Kurisu
line: Since Faris-san defeated you anyway, the past didn’t change.

name: Itaru
line: Yeah, but I mean, the game would’ve played out differently.

name: Rintaro
line: That might not be enough to cause worldline divergence.

name: Kurisu
line: Like Okabe said, you need to make a change that’s easier to observe. Or else there’s no point to this experiment.

name: Kurisu
line: Um, n-not that I approve of this experiment or anything.

name: Itaru
line: No, it’s not over yet. I can still fight!

name: Itaru
line: One more time. I’ll try sending my past self some more advice. This time, something that’ll ensure my victory.

name: Kurisu
line: You really want to win that badly?

name: Rintaro
line: More like he wants to eat Faris’s home cooking that badly.

name: Itaru
line: That’s my Final Answer.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Out of time?

name: Rintaro
line: Looks like it.

name: Itaru
line: But my advice was perfect...

name: Rintaro
line: There’s nothing we can do about it. We’ll postpone the experiment till tomorrow.

name: Kurisu
line: After I left yesterday, I was thinking. How exactly does the PhoneWave make time travel possible?

name: Rintaro
line: It works like the LHC. Didn’t you say the LHC was like a giant microwave?

name: Kurisu
line: If every microwave could turn into the LHC, then Japan would have black holes popping up everywhere.

name: Itaru
line: Whoa, that sounds worse than earthquakes.

name: Kurisu
line: I know it looks like SERN is able to create Kerr black holes willy-nilly, but that’s not supposed to be possible.

name: Kurisu
line: You can’t just press a button and make a black hole. Even if you could, the risks would be unthinkable.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s ridiculous to suggest that a household microwave could generate a black hole.

name: Kurisu
line: My point is that there has to be something else going on here.

name: Kurisu
line: Some outside source must be injecting electrons into this microwave.

name: Kurisu
line: Well, I’m going back to my hotel. I’ve had enough of this filthy man cave.

name: Kurisu
line: See you tomorrow. Don’t forget to write that report.

name: Itaru
line: Hmm... Makise-shi’s lab coat... I wonder what it smells like...

name: Rintaro
line: Cut that out! If you have time to be perverted, then go think about how to change the past for tomorrow’s experiment!

name: Tennouji
line: Okabe! Don’t you have anything better to do?

name: Nae
line: Good morning, Mister Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: How many times do I have to tell you? Call me Kyouma!

name: Nae
line: Um... what should I do, Daddy?

name: Tennouji
line: What nonsense are you trying to feed my daughter?

name: Rintaro
line: Have you not properly educated her, Mister Braun? This child of yours refuses to call me by my true name. Please do something about it.

name: Tennouji
line: Who cares? Don’t be so picky.

name: Tennouji
line: Nae, you don’t have to listen to what this guy says, okay?

name: Nae
line: Okay...

name: Nae
line: Ah.

name: Mayuri
line: Good morning, Okarin!

name: Nae
line: Mayuri!

name: Mayuri
line: Good morning, Nae-chan.

name: Nae
line: Good morning.

name: Mayuri
line: This is for you, Nae-chan. Enjoy♪

name: Nae
line: Thank you!

name: Mayuri
line: I have some for Okarin too!

name: Mayuri
line: Why are you sitting out here?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m waiting for all lab mems to assemble.

name: Nae
line: Um, are you slacking off?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Nae-chan? I’m sure Okarin’s thinking about important stuff.

name: Nae
line: Oh... wow!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin, Okarin. It’s too early to make PhoneWave-chan sparkle, right?

name: Mayuri
line: Can I go nuke some yakisoba bread?

name: Rintaro
line: We removed the door. You can’t heat food in it anymore.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, right. That makes me sad...

name: Mayuri
line: By the way, have you had breakfast?

name: Rintaro
line: Nope.

name: Mayuri
line: Then let’s eat together. We can eat the yakisoba bread cold, and then heat up some canned ramen in hot water.

name: Mayuri
line: Wanna join us, Nae-chan?

name: Nae
line: I’m okay. I ate.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay!

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun and Chris-chan are kinda late, huh?

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. Their lack of dedication is appalling.

name: Suzuha
line: Sup!

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Suzu-san.

name: Suzuha
line: If it isn’t Shiina Mayuri! Tutturu♪

name: Suzuha
line: Okabe Rintaro, did you talk to Titor?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Maybe.

name: Suzuha
line: Come on! You emailed him, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Yes, but I’m starting to doubt whether he can be trusted.

name: Suzuha
line: What!? Why!? What went wrong!?

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, so you’re a Titor otaku.

name: Mayuri
line: Look, it’s Chris-chan!

name: Mayuri
line: Chris-chan, tutturu♪

name: Kurisu
line: Good morning.

name: Rintaro
line: What did you say to the part-timer downstairs?

name: Kurisu
line: Nothing much. I told her if she wanted to say something, she should just say it.

name: Rintaro
line: What did she say?

name: Kurisu
line: Nothing. She just groaned. I wonder what’s wrong with her.

name: Itaru
line: She’s jealous of Makise-shi’s popularity, duh!

name: Itaru
line: She’s thinking ’If only I’d joined the lab instead of her. Then I would be having fun with everyone right now! I’m so jealous!’ or something like that.

name: Itaru
line: I’m telling you, man. 3D is hell.

name: Kurisu
line: If she wants my lab mem number, she can have it.

name: Rintaro
line: What!? The lab mem number you carry is the highest credential a scientist could hope to achieve! They sell for millions on the black market, but you would give it away!?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s not exactly a counterfeit passport. Also, shut up.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii wants everyone to get along.

name: Itaru
line: Anzai-sensei, I want to eat Faris-tan’s home cooking...

name: Mayuri
line: If you give up, it’s game over!

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri, it’s time for you to change the past.

name: Mayuri
line: Eh? Me? Are you sure?

name: Mayuri
line: But, um... what should I change?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, I know! I’ll make Luka-kun wear one of my costumes!

name: Rintaro
line: How?

name: Mayuri
line: By sending Luka-kun a mail! Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: Can’t you think of anything easier to change and observe?

name: Mayuri
line: Hmm...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Let’s use that canned ramen.

name: Rintaro
line: You’ll send a D-Mail to yourself one hour ago. Type ’I wanna eat canned oden’ or something like that.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t think that’s enough to convince her to--

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, that might work!

name: Mayuri
line: When I went to the vending machine today, I spent ten minutes wondering if I should get canned oden or canned ramen. It was really hard!

name: Rintaro
line: So a little push should be enough to make you choose canned oden! Alright, let’s go with that!

name: Mayuri
line: Okay! But before we change the past, I gotta finish this ramen first.

name: Kurisu
line: What happens if you don’t finish it?

name: Mayuri
line: It’ll go to waste♪

name: Kurisu
line: Oh... of course. Ahaha...

name: Rintaro
line: PhoneWave (name subject to change), activate!

name: Mayuri
line: Aw... I haven’t sent it yet...

name: Kurisu
line: So one second isn’t enough for the discharge to occur. That’s what I expected, but it’s good to have proof.

name: Itaru
line: What if you try warming it up beforehand?

name: Kurisu
line: Warming it up?

name: Itaru
line: One second isn’t enough, right? So just run the microwave for about 30 seconds without sending a mail.

name: Itaru
line: As soon as it’s done, run it again with the timer set at one second. That should cause the discharge, right?

name: Kurisu
line: Any basis for that?

name: Itaru
line: Nope.

name: Rintaro
line: Damn. Mayuri, got anything else!?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, well... we could change the flavor of rice ball I bought last night...

name: Rintaro
line: Do you remember what kind of rice ball you ate last night?

name: Mayuri
line: Smoked tuna.

name: Kurisu
line: She remembers!?

name: Mayuri
line: So let’s change that to, um... fish eggs!

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Rintaro
line: But wait...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Yeah, I have some doubts. What? You can tell by my voice? Hmph, you know me too well.

name: Rintaro
line: So, about whether or not I should include Shining Finger in the PhoneWave (name subject to change) experiments...

name: Rintaro
line: ...What? Nonsense. You want me to offer her as a sacrifice? True, I am prepared to make sacrifices in order to bring chaos to the world, but...

name: Rintaro
line: ...No, there’s no problem. I shouldn’t have hesitated. Pathetic. Maybe I’m not cut out to be a mad scientist.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah, you might say her offer was a message. No doubt this too is the choice of Steins Gate. El Psy Kongroo.

name: Moeka
line: ...Thank you.

name: Rintaro
line: For what?

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t think you’re selfish. In fact, I’m grateful for your offer.

name: Mayuri
line: I think it’s a good idea! Moeka-san is a lab mem too!

name: Itaru
line: So, what sorta mail does Kiryu-shi plan to send?

name: Rintaro
line: My request is that its contents be simple and easy to measure, so that we can confirm whether or not the past changes.

name: Rintaro
line: A secret? What do you mean?

name: Kurisu
line: What’s going on?

name: Rintaro
line: No, that’s not the problem.

name: Kurisu
line: Hmmm, I see.

name: Kurisu
line: I understand how you feel, but since this is an experiment, data collection should take priority.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh? We agree for once, assistant.

name: Kurisu
line: I-I’m not agreeing with you, exactly. If we don’t collect data, then we’ll never figure out how the PhoneWave works.

name: Mayuri
line: But girls have lots of secrets, you know?

name: Mayuri
line: You shouldn’t ask her to tell her secrets, Okarin. That’s perverted!

name: Itaru
line: Whoa! Is that where we’re going with this!?

name: Rintaro
line: Calm down, Daru!

name: Rintaro
line: We’re not asking you to send something private.

name: Kurisu
line: Even if you want to send something private, you shouldn’t for now. We still don’t know how this thing handles paradoxes, so we need to be extremely careful.

name: Moeka
line: ...Nothing private?

name: Kurisu
line: Nothing you want to keep secret, at least. Even if you mean well, the mail’s content might have a serious effect on the timeline.

name: Kurisu
line: You should show your mail to a third party and have them check if the content is problematic or not.

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. My assistant said everything I wanted to say. I will add only that the experiment must go on!

name: Kurisu
line: ...I wasn’t speaking for you. Don’t misunderstand.

name: Kurisu
line: Experiments prioritize data over privacy in the first place. If you’re going to be a test subject, you need to be prepared for that.

name: Mayuri
line: Really? Mayushii wasn’t prepared for that...

name: Mayuri
line: I’m sorry, Chris-chan...

name: Kurisu
line: You don’t have to apologize. I’m not criticizing you. It’s just how these things work.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re a lab mem. You need to trust us. Save private information for another day.

name: Rintaro
line: If you can’t... then I’ll be forced to show you what lies dormant inside of the great Hououin Kyouma -- the terrible power of insanity!

name: Rintaro
line: Well, I can show you my arrival history.

name: Moeka
line: ...And the send history?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t have one. The send history disappears after you send the email.

name: Mayuri
line: You don’t have to if you don’t want to, Moeka-san.

name: Itaru
line: So, whatcha gonna send? Okarin wants us to change the past in an easy-to-measure way, but that’s setting the bar way too high.

name: Rintaro
line: Nonsense. You’re all just aiming too low.

name: Moeka
line: I... have an idea.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh? This could be good. Give us the details.

name: Rintaro
line: Excellent, Shining Finger! You’re a model lab mem!

name: Itaru
line: Oh, that’s the GG01 that just came out last month.

name: Mayuri
line: Gee Gee Zero One?

name: Itaru
line: The latest model. Pretty sure the screen is detachable, so you can swap out attachments for it.

name: Itaru
line: It’s in short supply right now, so you need to be placed on a waitlist. Nice job getting one.

name: Rintaro
line: So, Finger.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, why do you call Moeka-san ’Finger’?

name: Rintaro
line: That’s the name of her esper power. Kiryu Moeka, I dub thee Shining Finger! Use this name with pride.

name: Rintaro
line: What? You don’t like it? But it’s such a cool name. What’s the problem!?

name: Mayuri
line: Moeka-san is Moeka-san. Her fingers don’t shine or anything...

name: Itaru
line: Don’t feed the trolls, Mayu-shi.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not trolling, just naming her power.

name: Kurisu
line: Cut the chatter and get started.

name: Itaru
line: What if the manager says something?

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! Don’t be afraid of Mister Braun! If he storms in yelling, I’ll kick him to the curb!

name: Itaru
line: Seriously? Okarin, you’re so cool! That’s why we love you!

name: Kurisu
line: He’s just talk.

name: Rintaro
line: PhoneWave (name subject to change), activate!

name: Rintaro
line: Guh!!

name: Rintaro
line: Where’s Shining Finger? Where’d she go?

name: Kurisu
line: Shining what?

name: Itaru
line: Okarin. Japanese please.

name: Rintaro
line: Where’s Kiryu Moeka? She was here just now, wasn’t she!?

name: Mayuri
line: Uhwhaaa?

name: Mayuri
line: Whoooo?

name: Rintaro
line: Kiryu Moeka!

name: Itaru
line: Who’s that?

name: Kurisu
line: Never heard of her.

name: Rintaro
line: ...No way.

name: Kurisu
line: Did it happen again, Okabe?

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean, ’again’?

name: Kurisu
line: Something like this happened yesterday. You remembered something we didn’t. Uh, what did you call it?

name: Kurisu
line: Oh yeah, Reading Steiner.

name: Mayuri
line: Are you okay? You’re really pale.

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yeah... I’m fine.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Assistant, how much do you remember about the experiment we just did?

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t remember doing any experiments today.

name: Kurisu
line: You sent a D-Mail just now, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah.

name: Rintaro
line: But things are different from yesterday. I didn’t send the D-Mail. Kiryu Moeka did.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. Let’s say a D-Mail caused a time paradox. What would happen?

name: Kurisu
line: ...I don’t know. No one has experienced a time paradox, after all.

name: Rintaro
line: But before, didn’t you say something like the world would disappear?

name: Kurisu
line: All I said was that that was one theory.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe nothing happens, and like in a certain movie, history gets amended to accommodate the paradox.

name: Kurisu
line: According to Dr.Hawking’s chronology protection conjecture, it’s impossible to do anything that might cause a time paradox in the first place.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Mayushii doesn’t really understand...

name: Mayuri
line: But we’re all fine now, right? I don’t think that paradox thing happened.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii doesn’t know who Moeka-san is, but I’m sure she’s okay too♪

name: Itaru
line: That’s Mayu-shi for you. A cute dumb girl.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehh? Mayushii’s not dumb!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Ha, haha.

name: Kurisu
line: Explain what happened, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: Hmmm.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Honestly, I’m not surprised she disappeared from the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t know the details, but when the past changed, Kiryu-san’s actions these past four days changed ever so slightly.

name: Kurisu
line: As a result, the timeline was reconfigured so that Moeka-san didn’t come to the lab today.

name: Itaru
line: Is that even possible?

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t know. If the fact that the D-Mail was sent is undone, then it becomes a paradox of who sent that D-Mail...

name: Kurisu
line: And there’s one other thing that I don’t understand.

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Kurisu
line: What you call Reading Steiner.

name: Kurisu
line: By the way, you should quit it with that name. It’s stupid.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph, I didn’t ask for your opinion.

name: Kurisu
line: By your explanation, you neither sent nor received the D-Mail. Yet how come you’re the only one who remembers what happened before the worldline changed?

name: Kurisu
line: What if it’s all in your head?

name: Itaru
line: Like an imaginary girlfriend. I get it.

name: Rintaro
line: No you don’t. I’m not a ’gentleman perv’ like you, creating imaginary relationships.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe this Kiryu-san never existed. Or maybe Kiryu-san does exist, but the fact that she sent a D-Mail was something you made--

name: Rintaro
line: Gwaaaah!

name: Rintaro
line: Ugh, ggh... my left eye, Reading Steiner, it aches!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin, are you okay?

name: Rintaro
line: No, Mayuri! S-stay away! I don’t... want to hurt you!

name: Mayuri
line: But Okarin, you look like you’re in pain...

name: Itaru
line: ...He’s messing with us, right?

name: Kurisu
line: Y-yeah...

name: Rintaro
line: I-I’m okay... This aching is normal... it’ll end soon!

name: Rintaro
line: As long as I have this magic eye... the Organization will keep coming after me! It’s the power to see across time and space... but at the same time, it’s a double-edged sword!

name: Rintaro
line: Because of this all-seeing eye... I have lost my connection to causality. I drift alone in the space between worlds.

name: Rintaro
line: But even so... I swore to protect this lab! So quiet thy fury, Reading Steiner! Your time will come... but not yet.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? Does it hurt?

name: Rintaro
line: No... I’m okay now.

name: Kurisu
line: W-what? That was just an act, right?

name: Rintaro
line: You are wrong, Christina.

name: Rintaro
line: Our experiments have already proven...

name: Rintaro
line: That I...

name: Rintaro
line: That my Reading Steiner is genuine!

name: Kurisu
line: Fine, I get it. You’re a chuunibyou patient.

name: Itaru
line: Eh?

name: Mayuri
line: Hm?

name: Kurisu
line: Ah...

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-why are you all staring at me? Don’t look at me!

name: Rintaro
line: Going home?

name: Mayuri
line: Yup.

name: Kurisu
line: Do you always stay the night here?

name: Rintaro
line: Pretty much. I wouldn’t be a true mad scientist if I couldn’t stay overnight at my lab, immersed in research.

name: Kurisu
line: I think you’re putting too much emphasis on appearances.

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, this place is really convenient. Mayushii would stay over if mom and dad let me.

name: Kurisu
line: Y-you would?

name: Mayuri
line: And it’s so close to work too♪ Hey, Chris-chan, why don’t we all stay over some time?

name: Kurisu
line: Sure, if the guys aren’t around.

name: Rintaro
line: That won’t happen.

name: Kurisu
line: Then why don’t you come to my hotel, Mayuri-san?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh yeah, we did make that promise, huh? Ehehe! Then let’s do that next time♪

name: Kurisu
line: You can come whenever you like. See you tomorrow.

name: Mayuri
line: ...Hey, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah. A shooting star. Did you make a wish?

name: Mayuri
line: Remember how back in elementary school, you got a terrible fever and stayed in bed for a month?

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you bringing this up?

name: Mayuri
line: I was so afraid that Okarin might die.

name: Mayuri
line: So Granny and I prayed to the sky together. ’Don’t die, Okarin.’

name: Rintaro
line: Heh, something like that could never kill me! Ten years ago, I was already a mad scientist with an IQ of 170, equaling that of Thomas Edison!

name: Mayuri
line: Really? That’s amazing!

name: Mayuri
line: But Mayushii was still really small, and didn’t know that, so I prayed to the sky.

name: Mayuri
line: And then, on New Year’s Eve, right before midnight, a shooting star went pewww across the sky. Just like now.

name: Mayuri
line: If you repeat your wish three times before a shooting star disappears, your wish will come true. Did you know that?

name: Mayuri
line: It was hard, but Mayushii repeated her wish three times.

name: Mayuri
line: The next day, on New Years, your fever went down, and you woke up.

name: Mayuri
line: So basically, Mayushii saved your life! Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: No. It was simply the choice of Steins Gate.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehh? Really?

name: Rintaro
line: Really.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh...

name: Mayuri
line: Hey. Remember what you said when your fever went down?

name: Mayuri
line: You said everything went blurry and twisty like, and the ground shook so bad you couldn’t stand. Remember?’

name: Mayuri
line: You were acting kind of like that just now.

name: Mayuri
line: Are you okay? You’re not coming down with a fever, are you?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m fine. Don’t worry about a thing.

name: Rintaro
line: I see! So this power was already mine back then! Muhahaha!

name: Luka
line: Pardon the intrusion...

name: Itaru
line: Oh, if it isn’t Luka-shi.

name: Luka
line: Hello, Hashida-san, Okabe-san.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako! You don’t have Demon Sword Samidare with you! What is the meaning of this!?

name: Luka
line: Eh, eh, eh?

name: Rintaro
line: I even unsealed the treasured heirloom sword Mistilteinn when I heard you were coming today. I’m disappointed in you.

name: Luka
line: I’m sorry! Um, I’ll go back and get it.

name: Rintaro
line: No, that’s okay. It was not Mistilteinn’s fate to encounter Samidare this day.

name: Itaru
line: But a Japanese sword and a cursed sword from Norse mythology are so mismatched it’s not even funny. Do we even have a sword here?

name: Luka
line: What should I...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, though you are my disciple, you still lack dedication.

name: Luka
line: I-I’m sorry!

name: Rintaro
line: At this rate, it will take some time before you can be useful.

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, why not join our lab?

name: Luka
line: Eh, me?

name: Luka
line: But I’m clumsy, and I’m not good at science or engineering... I’ll probably just get in your way...

name: Luka
line: Do you really want me?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t sweat it. Mayuri’s the same.

name: Mayuri
line: We’d love to have you, Luka-kun!

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, if Luka-kun’s gonna be a lab mem, then Mayushii has one condition for Okarin. Don’t tease Luka-kun.

name: Mayuri
line: And today, Luka-kun is Mayushii’s guest. He came for a fitting session, so don’t get in our way.

name: Luka
line: But Mayuri-chan, I don’t really want to cosplay... Um, can it really just be a fitting session?

name: Mayuri
line: Yup. We’re just making sure the size matches!

name: Mayuri
line: Tadah♪

name: Mayuri
line: This is a costume of Kirari-chan from RaiNet!

name: Mayuri
line: Anyway, I’d say it’s about 70% complete, but I want Luka-kun to try it on now♪

name: Luka
line: Try it on? Here?

name: Luka
line: I can’t...

name: Mayuri
line: Please?

name: Rintaro
line: Listen, my pupil. To change your clothes is to change your very being. This costume might help you grow stronger. Put it on at once!

name: Luka
line: You’re on her side? I just... can’t wear something so embarrassing!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s only embarrassing because you think it is.

name: Mayuri
line: That’s right! I’m sure you’ll be really cute♪

name: Rintaro
line: Besides, Mayuri worked very hard to make this costume so you could wear it.

name: Rintaro
line: She sacrificed her sleeping time, her favorite banana nourishment time, and her Juicy Chicken Number One time just so she could sew and sew and sew.

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t let effort like that go to waste.

name: Luka
line: That’s true, but...

name: Mayuri
line: Come on, Luka-kun! Transform! Tra-ns-form♪

name: Luka
line: Eh, wait a sec, wahhhhhhh!

name: Mayuri
line: Okay! Don’t be shy! Now take off your clothes.

name: Luka
line: Wahh! Mayuri-chan, please don’t touch me there! I’ll change by myself! Please wait outside!

name: Mayuri
line: But it’s a little tricky putting this on. Mayushii will teach you all the steps♪

name: Luka
line: Hyeeehhh, please don’t undress me!

name: Itaru
line: It’s so... yuri.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s not yuri. Lukako’s a guy.

name: Itaru
line: Then it’s reverse rape!? Whoa, that’s downright criminal!

name: Mayuri
line: Come on, Luka-kun! Don’t be shy.

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-kun?

name: Mayuri
line: Waaahh! Luka-kun finally wore one of my outfits!

name: Luka
line: I-it’s so embarrassing... I’m a guy... I shouldn’t be dressing like this...

name: Mayuri
line: You know what they say. Cuteness is Justice♪

name: Luka
line: I don’t know what you mean!

name: Itaru
line: Excellent work as usual. The clothes and the model bring out the best in each other.

name: Itaru
line: As far as 3D goes, Faris-tan is supreme, but Luka-shi almost makes me wanna become a low angler.

name: Mayuri
line: What about you, Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, yeah, well...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me! My sanity is under attack! No, it’s not the Organization. It’s a descendent... of one of the town’s... guardian miko! Guh! It’s... infecting my soul!

name: Rintaro
line: To think... Akiba had... such a powerful guardian! If we can harness this power... we can counteract the Organization’s corrupting influence.

name: Rintaro
line: ...I know. We can’t hand the town over to those bastards just yet. This, too, is the choice of Steins Gate... El Psy Kongroo!

name: Rintaro
line: Whew... Lukako. Foolish disciple of mine. From now on, you shall go into battle equipped with that costume and Samidare.

name: Luka
line: Eh...

name: Mayuri
line: Ehh? Kirari-chan doesn’t have a sword! He should carry an Upa instead♪

name: Rintaro
line: The Organization is making a move on Akiba.

name: Rintaro
line: You are the guardian who protects this chaotic metropolis. Miko of Yanabayashi Shrine, now is the time for you to fulfill that duty!

name: Rintaro
line: Understand, Lukako? This is the reason I’m so hard on you. You have a duty to protect this town!

name: Luka
line: Do I... really?

name: Rintaro
line: You certainly do! Muhahaha!

name: Kurisu
line: Can you stop that vulgar laughter? I can hear you from outside. It’s embarrassing.

name: Mayuri
line: Chris-chan, tutturu♪

name: Rintaro
line: Mmgh!? You come here this late and dare insult me? And you call yourself my assistant!?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not your assistant. Don’t make me repeat myself.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway! You’re the worst, toying with such a weak and innocent girl. Aren’t you ashamed of yourself?

name: Itaru
line: Toying with a weak and innocent girl, you say?

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t react to every little thing, you perv.

name: Kurisu
line: At any rate...

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. Stop eying Lukako’s entire body from top to bottom like that.

name: Kurisu
line: I-I wasn’t doing that!

name: Mayuri
line: Do you like the costume, Chris-chan? It really suits Luka-kun, dontcha think?

name: Kurisu
line: Is this that cosplay thing I’ve heard about? It’s part of Japanimation culture, right?

name: Kurisu
line: You’re very cute.

name: Luka
line: C-c-cute? No way...

name: Kurisu
line: Why are you crying? You look perfect, so you should be more confident.

name: Luka
line: Uuugh...

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako! Tell us your wish.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s one hell of an acrobatic topic change.

name: Rintaro
line: Listen, Lukako! Your desires can become reality. Japan is a land of great spiritual power. It resides in every word that slips from your tongue!

name: Rintaro
line: Now that you too have joined the otaku world, you need conceal your deepest desires no longer!

name: Rintaro
line: Speak your wish with a true heart, and by the chaos that rules Akihabara, Steins Gate shall grant it!

name: Luka
line: My... wish?

name: Luka
line: Well...

name: Luka
line: If I tell you... promise not to laugh?

name: Rintaro
line: There’s nothing to be embarrassed about. Just proclaim it to the world!

name: Kurisu
line: Well yeah, no wish is embarrassing compared to the idiotic wish for chaos to envelop the world or whatever.

name: Rintaro
line: You, assistant! What kind of person laughs at people’s wishes!?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Mayushii’s wish is to eat a ton of of yummy food, and to cover the lab with Upa goods, and to get Luka-kun to wear my costumes--

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not asking you.

name: Mayuri
line: But Mayushii wants ’Shota in the Gate’ to grant her wish too!

name: Itaru
line: ’Shota in the Gate’!? That mistake is god tier. Probably because it’s so... naughty.

name: Luka
line: I want... to be a girl.

name: Kurisu
line: ...What?

name: Luka
line: I don’t really... like how I look...

name: Luka
line: I always thought... that if I were a girl... I could be a little more confident...

name: Kurisu
line: Wait. Wait a second.

name: Kurisu
line: Umm, what did she say?

name: Rintaro
line: Heh, heh, heh. Assistant mine -- no, Christina!

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not your assistant, and I’m not Christina!

name: Rintaro
line: You’ve made a grave error!

name: Kurisu
line: I have?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you understand? No, of course you don’t. How could you, with impure thoughts clouding your eyes!

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-what do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: Allow me to explain. You called Lukako here a ’weak and innocent girl.’

name: Rintaro
line: But he’s not a girl at all. He’s a guy!

name: Kurisu
line: Is that some kind of joke?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not a joke, but the naked truth as described in the Akashic Records! Muhahaha!

name: Kurisu
line: ...Are you guys trolling me?

name: Rintaro
line: Eh?

name: Itaru
line: Eh?

name: Kurisu
line: Is what Okabe says true?

name: Luka
line: Y-yes...

name: Luka
line: I’m... a guy...

name: Kurisu
line: N-no way! Someone this cute can’t be a boy!

name: Itaru
line: You’ve got it backwards. You’re supposed to say ’Someone this cute can’t be a girl.’

name: Kurisu
line: That’s not what I meant.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako. You’re fine just the way you are. I will not reject you, be you man or be you woman. Nor will anyone else here.

name: Rintaro
line: And I will not deny your wish. Nor will anyone else here.

name: Itaru
line: Why do you keep repeating that last part?

name: Rintaro
line: Why, Christina. Is it such a shock to meet a man far more feminine than you?

name: Kurisu
line: I admit it. Compared to her... I mean, to him, I’m not as cute, I talk more rudely, and my attitude is worse...

name: Kurisu
line: This is a three-day-coma level shock.

name: Mayuri
line: Chris-chan’s cute too♪

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t try to comfort me. It just makes me feel worse.

name: Rintaro
line: Admitting your faults is the first step towards becoming stronger. You may one day become a splendid woman, Christina. You’re still young.

name: Kurisu
line: Who the hell asked you?

name: Rintaro
line: I take it back! You’re a stubborn fool who refuses to face the truth!

name: Kurisu
line: Shut up. I don’t want to hear that from you.

name: Luka
line: Um... sorry. I shouldn’t have said anything.

name: Itaru
line: Welp, better get my trusty digicam...

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t try to sneak in a photo session, you perv!

name: Itaru
line: Anzai-sensei, I want to be a low angler...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, how serious are you about that wish of yours?

name: Luka
line: You know those stories where a guy magically turns into a girl overnight? Sometimes I wish that would happen to me.

name: Luka
line: Ahaha... that’s stupid, isn’t it?

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-kun, you’re so cute♪

name: Kurisu
line: S-So cute...

name: Kurisu
line: This reminds me of something I heard once.

name: Itaru
line: Exposition scene, go!

name: Kurisu
line: There’s a saying that if you eat a lot of meat when you’re pregnant, you’ll have a boy, and if you eat a lot of vegetables, you’ll have a girl.

name: Itaru
line: Source? Minmei Shobou?

name: Kurisu
line: I saw it on the internet.

name: Itaru
line: S-so that’s how you reply... well played.

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-what are you talking about?

name: Mayuri
line: Really? I didn’t know that. So Mayushii and Chris-chan’s moms ate a lot of vegetables?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii only eats Juicy Chicken Number One, so will her future child be a boy?

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, do you think bananas count as vegetables?

name: Rintaro
line: But what about primitive people who lived on hunting? If that theory is true, then they would have had too many boys and not enough girls.

name: Rintaro
line: Humanity would never have made it this far.

name: Kurisu
line: I never said it was true.

name: Kurisu
line: I just remembered hearing it somewhere. Don’t snap at every little thing.

name: Rintaro
line: I didn’t snap. Christina, feel like verifying that theory?

name: Kurisu
line: ...What are you implying?

name: Rintaro
line: Have you forgotten? We have the PhoneWave (name subject to change)!

name: Mayuri
line: PhoneWave-chan? It can tell if you’ll have a boy or a girl?

name: Kurisu
line: Wait... of course.

name: Kurisu
line: We can send a D-Mail to Urushibara-san’s mother when she was pregnant.

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. Something like ’Eat more vegetables!’

name: Rintaro
line: You think it’s worth a shot?

name: Kurisu
line: Well...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s too late to hide behind your goody-two-shoes mask, Christina. Your fate is to become a mad scientist, for you are an experiment-loving girl!

name: Kurisu
line: Who are you calling an experiment-loving girl!?

name: Rintaro
line: Am I wrong?

name: Kurisu
line: N-no, but...

name: Itaru
line: Hold on, man! What are you going to do if the experiment works?

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Itaru
line: I mean, if Luka-shi’s sex seriously changes.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s what he wants, isn’t it?

name: Itaru
line: Well, yeah, but...

name: Itaru
line: If his sex does change, won’t the 16 years of his life change too? That’s what I mean.

name: Itaru
line: Who’s gonna take responsibility for that?

name: Rintaro
line: That’s...

name: Luka
line: Um... I’ll take responsibility...

name: Itaru
line: Seriously?

name: Luka
line: Well, I don’t really understand... but if we use this method, I might become a girl, right?

name: Luka
line: Then... I want to try.

name: Luka
line: Please, Master.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri, your opinion?

name: Mayuri
line: Hmm... If Luka-kun becomes a girl, then I’ve gotta call her Luka-chan!

name: Mayuri
line: Will Luka-chan wear Mayushii’s costumes?

name: Luka
line: Um, well, that’s another story...

name: Rintaro
line: Then that settles it. Lukako, I appoint you Lab Mem 006.

name: Rintaro
line: The PhoneWave (name subject to change) is our lab’s most important secret. In order to use it, you must become a lab mem.

name: Luka
line: Ah! Okay!

name: Luka
line: Actually... I always wanted to be a lab member.

name: Mayuri
line: Really? You should’ve just said so!

name: Luka
line: I didn’t have the courage... Like I said, I don’t know a thing about gadgets...

name: Mayuri
line: You don’t have to worry about those things. I mean, Mayuri doesn’t get them either.

name: Rintaro
line: So Lukako shall be a lab mem from this point forth. Any objections?

name: Kurisu
line: Here.

name: Kurisu
line: I want to give Urushibara-san my number so I can retire.

name: Rintaro
line: Denied. Anyone else?

name: Kurisu
line: ...*sigh*

name: Rintaro
line: Very well. Lukako is officially Lab Mem Number 006. Henceforth, pledge your allegiance to the lab, and devote all your strength to the enrichment of our science.

name: Luka
line: Y-yes! I will! I’m so happy.

name: Rintaro
line: Now then, let’s begin the experiment immedia--

name: Rintaro
line: Damn! Lukako, you’re 16, right?

name: Luka
line: Um... right.

name: Rintaro
line: So you were born in 1993...

name: Mayuri
line: Yup! The same year as Mayushii. What about it?

name: Rintaro
line: When did cellphones become widespread in Japan!?

name: Kurisu
line: Ah...

name: Itaru
line: Around 1996. There wasn’t mail until later, though.

name: Rintaro
line: So the year Lukako was born, most people still didn’t have cellphones.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako’s mother may not have had one. In that case, she might not be able to receive the D-Mail!

name: Mayuri
line: Oh! I get it!

name: Luka
line: Eh...? We can’t do it?

name: Itaru
line: What about modifying it to send crazy waves or something?

name: Kurisu
line: What the hell are crazy waves?

name: Itaru
line: Waves that only crazy girls can pick up. You know, girls who always talk about stuff no one understands. It’s pretty moe.

name: Kurisu
line: I’ll microwave your brain if you don’t shut up.

name: Itaru
line: Yes! Abuse me more, please!

name: Mayuri
line: Um, couldn’t you put a letter in a time capsule and bury it?

name: Kurisu
line: That would go to the future, not the past.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh...

name: Itaru
line: I know! How about that thing where you get struck by lightning and that turns you into a girl! Like in old comics and anime.

name: Kurisu
line: There’s no point to the experiment if we don’t use D-Mail. Don’t lose sight of the objective.

name: Mayuri
line: We’re counting on you for a nice idea, Chris-chan♪

name: Kurisu
line: M-me? I...

name: Kurisu
line: We could... build a rocket which exceeds the speed of light squared, then that immense speed would reverse the flow of time, or something...

name: Itaru
line: You’re forgetting about the PhoneWave too.

name: Rintaro
line: Furthermore, genius girl, you just contradicted relativity.

name: Kurisu
line: It was just a joke. Don’t take it seriously.

name: Rintaro
line: Useless, all of you! This lab is a disgrace!

name: Kurisu
line: Fine then. Let’s hear from Hououin Kyouma, the insane mad scientist with an IQ over 170 whose brain cells are coveted the world over. What’s your genius plan?

name: Rintaro
line: Hmm... Inspiration flashes in the corners of my brain.

name: Itaru
line: That Edison thing again?

name: Rintaro
line: I have it.

name: Rintaro
line: If we can’t send it to a cellphone, then we’ll send it... to a pager!

name: Luka
line: H-hello...

name: Luka
line: Mom had a pager.

name: Mayuri
line: Yay! That’s great, Luka-kun!

line: Now we can proceed with the experiment.

line: Luka-shi’s girl version... will definitely be moe.

line: If you want to grant your wish, then you must open the door with your own hands. We can only show you the way.

name: Luka
line: I understand...

name: Luka
line: Umm...

line: This is a pain. Let’s just send ’831831831’. That should do it.

line: Why 831?

name: Itaru
line: 8(ya) 3(sa) 1(i) for veggies (yasai), duh. VEGGIES VEGGIES VEGGIES -- we just have to drill this into Luka-shi’s mother’s brain.

name: Rintaro
line: She’ll just pass that message off as a prank.

name: Mayuri
line: Then, how about ’29292929’?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m going to regret asking this, but what does that mean?

name: Mayuri
line: Ni(2) ku(9) for meat. MEAT MEAT MEAT MEAT.

name: Rintaro
line: Why do you want her to like meat!?

name: Mayuri
line: That’s not it! If you keep repeating ’MEAT’, then she’ll actually start to hate meat and want to eat vegetables instead, don’t you think?

name: Itaru
line: Yeah... no.

name: Luka
line: How about something like this?

line: ’MOM EAT VEGGIES OK’

name: Itaru
line: Isn’t that a little too vague?

name: Rintaro
line: And the first ’MOM’ should go. That’ll just make it harder to believe.

name: Luka
line: Then... ’EAT LOTS OF VEGGIES TO GIVE BIRTH TO A GIRL’.

line: That’s a little too direct. And it’s over the character limit.

line: ’EAT VEGGIES FOR HEALTHY KID’

line: So that sentence is four bytes over.

line: Then a little modification. How about ’EAT VEG 4 HEALTHY KID’?

name: Kurisu
line: Isn’t that a little too informal? You’re talking to Urushibara-san’s mother, you know? Would she understand the ’VEG 4’ part?

line: You have any bright ideas?

name: Mayuri
line: Come on, let’s type it out!

name: Rintaro
line: Alright, we’re good to go.

name: Rintaro
line: Ready? I’m starting it up.

name: Rintaro
line: Nn...

name: Luka
line: Um, Okabe-san, could you... please not look at me like that?

name: Rintaro
line: It... didn’t work?

name: Mayuri
line: What didn’t work?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you remember? Just now, we used the PhoneWave (name subject to change) to--

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry. It’s nothing.
