line: Christina. I want to ask you something. Is Lukako...

name: Kurisu
line: What pervy act are you thinking about this time? Can’t be too careful around the perv duo.

name: Itaru
line: We’re not a perv duo. We are a pervy gentlemen duo!

name: Kurisu
line: Whatever. Seriously, whatever.

name: Rintaro
line: Muh...

name: Rintaro
line: Daru. What do you think about D-Mail?

name: Itaru
line: It’s cool, but it’s kinda lame at the same time.

name: Rintaro
line: What’s lame about it?

name: Itaru
line: I couldn’t use it to win my RaiNet match against Faris-tan.

name: Rintaro
line: As our experiments have shown, D-Mail still hasn’t reached a reliable level of precision.

name: Rintaro
line: A true time machine must remove luck from the equation. The PhoneWave (name subject to change) is useless unless we can somehow give the sender more control.

name: Itaru
line: Yeah, we aren’t getting results. What about the LOTO SIX?

name: Rintaro
line: Pending.

name: Rintaro
line: Hououin Kyouma will not let this keep him down. I won’t give up. For I am a mad scientist!

name: Itaru
line: I don’t understand what you’re saying, but you sure seem confident about it.

name: Rintaro
line: Someday we will improve the PhoneWave (name subject to change) so that it may be used to send things not only to the past, but also to the future. We’ll improve it. No, we must improve it!

name: Rintaro
line: For that is the choice of Steins Gate! Muhahahaha!

name: Faris
line: A time machine!?

name: Rintaro
line: Damn you, Faris! Eavesdropping is cowardly!

name: Faris
line: What do you mean? Your voice is so loud, it echoes through the whole store nya.

name: Faris
line: Here’s your iced coffee, and your iced tea and ’cat food’. Thanks for waiting, nyan♪

name: Faris
line: Do you want milk and syrup nyan?

name: Rintaro
line: NEVER.

name: Faris
line: If Kyouma’s gonna be like that, I’ll pour it all in nya! You need sugar for a healthy brain, nyan♪

name: Faris
line: Nyan nyan, nyan nyan♪

name: Itaru
line: There it is! Faris-tan’s secret technique, ’Eye Contact Mix-Mix’!

name: Itaru
line: Most maids can’t do it without spilling a little, yet Faris-tan makes it look easy! That’s why I love her!

name: Itaru
line: It’s because of this secret technique that Faris-tan reigns supreme as MayQueen’s number one maid!

name: Itaru
line: Thank you, Faris-tan! I’ll be sure to savor it.

name: Rintaro
line: Do you need something?

name: Faris
line: I wanna hear the rest, nya♪

name: Faris
line: Kyouma and Daru-nyan were having a fun little chit-cat, nya? Something about a time machine.

name: Faris
line: Faris really wants to hear, nyan!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s top secret. Not for outsiders!

name: Faris
line: And whose big mouth let the whole store hear, nya?

name: Faris
line: Tell Faris, Daru-nyan...

name: Itaru
line: We’ve built an amazing machine that can send emails to the past. I did most of the work, of course.

name: Faris
line: Is that a time machine, nya!?

name: Itaru
line: I guess you could say that!

name: Faris
line: Wow! You’re awesome, nya! Your big brain makes my heart race, nyan.

name: Itaru
line: You mean it? N-now I’m embarrassed, hehehe.

name: Faris
line: Faris dreams of going on a journey through time nya.

name: Itaru
line: I’ll bring you along some day.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, don’t make promises you can’t keep.

name: Faris
line: By the way, it’s been bugging me, but what is time anyway, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Faris
line: Time is often compared to a river, nya, flowing from past to future.

name: Faris
line: But is that really how it is, nya?

name: Faris
line: If time is a river, then where is the present, nya? Is it a point? Is it a line? Where does the present begin and end, nya?

name: Itaru
line: Now that you mention it, I only have a vague concept of time. Never gave it any serious thought.

name: Rintaro
line: The present is a leaf floating on the river. It moves along with the flow from past to future.

name: Faris
line: So are we riding on that leaf, nya? When you die, do you fall off, nyan?

name: Rintaro
line: You could say that. All points upstream from the leaf are the past. Downstream, the future.

name: Faris
line: Hmnya...

name: Faris
line: But is that leaf only the present for humans, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Meaning...?

name: Faris
line: Humans make units to define and observe time, which is how we know this leaf is the present.

name: Faris
line: But if every living thing in the universe went extinct, nothing would exist to observe the present, nya.

name: Faris
line: In that case, where would the present go, nya?

name: Itaru
line: Wouldn’t something like God or the will of the universe observe it?

name: Faris
line: But what if God is a four-dimensional being who can freely move through time, nya?

name: Faris
line: If God is the one who decides the present, then won’t our present move with him, nya?

name: Itaru
line: This is hard...

name: Rintaro
line: So what you’re saying is that the present is subjective to the observer.

name: Faris
line: If we go with that assumption, then the past and the future also depend on the observer, nyan.

name: Faris
line: If Faris were to use a time machine to travel back one week, then Kyouma and Daru-nyan’s present would become Faris’s future, nya.

name: Itaru
line: I guess that makes sense...

name: Faris
line: So how does the leaf model reflect that difference, nya?

name: Faris
line: Anyway, if everything depends on the observer, then clocks are meaningless, nyan.

name: Faris
line: Fun times fly, and hard times drag, nya. In other words, the flow of time changes depending on your point of view, nyan.

name: Itaru
line: Speaking of which, as you grow older, it feels like time starts to flow faster, doesn’t it?

name: Rintaro
line: Janet’s law...

name: Faris
line: Faris thinks about this stuff sometimes, nya. I think time might not be something as simple as a river, nyan.

name: Itaru
line: Yeah, the more you think about it, the more complicated it gets.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh. Heh heh heh. Muhahaha!

name: Faris
line: Nyanya?

name: Rintaro
line: Fret not. Though physics and philosophy may deny us, our machine has made time travel possible! Am I correct, Daru!?

name: Itaru
line: Yeah. Yeah! That’s right!

name: Faris
line: Nyaa... looks like you guys have kicked reason to the curb, nya.

name: Faris
line: But Faris wants to use the time machine too, nya. Can I, please?

name: Itaru
line: Sure! I’ll let you use it as much as you want, Faris-tan.

name: Faris
line: Really nya? Then it’s a promise, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, don’t decide things on your own!

name: Kurisu
line: What? You called me all the way to Japan, and now you--

name: Kurisu
line: ...I knew it. You never wanted to see me, did you?

name: Kurisu
line: ...sniff.

name: Kurisu
line: Why did you ask me to come here, then? Can you at least tell me tha--

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yeah?

name: Kurisu
line: I wasn’t crying or anything, okay!?

name: Rintaro
line: No, you were definitely crying.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t be ridiculous! Where’s your proof!?

name: Rintaro
line: Your eyes are red.

name: Kurisu
line: Ugh...

name: Kurisu
line: I wasn’t crying, okay!?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re not being very logical, Christina.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, I wasn’t crying. Understand? End of discussion. Sniff.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina.

name: Kurisu
line: Shut up. Don’t talk to me.

name: Rintaro
line: Listen. You don’t have to talk. Just listen.

name: Rintaro
line: If there’s something troubling you, I’ll do everything in my power to help.

name: Rintaro
line: And it’s not just me. I’m sure I speak for Mayuri and Daru as well.

name: Rintaro
line: So don’t hesitate to come to us.

name: Rintaro
line: When you want to cry, don’t hold it in. Just let it out. We won’t reject you.

name: Rintaro
line: We’ll hear you out.

name: Kurisu
line: Why...

name: Rintaro
line: Because you’re important to us. You’re our friend.

name: Kurisu
line: Ah... yeah...

name: Kurisu
line: ...I’m sorry. I was a little upset.

name: Rintaro
line: You don’t have to tell me if you don’t want to. Just tell me when you’re ready. I’ll hear you out.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Okay.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh. Mayuri, you’re like a housewife burning the midnight oil to bring a little more money home.

name: Mayuri
line: Eh? Midnight oil? Are we eating?

name: Mayuri
line: Besides, Mayushii doesn’t charge for her costumes.

name: Mayuri
line: Hobbies should just be hobbies, you know. It makes me happy to see someone wearing a costume I made♪

name: Rintaro
line: Do you want to become a designer?

name: Mayuri
line: No way. It’s too hard!

name: Rintaro
line: Then what is your dream? Mine is to destroy the System and plunge the world into chaos.

name: Mayuri
line: Um... Mayushii just wants to keep hanging out in the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: What? You want to be a lab mem forever? I appreciate your enthusiasm, but this lab has no interest in profit. You’ll always be hurting for food.

name: Mayuri
line: You know, Okarin, we have six lab mems now. Isnt it amazing? Mayushii never expected we’d grow this big.

name: Mayuri
line: It’s all because Mayushii became your hostage!

name: Rintaro
line: No. That has nothing to do with it. I tricked every last one of you into joining with my masterful manipulations! Muhahaha!

name: Mayuri
line: You shouldn’t say things like that. And besides, you didn’t trick me!

name: Rintaro
line: That’s true. You came of your own volition.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin?

name: Mayuri
line: Can Mayushii still be your hostage?

name: Rintaro
line: Is that what you want?

name: Mayuri
line: Well...

name: Mayuri
line: Maybe it is!

name: Rintaro
line: Such a masochist! I had no idea!

name: Mayuri
line: But I mean, as long as I’m your hostage, Mayushii won’t be lonely, and neither will Okarin. Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: I... I see.

name: Mayuri
line: Ah! I’d better get going.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri.

name: Mayuri
line: Hm?

name: Rintaro
line: Want to get something to eat on the way back? My treat.

name: Mayuri
line: Really? You never treat me.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh, I’m in a good mood today!

name: Mayuri
line: Then how about Kitchen Jiro?

name: Mayuri
line: Their minced cutlet is, um, god tier.

name: Rintaro
line: Just leave it to me.

name: Mayuri
line: Yay! I love you, Okarin♪ Mayushii’s really happy!

name: Rintaro
line: Thanks for coming in on a Saturday. Your devotion to science makes me proud.

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah...

name: Kurisu
line: It’s the middle of summer, but instead of going on vacation, I’m stuck in this sauna with a bunch of pervs.

name: Kurisu
line: Where did I go wrong?

name: Rintaro
line: Wipe your tears, you experiment-loving girl without a single friend.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not crying!

name: Kurisu
line: Besides, you’re the one who told us to be here.

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. But the one who obeyed my orders and arrived on time... was you.

name: Mayuri
line: You know, Chris-chan is actually a very honest and hardworking girl. That’s what Mayushii thinks♪

name: Mayuri
line: That’s what makes her so adorable.

name: Kurisu
line: Eh, wha...!?

name: Kurisu
line: How can this girl say something like that while eating a nugget...

name: Itaru
line: A yuri flag. I get it.

name: Kurisu
line: Please unget it.

name: Mayuri
line: Here, Chris-chan. Have a nugget.

name: Kurisu
line: Th-thanks...

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t put that there. It’s filthy.

name: Rintaro
line: I just washed them!

name: Kurisu
line: Like I care. What kind of guy puts his underwear in a girl’s face? Have some decency.

name: Rintaro
line: If you’re that interested in my underwear, then just say so.

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-wha...!

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not interested at all!

name: Mayuri
line: Come on, guys. No more talking about underwear. Mayushii’s trying to eat here, okay?

name: Itaru
line: How can you say that when you’re still shoveling nuggets into your mouth...

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t interrupt me!

name: Rintaro
line: As I explained to Daru yesterday, I’ve noticed something about the results of our experiments!

name: Rintaro
line: D-Mails have too many uncertain variables. We can never be sure what will happen when we send one.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s not like we can do anything about that. After all, the result is up to whoever receives the mail.

name: Kurisu
line: Of course, if you can analyze the recipient’s psychology, then you might be able to manipulate them into doing what you want.

name: Kurisu
line: Though that might be a bit too much for Hououin Underwear here.

name: Itaru
line: You just wanted to say underwear, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Underwear aside, the fact is that D-Mail is still far from complete.

name: Rintaro
line: And that, ladies and gentlemen, is why I called you here today. The purpose of today’s Round Table Conference is--

name: Itaru
line: Another Round Table?

name: Kurisu
line: If you want a Round Table Conference that much, at least go buy a round table.

name: Mayuri
line: Remember what Okarin said, Chris-chan? The round table is in our hearts.

name: Kurisu
line: Mayuri-san, you’re really innocent. But you shouldn’t take everything Okabe says seriously.

name: Mayuri
line: Really?

name: Rintaro
line: The round table doesn’t matter now. More importantly, the purpose of today’s meeting...

name: Rintaro
line: Is to explore methods of true physical time travel, not just D-Mail, with the objective of sending someone to the past like SERN has.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t be ridiculous.

name: Kurisu
line: SERN has the best equipment in the world, and even after nine years, they still haven’t succeeded.

name: Kurisu
line: We can’t possibly hope to accomplish something like that.

name: Mayuri
line: You’ll become a GelOkarin! Ehehe!

name: Itaru
line: Kinda sounds like Gero Froggy. Why did those things get popular, anyway?

name: Kurisu
line: This isn’t a laughing matter...

name: Rintaro
line: Isn’t it too early to give up? Haven’t we already succeeded with D-Mail, a first in human history?

name: Itaru
line: But we’re not the first. Didn’t SERN do it before us?

name: Rintaro
line: Humanity’s first time-traveling email. For we who have achieved that miracle, nothing is impossible!

name: Kurisu
line: Such baseless confidence. Anyway, wasn’t it just a coincidence that we discovered D-Mail?

name: Kurisu
line: We still haven’t figured out what’s functioning as the lifter.

name: Rintaro
line: We just need to figure that out, don’t we?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s futile.

name: Kurisu
line: How do you solve a problem that even SERN can’t figure out?

name: Kurisu
line: If you can’t set the destination, then you don’t know where you’ll leap to.

name: Itaru
line: I’ll pass on leaping into deep space, thanks.

name: Rintaro
line: Wait a second.

name: Rintaro
line: We don’t set the destination when we send a D-Mail, yet it still arrives where it’s supposed to. How do you explain that?

name: Kurisu
line: Now that you mention it...

name: Itaru
line: You set the mail address, right? Isn’t that enough?

name: Kurisu
line: Is it? I don’t think a phone signal can be received from millions of kilometers away.

name: Mayuri
line: I bet you’d get a busy signal or something!

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe our cellphones are acting like black holes and white holes.

name: Kurisu
line: You shouldn’t speculate like that. You have zero basis.

name: Rintaro
line: Is it possible that we form a wormhole?

name: Kurisu
line: No wormholes have ever been confirmed to exist.

name: Rintaro
line: In any case, the cold, hard truth is that D-Mails arrive precisely when and where we want them to. We’re ahead of SERN in that regard.

name: Rintaro
line: Now, can we apply D-Mail technology to physical time travel?

name: Itaru
line: But with D-Mails, you can only send 36 bytes of data.

name: Itaru
line: No way you can send a whole person with that kind of limit.

name: Kurisu
line: If you want to become GelOkarin, I’m not stopping you.

name: Kurisu
line: It would be best to leave physical transfer aside for now. Sending data through time is an amazing feat by itself. We should be satisfied with what we’ve got.

name: Rintaro
line: Such pessimism is unbecoming of a scientist sworn to uncover the secrets of the universe.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m telling you to know your limits.

name: Kurisu
line: If you’re going to uncover the secrets of the universe, you need personnel, equipment, and funding to rival SERN’s.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s one thing to set lofty goals, but this impoverished lab has no resources to speak of.

name: Kurisu
line: I’ve been thinking. Maybe we should bring the PhoneWave to a proper research institution and entrust it to a specialist.

name: Kurisu
line: SERN’s keeping their time machine research top secret, so if we make an official announcement, it’ll benefit the future of mankind.

name: Rintaro
line: ...If we make an official announcement, the Organization will become aware of my existence.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh come on! I’m being serious here. This isn’t the time for your childish--

name: Rintaro
line: And we’ve hacked into SERN.

name: Rintaro
line: Those heartless bastards will do anything, even experiment on human beings. And behind them is a power greater than all the nations of the Earth.

name: Rintaro
line: If we make the PhoneWave (name subject to change) public, they might have us erased.

name: Kurisu
line: ...You watch too many movies.

name: Rintaro
line: The name ’Committee of 300’ appeared in actual SERN documents.

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah, but...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s kinda scared...

name: Itaru
line: If they find out about our hacking, they’ll seriously have us killed. I didn’t make any mistakes that could give us away, of course.

name: Rintaro
line: Also, and this is the biggest problem--

name: Rintaro
line: If we go public, we won’t be able to do cool stuff with D-Mails anymore!

name: Kurisu
line: Why you...

name: Rintaro
line: Muhahaha! No way I’m giving up such an awesome machine!

name: Rintaro
line: I am Hououin Kyouma! The insane mad scientist who rules space and time! What I desire is -- that’s right -- CHAOS!

name: Kurisu
line: This guy’s hopeless. Better do something quick.

name: Itaru
line: Eh?

name: Rintaro
line: Hm?

name: Mayuri
line: Hwe?

name: Kurisu
line: Ah...

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. Are you an @channe--

name: Kurisu
line: Shut up! I’m not, okay!?

name: Rintaro
line: Th-that reminds me, Daru. Have you made any progress hacking into SERN?

name: Itaru
line: Yeah, right now I’m combing SERN’s massive database.

name: Itaru
line: It would take years to read it all. For now, I’ve passed everything that looks important to Makise-shi for translation.

name: Itaru
line: Basically, I’ve gone as deep as I can go.

name: Itaru
line: SERN belongs to me now.

name: Rintaro
line: Thank goodness you’re on my side.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. Report on the status of these translations.

name: Kurisu
line: Can you stop talking like that? It’s pretentious and annoying as hell.

name: Mayuri
line: Hell☆

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Chris-chan, as Okarin’s childhood friend, I promise you’ll get used to how he talks eventually.

name: Kurisu
line: I just hope it doesn’t take ten years...

name: Rintaro
line: So you’re saying you want to stay with me for ten years? In other words, you want to work at this lab for the rest of your--

name: Kurisu
line: It was sarcasm, get it? Sarcasm.

name: Rintaro
line: Give me your report, Christina. If you don’t, I’ll call you an ’@channeler’--

name: Kurisu
line: Didn’t you hear me the first time!?

name: Kurisu
line: I’ve been working on the translation when I have time, but so far I haven’t seen anything new about time travel.

name: Kurisu
line: It looks like SERN is still struggling to find a solution.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, any other results?

name: Itaru
line: Well, it looks like SERN’s in the middle of a big project, so the LHC’s at full operation.

name: Itaru
line: I’m trying to see if I can cut in and maybe use it secretly.

name: Kurisu
line: What? No way.

name: Mayuri
line: Is that amazing?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s not amazing. It’s downright outrageous!

name: Kurisu
line: Super Hacka, what a monster!

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Christina. Are you doing that on purpose?

name: Kurisu
line: Ugh... d-doing what?

name: Itaru
line: Anyway, I’m just doing it for laughs. It’s not like we have any reason to use the LHC.

name: Rintaro
line: It sounds like things are going smoothly. When do you begin stage three of the operation?

name: Itaru
line: What’s stage three?

name: Rintaro
line: SERN’s most secret, forbidden domain. We’re going to free the darkness hidden inside.

name: Itaru
line: In Japanese please.

name: Rintaro
line: The IBN 5100 database. I’m asking if you’ve started hacking it yet.

name: Itaru
line: We can’t, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: You said all we needed was an IBN 5100 of our own!

name: Itaru
line: Right. That’s the problem. We can’t do anything without one.

name: Rintaro
line: Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: But I got you an IBN 5100. You haven’t started working on it yet?

name: Itaru
line: Huh? You got one? When?

name: Kurisu
line: First I’ve heard of it.

name: Rintaro
line: Impossible!

name: Rintaro
line: ...It’s gone.

name: Rintaro
line: The IBN 5100 was right here! Where did it go!?

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you staring at me like that!? The legendary PC that was donated to Yanabayashi Shrine!! You’ve seen it! Remember!?

name: Mayuri
line: I don’t remember.

name: Itaru
line: Donated to Yanabayashi Shrine? That’s stupid.

name: Kurisu
line: You sure you weren’t hallucinating? It’s hot these days.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t tell me it was John Titor!?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course! Titor’s goal was to obtain an IBN 5100! And I’ve already contacted him several times. But how did he get my personal information!?

name: Kurisu
line: Calm down.

name: Kurisu
line: Tell us what happened. You don’t have to be precise. Just say whatever comes to mind. We can work it out later.

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yeah...

name: Kurisu
line: Hmmm...

name: Kurisu
line: The IBN 5100 may have disappeared as a result of changes someone made to the past.

name: Rintaro
line: Ohh! So you believe me!

name: Kurisu
line: But from my perspective, all of the D-Mails we sent so far were trivial.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, there’s that one we sent when we first realized PhoneWave-chan was a time machine, right?

name: Itaru
line: The one that said ’Okarin is a perv’.

name: Kurisu
line: And during the preliminary D-Mail experiments, I sent dozens to Okabe’s phone. But they were all insubstantial, so I don’t think they could’ve changed the past.

name: Itaru
line: I sent two of them when I was trying to win the match against Faris.

name: Kurisu
line: There was one more. The first mail Okabe accidentally sent that said I was dead.

name: Rintaro
line: But from my perspective, we sent several more.

name: Mayuri
line: You mean how you sent the winning LOTO SIX numbers? And how Luka-chan bought a ticket with those numbers, but didn’t win?

name: Kurisu
line: But nobody aside from Okabe remembers him sending it.

name: Rintaro
line: But I showed you guys afterwards. It was still in my phone’s arrival history.

name: Itaru
line: We were so close.

name: Mayuri
line: Is that all?

name: Rintaro
line: No. There’s more. Moeka and Lukako each sent a D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, right. That’s what you claim, but Hashida, Mayuri-san, and I don’t remember either of those.

name: Mayuri
line: Owww... Mayushii’s getting a headache...

name: Rintaro
line: I already told you guys. I’m the only one who keeps his memories after the world changes.

name: Kurisu
line: So according to your perspective, when did the IBN 5100 disappear? Did it just happen? When’s the last time you remember seeing it in the lab?

name: Rintaro
line: Well...

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sure... it was August 3rd. I remember it being in the lab on August 3rd.

name: Kurisu
line: Are you certain?

name: Rintaro
line: I... think so.

name: Luka
line: Hello, Okabe-san.

name: Luka
line: Um... p-please forget what you saw the other day...

name: Rintaro
line: I saw something?

name: Luka
line: My... cosplay...

name: Rintaro
line: More importantly, I have questions about the IBN 5100.

name: Luka
line: The... eyebeam... five?

name: Rintaro
line: IBN 5100. About nine years ago, someone dedicated a retro PC to Yanabayashi Shrine. That’s the one. Know anything?

name: Luka
line: Y-yes.

name: Rintaro
line: Just a while ago, I came to the shrine looking for it, didn’t I!? And then I asked your old man and he let me borrow it. Right!?

name: Luka
line: I don’t...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Right?

name: Luka
line: I don’t remember anything like that...

name: Rintaro
line: The IBN 5100 was at the shrine though, right? Is it there now?

name: Luka
line: Um... I don’t know the details...

name: Rintaro
line: Where are you now? Is your old man there?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Damn. Okay. Sorry for calling you so suddenly.

name: Luka
line: N-no problem. I’m sorry that I couldn’t help..

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri, I need to contact Faris.

name: Mayuri
line: Hweh?

name: Mayuri
line: Want one, Okarin? They’re delicious♪

name: Rintaro
line: You people don’t have a care in the world, do you!? There’s some crazy stuff happening here!

name: Kurisu
line: Or it could all just be in your head. No need to panic.

name: Mayuri
line: You need Feris-chan for something? I wonder if she’s working today.

name: Itaru
line: Faris-tan’s off today.

name: Rintaro
line: You know her phone number, right? See if you can get ahold of her.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay!

name: Mayuri
line: Feris-chan? Good afternyan-nyan♪ It’s Mayushii, nyan♪

name: Kurisu
line: Nya, nyan...?

name: Mayuri
line: Sorry to bother you on your day off. Okarin said he wants to talk to you about something. Wanna talk to him?

name: Mayuri
line: Huh? You know. Okarin!

name: Mayuri
line: ...Kyouma? Who’s Kyouma?

name: Mayuri
line: I’m handing you over, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: Here you go, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Hououin Kyouma.

name: Faris
line: Nyao♪ How unusual for Kyouma to contact me, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: There’s something I need to ask you.

name: Rintaro
line: Long ago, you donated a retro PC to Yanabayashi shrine. Am I mistaken?

name: Faris
line: Nyan.

name: Rintaro
line: What? What’s ’nyan’ supposed to mean, nya?

name: Faris
line: It means you’re right, nya. Though I didn’t know it was called the IBN 5100 until recently, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: What? Why recently?

name: Faris
line: Daru-nyan told me, nya.

name: Faris
line: So what about the retro PC, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, nothing...

name: Rintaro
line: Do you have any other information on the IBN 5100? It’s a super rare PC.

name: Rintaro
line: As a charisma-build maid, I expect you have a strong network in Akiba, correct? I’d like you to use that network and search for any IBN 5100s in Akiba now.

name: Faris
line: Hmnya...

name: Faris
line: I can look. But for a price, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: A price?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Let’s hear it.

name: Faris
line: I want you to come over to Faris’s apartment, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: Where is this apartment of yours?

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, so you live in Akiba.

name: Faris
line: I’ll be waiting, nyan♪

name: Rintaro
line: ...Well?

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you guys tagging along?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s never been to Feris-chan’s place.

name: Mayuri
line: I thought I’d like to visit once. Hehe♪

name: Itaru
line: I mean, it’s Faris-tan’s home. No way I’m missing this.

name: Rintaro
line: Mmm...?

name: Mayuri
line: What’s wrong?

name: Rintaro
line: What luck!

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Shining Finger!

name: Moeka
line: Gonegonegone... why is it gone... why can’t I find it... is it really in this town... don’t tell me it’s already...

name: Rintaro
line: Are you listening, Shining Finger!?

name: Moeka
line: It should be... should be here... has to be... FB said so...

name: Rintaro
line: Kiryu Moeka!

name: Moeka
line: ...Okabe-kun?

name: Rintaro
line: Did you take the IBN 5100 from the lab?

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t want to believe that it was you. You are a fellow lab mem, after all. But you did display an unhealthy attachment to that computer.

name: Rintaro
line: So, was it you?

name: Moeka
line: You... found an IBN 5100?

name: Rintaro
line: I found one, but it’s gone missing.

name: Moeka
line: Missing?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. I won’t report you to the police. As long as you return it, that is.

name: Rintaro
line: You... don’t remember, do you?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry, Finger.

name: Rintaro
line: I suspected you. A lab mem! A comrade!

name: Rintaro
line: I’m the worst sort of man. Hit me, please. I don’t mind.

name: Rintaro
line: But there’s one thing I want you to know. In my long years running from the Organization, I’ve grown unable to trust anyone.

name: Rintaro
line: Once I start to suspect, everyone looks suspicious. No matter how many comrades gather around me, I always feel alone. Pitiful, aren’t I?

name: Rintaro
line: D-did you just ignore my entire speech?

name: Itaru
line: Hey, Okarin. You’re doing improv in the middle of the street. Has the heat gone to your head?

name: Mayuri
line: I’ve been thinking...

name: Mayuri
line: Moeka-san sure is pretty, isn’t she? She’s got a nice figure, and she’s tall, too!

name: Mayuri
line: She’d look great in one of my costumes. Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: Wh...at?

name: Rintaro
line: You’ve met Moeka before?

name: Mayuri
line: Sure I have!

name: Rintaro
line: When!?

name: Mayuri
line: Ummmmm?

name: Mayuri
line: When youuuuu brouuuught herrrr toooo theeee laaaaab!

name: Rintaro
line: I did...?

name: Rintaro
line: Daru. Do you remember her?

name: Itaru
line: Sure. We met at the lab.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? We need to get going. Faris-chan’s waiting, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, Mayuri. What’s Faris’s real name?

name: Itaru
line: Whoa, Okarin! Hold on there! Faris-tan’s name is Faris NyanNyan. She doesn’t have any other names!

name: Rintaro
line: Face reality, Daru. Faris NyanNyan is just her professional name.

name: Itaru
line: Uwahh, you’re the worst! Why do you have to crush my dreams like that, man?

name: Rintaro
line: Well, Mayuri? Don’t you know?

name: Mayuri
line: Hmmm, is it okay for Mayushii to tell you?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not like you took a vow of secrecy, right? And besides, we’re visiting her home, so we’ll find out soon enough.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh. I guess you’re right...

name: Mayuri
line: But just promise me you’ll keep it secret, okay? Like from the masters who come to MayQueen.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay. Feris-chan’s real name is Akiha Rumiho-chan!

name: Itaru
line: Nyah nyah nyah, not listening!

name: Rintaro
line: Akiha...

name: Mayuri
line: Waahh... awwwesome...

name: Itaru
line: Wait... seriously?

name: Rintaro
line: She lives... here?

name: Rintaro
line: Did we get the wrong address?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t tell me Faris is working for the Organization!?

name: Rintaro
line: Does she have men in black waiting to haul us off to a re-education camp!?

name: Itaru
line: Nice delusion, man. The truth is stranger than fiction.

name: Itaru
line: Besides, don’t you think it would be super moe if Faris-tan turned out to be a ’rich girl’ character?

name: Rintaro
line: Nice delusion yourself, man.

name: Mayuri
line: Anyway, let’s go in!

name: Mayuri
line: A real live butler...

name: Butler
line: Mistress. Mr.Hououin Kyouma and friends have arrived.

name: Faris
line: Thanks, Kuroki nya.

name: Faris
line: Nyanya? Mayushii and Daru-nyan came too, nyan?

name: Mayuri
line: Feris-chan, good afternyan-nyan♪

name: Itaru
line: Mhmm, casual Faris-tan... too cute!

name: Rintaro
line: They followed me. If you don’t want them here, I’ll send them home.

name: Faris
line: No fur off my back, nya. Everyone’s welcome nyan♪

name: Rintaro
line: Wait, you talk like that even in your own home?

name: Faris
line: What do you mean, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Gonna play dumb, Akiha Rumiho?

name: Faris
line: Faris is Faris, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: Fine. What I really want to know is how you get to live in a luxury apartment in Akiba’s best district!

name: Rintaro
line: Faris... just who are you?

name: Faris
line: Like I said, Faris is Faris, nyan.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t play dumb. If you don’t explain yourself, I’m leaving!

name: Itaru
line: H-how arrogant... we’re the ones who came here to ask Faris-tan for a favor, aren’t we?

name: Faris
line: Hmmya... Well, if you must know...

name: Faris
line: This land originally belonged to my family, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: Hah?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh! So that’s why you’re Akiha-san!

name: Rintaro
line: Akiha... You mean you’re descended from the hereditary landholders of Akihabara!?

name: Faris
line: By the way, Faris has considerable influence on Akihabara’s development, nyan.

name: Faris
line: It was Faris who convinced the development board to actively promote moe culture in Akiba, nya.

name: Mayuri
line: Wow! That’s amazing!

name: Faris
line: I’ve been going to development meetings since I was little, nya.

name: Faris
line: But please keep all this a secret, nyan.

name: Rintaro
line: Why?

name: Faris
line: You wanna know, nya?

name: Faris
line: That’s because...

name: Faris
line: Faris is Faris, nya♪

name: Faris
line: I want all my fans to keep treating me the same as always, nyan☆

name: Itaru
line: I’ll treat you! I’ll treat you at full force!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s your fan too! Your maid spirit is really amazing!

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t care about any of this!

name: Rintaro
line: Do not defy me, Faris NyanNyan, or I’ll paint your expensive wallpaper with blood.

name: Rintaro
line: You called me to your home so you could show off your status and try to gain leverage in our negotiations. But it’s futile.

name: Rintaro
line: For you are dealing with the insane mad scientist, Hououin Kyouma!

name: Itaru
line: What kind of reason is that...

name: Faris
line: Nyan♪ Faris loves forceful men, nyan.

name: Itaru
line: What... did she say?

name: Faris
line: Honestly, Faris didn’t want to talk so much about herself, nya.

name: Faris
line: Most people, when they learn who I am, stop seeing me as Faris, nya. They only see the Akiha name.

name: Faris
line: Faris and Akiha Rumiho want to be seen as separate purrsons, nya.

name: Rintaro
line: There’s nothing to separate. You are Faris NyanNyan, are you not?

name: Faris
line: Nya?

name: Itaru
line: For once I agree with you, Okarin! Whenever she speaks NyanNyanian and wears her cat ears, she is Faris-tan!

name: Rintaro
line: You’re just being overly self-conscious, Faris.

name: Faris
line: I don’t know, nya...

name: Rintaro
line: I’m serious. To me, you will always be the unbeatable cat-eared maid!

name: Faris
line: Nyahaha. Thanks, Kyouma.

name: Rintaro
line: Faris, you said there would be a price to pay in exchange for your help acquiring an IBN 5100. What is your price?

name: Rintaro
line: Do not test the limits of my good will.

name: Rintaro
line: If I unseal my right arm for even an instant, everything will be destroyed, and nothing will remain... just so you know.

name: Faris
line: Fine by me, nya.

name: Faris
line: These cat ears have the power to negate all other powers -- NyanNyan Clear.

name: Faris
line: When Kyouma’s power is unleashed, Faris will stop it, nya.

name: Faris
line: Well, I guess I’ll tell you, nya.

name: Faris
line: My price...

name: Faris
line: Is to let me use your time machine, nya.

name: Faris
line: I heard what you said at MayQueen yesterday. You’ve built a time machine.

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. We have created the first successful time machine in human history.

name: Itaru
line: Uh, SERN was the first.

name: Rintaro
line: But don’t misunderstand.

name: Rintaro
line: We call it a time machine, but it’s not the kind you can hop into and fly to whenever you want.

name: Rintaro
line: All we can do is send a 36-byte email to someone’s phone in the past.

name: Rintaro
line: But even that is worthy of a Nobel Prize in physics. It is a transcendental super invention that will alter the course of human history forever.

name: Faris
line: It can send an email to someone in the past? That’s awesome! Faris wants to use it, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: The time machine is our lab’s greatest secret. If you want to use it, then you must become a lab mem.

name: Faris
line: A lab mem? What’s that, nya?

name: Mayuri
line: Well, it means you get to be a part of our club♪ Mayushii would be super happy if Feris-chan became a lab mem!

name: Itaru
line: Same here!

name: Itaru
line: That would be AWWWWWRIGHT!

name: Itaru
line: Please join! I’m begging here!

name: Faris
line: How do I become a lab mem, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: There’s no contract. We only require that you perform... the blood oath.

name: Faris
line: The... blood oath!!

name: Rintaro
line: Faris NyanNyan, if thou dost desire to join the hallowed order of lab mems, then by the code passed down in High Ancient from an age long forgotten...

name: Rintaro
line: Pledge thy flesh, thy bone, thy blood, and thy soul to the Grail of Heaven, and swear fealty everlasting!

name: Rintaro
line: This duty fulfilled, the old gods shall grant thee thy lab mem number.

name: Itaru
line: I didn’t understand a word of that...

name: Mayuri
line: Oh no! What do I do? Mayushii never ate any blood loaf. Does that mean Mayushii’s not a lab mem?

name: Itaru
line: Don’t worry, Mayu-shi. This is just Okarin’s usual nonsense.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh! I guess everything’s fine then♪ Thank goodness!

name: Faris
line: Very well, nya. I shall take the blood oath, nya...

name: Mayuri
line: No!

name: Itaru
line: Uh, isn’t that a paper knife?

name: Faris
line: Nyahaha♪ Daru-nyan’s right, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: Very well, Faris, I invest you as Lab Mem 007.

name: Faris
line: Purrfect. So now can I use the time machine, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Indeed. But not a word to anyone. Death to traitors. That’s the law of the lab.

name: Mayuri
line: It is?

name: Itaru
line: No. Okarin made it up just now.

name: Faris
line: Thanks, Kyouma!

name: Itaru
line: Okarin, you jerk! I helped make the PhoneWave too!

name: Faris
line: Really nya? Then Daru-nyan too!

name: Mayuri
line: I’m glad she’s so happy, Okarin♪

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... Mayuri, you really are innocent.

name: Mayuri
line: Hweh?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. ...Yeah, I’ve got her wrapped around my finger. What did you expect? She’s just a 17-year-old girl.

name: Rintaro
line: That catgirl thinks she’s bargained with me to appease her lust for mankind’s dream, the forbidden fruit that is the time machine.

name: Rintaro
line: But she’s dancing to the tune of Hououin Kyouma!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hmph, why did I agree to pay her price, you ask? That should be obvious.

name: Rintaro
line: That catgirl shall be our guinea pig.

name: Rintaro
line: ...I’m a monster? What a terrible thing to say. Not that you’re wrong, exactly. Heh heh heh.

name: Rintaro
line: Right. Faris thinks she’s using us...

name: Rintaro
line: But it is we who are using her! She is but a moth drawn to my brilliant flame. Muhahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: As planned, we are proceeding to the next phase of the experiment. This is the choice of Steins Gate. El Psy Kongroo.

name: Rintaro
line: Mmgh!?

name: Faris
line: Who were you talking to, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s too late, Faris NyanNyan.

name: Rintaro
line: You’ve already taken the blood oath. If you break it, ruin will befall you.

name: Rintaro
line: There is no escape.

name: Faris
line: Ok, nya. So where’s the time machine, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: The time machine -- its name is the PhoneWave (name subject to change), by the way -- is in our lab.

name: Mayuri
line: Umm, so does that mean it has to keep going for 86,000 seconds?

name: Mayuri
line: Won’t PhoneWave-chan get tired?

name: Rintaro
line: It doesn’t actually have to run the entire duration.

name: Rintaro
line: The mail reaches the past if you send it as soon as the discharge begins.

name: Rintaro
line: In accordance with the Butterfly Effect, the remaining seconds should be canceled out. The experiment never happened.

name: Kurisu
line: Hallo.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. What’s the situation?

name: Rintaro
line: She hung up on me!

name: Itaru
line: Of course she did. Mayu-shi and I are the only ones who can deal with your act, you know?

name: Kurisu
line: Hallo.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s Hououin Kyouma. Don’t hang up.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, it’s Okabe. I was sure it was a prank call.

name: Rintaro
line: It shows you my number, doesn’t it!?

name: Kurisu
line: You were talking crazy, so I got scared and hung up.

name: Rintaro
line: In other words, you fear the insanity of Hououin Kyouma! Well, I suppose you can’t be blamed for--

name: Rintaro
line: She hung up! Again!

name: Itaru
line: Like I said, we’re the only ones who can put up with you...

name: Kurisu
line: Hallo.

name: Rintaro
line: This is Okabe Rintaro. Sorry, but could you mess with the PhoneWave (name subject to change)’s settings a little, please?

name: Kurisu
line: Well why didn’t you say so?

name: Kurisu
line: Hmm... you’re going to use the PhoneWave? I don’t want to anger the guy downstairs, though.

name: Rintaro
line: We’re about to perform a critical experiment. Understand, assistant? Mister Braun might yell at you, but that small sacrifice will bring mankind’s dream, the time machine, to fruition.

name: Kurisu
line: You’re really irresponsible, you know that?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Well? What should I set it to?

name: Kurisu
line: Okay, it’s ready.

name: Rintaro
line: Alright, thanks. Wait a bit.

name: Rintaro
line: Finished writing what you want to send?

name: Rintaro
line: What did you write? You sure it’s something that’ll change the past?

name: Faris
line: W-well...

name: Faris
line: I-it’s embarrassing, nya! A trade secret, nyan!

name: Rintaro
line: A secret!? Nonsense! This is science! Unless we know what you’re sending, we can’t verify the results!

name: Faris
line: What’s that supposed to mean!? No one said anything about science, nya! I’m using the time machine for myself, not science, nya!

name: Rintaro
line: That’s not fair!

name: Itaru
line: You’re one to talk.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, Okabe. How long are you gonna make me wait?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Okarin, it’s probably something private, so I don’t think you should pry...

name: Rintaro
line: Mmmgh...

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe? If you’re not gonna send anything, I’m hanging up.

name: Rintaro
line: W-wait! Fine. Activate the PhoneWave (name subject to change).

name: Kurisu
line: The discharge is starting.

name: Faris
line: Click, nya!

name: Itaru
line: Okay. Card Open.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh no! Another Virus Card!

name: Faris
line: Not so fast, nyan♪

name: Mayuri
line: Awww... You took three Link Cards, right? And I got three Virus Cards, right?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s in trouble...

name: Itaru
line: We still have a Terminal Card. We can turn the tables next turn.

name: Faris
line: Nyahaha♪ It’s way too late for that, nya. Faris is going to use the Terminal Card, Virus Checker, nya.

name: Faris
line: So, which is Mayushii’s last Virus Card, nya?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh no...

name: Itaru
line: You’re a monster, Faris-tan.

name: Mayuri
line: H-hey, could you wait one... no, two or three turns, nya? Please, nya?

name: Faris
line: Nyaha♪ Not even if you try to copycat Faris, nyan.

name: Mayuri
line: No way!

name: Mayuri
line: Phew... Feris-chan is really strong.

name: Faris
line: Mayushii started out strong, nya. You have potential, nyan.

name: Faris
line: But don’t think I’ll go easy on you just because we’re playing for fun, nyan!

name: Faris
line: Besides, I promised Papa that I’d win the next tournyament, nya! I can’t lose to anyone before then, nyan!

name: Mayuri
line: Papa?

name: Faris
line: Papa said that if Faris won, he’d take time off work to congratulate me, nyan.

name: Itaru

line: Yeah.

name: Mayuri
line: Yup!

name: Itaru
line: Buy me one too.

name: Mayuri

name: Mayuri
line: Nope.

name: Rintaro

name: Itaru
line: The hell’s that?

line: They sell doujinshi at Akiba-o?

line: Of course not. That would be crazy.

name: Rintaro
line: Gamers!? Ramutara!?

name: Rintaro
line: MelonBooks!? Asobit City!?

name: Rintaro
line: Chaos has forsaken this place...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s gone...

line: What the hell?

name: Mayuri
line: Good morning, Okarin♪

name: Rintaro
line: What are you doing?

line: It is!

name: Mayuri
line: Take a look, Chris-chan! It’s amazing!

name: Kurisu
line: I’m okay.

name: Mayuri
line: Wow, look at these swimsuits! So much skin! She’s got a great figure, like a gravure idol.

line: Must be nice...

name: Mayuri
line: Nice? The swimsuits?

name: Luka
line: I... don’t have that great a figure...

name: Mayuri
line: Don’t worry, Luka-chan. I’m sure you’ll make our big friends breathe hard.

name: Mayuri
line: And um, plenty of people like flat chests. So even if you don’t have breasts, you should still have confidence in yourself.

name: Kurisu
line: Khmmkhmmkhmm!

name: Mayuri
line: I know! Once ComiMa’s over, let’s all go on a trip to the beach! Mayushii’s been making costumes all summer. I haven’t had time to play at all.

name: Mayuri
line: What do you think, guys? A lab mem beach trip!

name: Luka
line: Um... all of the lab mems?

name: Kurisu
line: I can’t go. I have to go back to America soon, and I haven’t even started packing yet.

name: Rintaro
line: Yes, I can see you’re in a rush. I bet you don’t even have time to lounge around and read.

name: Kurisu
line: Fine, I’ll be blunt. There’s no way I’m swimming with two perverts like you!

name: Kurisu
line: If it’s just the girl members, I’ll happily go.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph. Be honest, Christina. You just don’t want me to see the Mongolian Spot on your butt!

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t have a Mongolian Spot!

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, if it’s just the girl members, then doesn’t that rule out Lukako?

name: Kurisu
line: What’s that supposed to mean?

name: Rintaro
line: Didn’t we tell you earlier? Lukako is a bonafide guy!

name: Kurisu
line: You’re the worst. Where do you get off calling her a guy?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah, Okarin. That’s a terrible thing to say.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. I understand your desire to deny the truth. It’s difficult to imagine that a guy could ever be so cute, but--

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe!

name: Kurisu
line: If you want to give me stupid nicknames, that’s fine -- I mean, it’s not, but...

name: Kurisu
line: What you said just now is below the belt.

name: Kurisu
line: I didn’t take you for the kind of guy who thinks it’s funny to hurt people’s feelings, but I guess I was wrong. You’re a real jerk, Okabe.

name: Rintaro
line: Huh?

name: Kurisu
line: Apologize. Apologize to Urushibara-san right now.

name: Rintaro
line: Wait a second. I don’t have to apologize for anything. I just said the tru--

name: Luka
line: It’s okay.

name: Luka
line: So that’s how Okabe-san sees me...

name: Rintaro
line: No no no! That’s not how I see you, Lukako. You’re a guy, remember!? Or are you denying reality too!?

name: Kurisu
line: You’re the one denying reality!

name: Mayuri
line: That’s right! Luka-chan’s a girl, Okarin. You’re terrible.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri, when did you start calling Lukako ’Luka-chan’ instead of ’Luka-kun’?

name: Kurisu
line: Cut it out already, Okabe! She’s a girl!

name: Luka
line: I’m going home!

name: Rintaro
line: Hold it, Lukako! You can’t fool me! You’re as much a man as I am! And I know how to prove it!

name: Luka
line: ah...

name: Kurisu
line: You...

name: Mayuri
line: Awawa...

name: Rintaro
line: Ohhhh? Huh? What? Why?

name: Luka
line: Ugh, no, don’t... Okabe-san, please... stop... sniff.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, you...

name: Rintaro
line: You’re a girl!?

name: Kurisu
line: That’s what we’ve been saying!

name: Luka
line: hic... ugg... egh...

name: Kurisu
line: I want to vivisect your skull and remove your brain for a good washing.

name: Kurisu
line: Then I’ll submerge it in culture fluid so you can never do anything like that again!

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, just be thankful I haven’t reported you to the police.

name: Rintaro
line: Yes ma’am. I’m sorry.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, what in the hell made you think that Urushibara-san was a boy?

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... as I already explained, we changed the past. Lukako was a guy, but he wanted to be a girl, so we sent a D-Mail to make his wish come true. And it worked!

name: Rintaro
line: I knew the worldline had changed. My magic eye, Reading Steiner, saw the shift in time.

name: Rintaro
line: But I chose to believe my mundane senses instead. I should have had more faith in my powers! I won’t make that mistake again.

name: Kurisu
line: Want some more?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m telling the truth. You have to believe me!

name: Rintaro
line: I can explain this phenomenon logically. When we sent the D-Mail, we changed the past, and all of history changed as a result. My brain perceived that change!

name: Rintaro
line: Out of all mankind, I alone can perceive changes in causality! I am this world’s observer!

name: Kurisu
line: Sit down before I hit you again.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you understand? I’m the observer, the one who opens the box holding Schrodinger’s cat.

name: Mayuri
line: Shredding Gar?

name: Itaru
line: Schrodinger’s cat again?

name: Itaru
line: The Japanese can’t get enough of that cat.

name: Kurisu
line: You’re Japanese too.

name: Itaru
line: I’ve had enough Schrodinger, thanks. I do admit that kittehs are cute, though.

name: Rintaro
line: Gh...

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, my magic eye has the power to perceive changes in the worldline. This power is called Reading Steiner, as I’ve explained.

name: Kurisu
line: And I told you that that name was stupid, remember?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s Engrish, like something from a kid’s manga.

name: Kurisu
line: Not to mention it’s a grammatical mess, and there’s also the fact that it’s half German, so no consistency there either. It’s stupid.

name: Kurisu
line: The same goes for that ’Steins Gate’ thing you’re always talking about.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... looks like you’ve still got that Mongolian Spot on your butt. Eh, Christina?

name: Rintaro
line: Names are all about feeling! My creativity, comparable to the great Da Vinci himself, cannot be held by the shackles of grammar! Muhah--

name: Kurisu
line: Show a little remorse, huh?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry...

name: Suzuha
line: ...Sup.

name: Suzuha
line: Why are you so wobbly?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s... a new exercise.

name: Suzuha
line: Huh. Never heard of it.

name: Suzuha
line: Perfect weather for cycling.

name: Rintaro
line: Really?

name: Suzuha
line: Hey, up for a little cycling?

name: Rintaro
line: Your bike only has one seat.

name: Suzuha
line: One of us can sit on the back.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you have work to do?

name: Suzuha
line: I got permission. It’s not like we’ll have customers anyway.

name: Rintaro
line: Huff... huff... I am a mad scientist... not a mad... cyclist...

name: Rintaro
line: Huff... huff... so why... am I... doing the pedaling?

name: Suzuha
line: Long ago, Aristotle said, ’time is just the measure of motion.’

name: Suzuha
line: So put those pedals in motion.

name: Suzuha
line: You know...

name: Suzuha
line: It’s only been ten days since I arrived in Tokyo.

name: Rintaro
line: Vacation? No... that can’t be right.

name: Suzuha
line: I’m hunting for my father.

name: Rintaro
line: Did he run away?

name: Suzuha
line: I haven’t seen him in years. But I know he’s in this town.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh... but then why are you working downstairs?

name: Suzuha
line: Honestly, I don’t have a clue where to begin.

name: Rintaro
line: Have you talked to the police?

name: Rintaro
line: Then shouldn’t you? Or you could hire a private investigator or something, if you have money.

name: Suzuha
line: I don’t have the resources. And besides, there are... issues.

name: Suzuha
line: I only have one chance.

name: Suzuha
line: And that chance is tomorrow.

name: Suzuha
line: I know that tomorrow, he might appear in a certain place.

name: Suzuha
line: If I miss that chance, then I’ll have to leave.

name: Rintaro
line: By leave, you mean go back home?

name: Suzuha
line: Not exactly. I have a parallel, priority engagement.

name: Suzuha
line: I’ve already made up my mind. I don’t find him tomorrow, I’ll give up.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re worried, aren’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: I understand that feeling. You’re alone, searching for your father in an unfamiliar town. It can’t be easy.

name: Rintaro
line: You hoped that talking to someone would help. That’s why you sought out the most reliable person around -- me.

name: Rintaro
line: Alas, Part-Time Warrior, you have made a grave mistake. For I am the insane mad scientist Hououin Kyouma!

name: Suzuha
line: Uh...

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... you shall be my next guinea pig!

name: Suzuha
line: Guinea pig?

name: Rintaro
line: You know what I’m talking about. D-Mail, the greatest discovery in the history of science!

name: Rintaro
line: You shall be the subject of our next experiment. Heh heh heh.

name: Suzuha
line: Wh-what are you gonna do?

name: Rintaro
line: Do? Simple. I need more data, and I’ll do anything to obtain it.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re going to change the past. You can change it however you like, but only I will know the difference!

name: Rintaro
line: If you think that’s cruel, then do as you please. But know that you are already caught in my web. You cannot escape.

name: Rintaro
line: Fear not! I know exactly what you should write in your D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... listen well. You’re going to send this to your father before he disappeared.

name: Rintaro
line: ’Don’t abandon your daughter.’ Muhahahaha!

name: Suzuha
line: ...You’re a nice guy. You know that?

name: Rintaro
line: Wh...at?

name: Suzuha
line: I think talking to you really did help.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you trying to insult me? I am not a nice guy. I am a mad scientist who experiments on women and children!

name: Rintaro
line: Now tell me your father’s email address! If you don’t...

name: Rintaro
line: Then I shall unleash the power of my right arm! Once it’s unsealed, not even I can control it. You may not survive. Consider yourself warned.

name: Suzuha
line: Sorry. I can’t.

name: Rintaro
line: You dare defy me!?

name: Suzuha
line: I don’t know his email address or his phone number.

name: Suzuha
line: That’s why tomorrow’s my only chance. Thanks for caring, though.

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t care. I’m just disappointed I couldn’t experiment on you.

name: Suzuha
line: Anyway, you can send mail to the past? That’s amazing! The first time machine ever!

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph, of course it’s amazing. I am Hououin Kyouma!

name: Suzuha
line: Any plans to upgrade it?

name: Rintaro
line: Upgrade it?

name: Suzuha
line: You know, like sending people to the past or something.

name: Rintaro
line: We’re working on it.

name: Suzuha
line: Then let me give you one word of advice.

name: Suzuha
line: You should leave Makise Kurisu out of it.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you have against her, anyway?

name: Suzuha
line: Welp. Better get back to the workshop.

name: Suzuha
line: I only got a 30-minute break. I’ll get in trouble if I don’t get back soon.

name: Rintaro
line: Come to the lab tomorrow, whether you meet your father or not.

name: Suzuha
line: Why?

name: Rintaro
line: So I can use your grief to power my time machine. Heh heh heh!

name: Suzuha
line: Ahaha! You really are a mad scientist. So eeeevil!

name: Suzuha
line: If I meet my father, I’ll stop by. Then we can do a gun salute!

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, wait! Let me on! Hey!

name: Rintaro
line: I shall now brief you on Operation Eldhrimnir.

name: Rintaro
line: I want you guys to get ready for a party.

name: Kurisu
line: And what are you going to do?

name: Rintaro
line: Me? I’m going to follow that Part-Time Warrior and report back as the situation changes.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t you dare. Let her be alone with her father.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh. You shouldn’t be so quick to reject my plans, Christina. You don’t understand the intricacies of the human psyche.

name: Rintaro
line: Now that you’ve rejected my plan, there’s no way I’m not going through with it! You have underestimated my pride!

name: Kurisu
line: Get over yourself.

name: Rintaro
line: Besides, Christina, you and she are enemies, are you not? You protect her from me while plotting her demise? That makes you a hypocrite!

name: Kurisu
line: You just don’t have standards, that’s all.

name: Mayuri
line: She’s right. I don’t think you should bother her, Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: No matter what happens, we need to give her a waaaarm welcome. I’ll do anything to help make this party super special.

name: Luka
line: Um, actually, I haven’t met this Suzuha-san...

name: Mayuri
line: Suzu-san’s really nice. I’m sure you’ll get along with her too!

name: Kurisu
line: Nice?

name: Rintaro
line: Anyway, I’m going to tail her now. You guys--

name: Kurisu
line: No! Get it through your thick skull!

name: Rintaro
line: Dammit, assistant! How dare you give me orders!?

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t even think about running off somewhere.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway...

name: Kurisu
line: I hope Amane-san finds her father.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah.

name: Kurisu
line: That would be... nice.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, Okabe...

name: Kurisu
line: I’m sorry about before.

name: Rintaro
line: Before?

name: Kurisu
line: When I hit you with my book. I thought you were just being a pervert.

name: Kurisu
line: But when I thought about it later, I realized that you were being completely serious.

name: Kurisu
line: But I acted on impulse, without even considering what you had to say.

name: Rintaro
line: Forget it. Regardless of my intentions, the fact of the matter is that I made Lukako cry.

name: Kurisu
line: Just to make sure, you’re not a perverted scumbag, are you?

name: Rintaro
line: Make sure, my ass! Are you trying to apologize or what!?

name: Kurisu
line: I just don’t want to you to use science as an excuse to be a pervert. Not while I’m helping, at least.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you take me for?

name: Rintaro
line: My friends are precious to me.

name: Rintaro
line: I may be an insane mad scientist with an IQ of 170, but even I have my limits.

name: Rintaro
line: The PhoneWave (name subject to change) wouldn’t have come this far without you and Daru at my side.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe...

name: Rintaro
line: I am Lab Mem 001, the founder of the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: If my friends are in danger, I’ll rush to their aid. And I would tear my own limbs off before I knowingly brought harm to any of you.

name: Kurisu
line: Pff...

name: Rintaro
line: What’s so funny?

name: Kurisu
line: That has to be the cheesiest thing you’ve ever said.

name: Rintaro
line: Hmph...

name: Kurisu
line: Still, it’s nice to hear.

name: Kurisu
line: The research institute I work at in America is full of talented people from all over the world... but it’s not a friendly place.

name: Kurisu
line: Everyone thinks he or she is the best. You think you have an ego? Over there, scientists hurl insults at each other on a daily basis. Sometimes they even sabotage each other’s work.

name: Kurisu
line: When my thesis was chosen to represent the lab, many of the older men complained.

name: Kurisu
line: And when I came back here as a kind of reverse exchange student, my classmates were all too afraid to talk to me.

name: Kurisu
line: Compared to that, your lab is childish... but comfortable.

name: Kurisu
line: You’re really concerned about Amane-san, aren’t you? That part of you, I can respect.

name: Kurisu
line: B-but I’m not praising you, okay?

name: Kurisu
line: I just... you know... thought you should know...

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe I...

name: Kurisu
line: Eh?

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe all I ever wanted was friends.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe...

name: Rintaro
line: There aren’t many people I can trust...

name: Kurisu
line: I, um... think of you as a friend too.

name: Rintaro
line: ...What?

name: Kurisu
line: You said I was your friend, remember? You said I was important to you.

name: Kurisu
line: That made me really... happy, I guess.

name: Rintaro
line: Do you have a fever?

name: Kurisu
line: No!

name: Kurisu
line: What the hell!? Here I am trying to find something decent about you, and you... I don’t care anymore, stupid!

name: Kurisu
line: You’re really... stupid.

name: Kurisu
line: Huh? Over there, isn’t that...

name: Rintaro
line: Found you, Daru!

name: Itaru
line: Huh? Ah--

name: Rintaro
line: Why didn’t you respond to my summons?

name: Itaru
line: Like I said, I’ve got something to do.

name: Rintaro

name: Itaru
line: An offline meet...

name: Rintaro
line: Inexcusable.

name: Itaru
line: Wait, just listen a sec--

line: Your offline meet, or a party with food handmade by our very own lab girls. Choose one.

name: Itaru
line: Handmade... by girls?

name: Itaru
line: O-one question. Will Faris-tan be there?

line: Naturally. Faris is a lab mem too. Heh heh heh.

name: Itaru
line: Dammit! Why do they have to be on the same day!? Can’t it wait until tomorrow?

name: Rintaro
line: What will it be? The time to choose is now.

name: Itaru
line: I want to eat Faris-tan’s home cooking...

name: Itaru
line: I give up. I give up the offline meeeet!

line: Huh? Daru-kun’s here too?

name: Itaru
line: What about Faris-tan? Where is she?

name: Kurisu

line: Feris-chan said she couldn’t come.

name: Itaru
line: Wait, seriously!? Okarin! What’s going on here!? This isn’t funny, man!

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. I’ll make sure she comes to the next one.

name: Itaru
line: You’ve gotta be kidding me! I was looking forward to that time machine meet...

line: Time machine meet? What’s that?
