line: I’m not... afraid of you, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: That was really... embarrassing, though...

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry.

name: Luka
line: Okay...

name: Rintaro
line: By the way, do you know about the IBN 5100?

name: Luka
line: N-no!

name: Luka
line: I’ve... never heard of it.

name: Rintaro
line: But when I called you before, it sounded like you knew about it.

name: Luka
line: No, I...

name: Rintaro
line: So, uh... you’re not gonna wear the costume Mayuri made?

name: Luka
line: Oh... no...

name: Rintaro
line: Because it’s embarrassing?

name: Luka
line: Yes...

name: Luka’s Father
line: That’s strange...

name: Rintaro
line: Did you find it?

name: Luka’s Father
line: Well... I couldn’t find it.

name: Rintaro
line: You couldn’t find it?

name: Luka’s Father
line: I remember receiving an old computer, but it’s not in the storehouse anymore.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Pardon my asking, but the PC was donated by Akiha Rumiho-san, correct?

name: Luka’s Father
line: Huh, how did you know? Do you know her by chance?

name: Rintaro
line: We’re friends.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Rumiho-chan has grown up to be a splendid young lady, hasn’t she?

name: Luka’s Father
line: It was when she was still in elementary school. She came to visit with her butler, Kuroki-san.

name: Luka’s Father
line: But why did that computer disappear? I thought someone might have stolen it, but everything else is untouched, and the lock wasn’t broken.

name: Luka’s Father
line: Luka, do you know anything about it? You’ve been cleaning the sanctuary the past few years, haven’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, what’s wrong?

name: Luka
line: ...I don’t know anything.

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪ Welcome backarin.

name: Rintaro
line: Who is this ’Karin’?

name: Mayuri
line: Well, ’welcome back’ flows so well into ’Okarin,’ doesn’t it? When you put them together, it’s doubly delicious.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not delicious.

name: Mayuri
line: It’s a greeting I can only use for Okarin, so why not? Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: Where’s Daru?

name: Mayuri
line: Hmm, probably at MayQueen?

name: Rintaro
line: MayQueen...

name: Rintaro
line: So when Faris said she had work, she meant at MayQueen...

name: Rintaro
line: What about you, Mayuri? You work there too, don’t you?

name: Mayuri
line: ’Course I do! You know that, Okarin. You’re so weird!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s taking a break to prepare for ComiMa tomorrow.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe? What are you doing? I thought we weren’t going to--

name: Rintaro
line: Whew...

name: Rintaro
line: Hello? Daru?

name: Itaru
line: Haa, ugh, gh, haah...

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, what happened!? Daru!?

name: Itaru
line: I’m sor... some guys... came out of nowhere... they took Mayu-shi...

name: Itaru
line: I think... they wanted... me...

name: Itaru
line: I... ran... but Mayu-shi...

name: Itaru
line: What do I do, Okarin!?

name: Rintaro
line: I won’t let you kill Mayuri!

name: Rintaro
line: Whew...

name: Kurisu
line: This seems serious.

name: Rintaro
line: Yes. I have a difficult problem that requires... delicacy to resolve.

name: Kurisu
line: Delicacy? That’s like the exact opposite of what anyone expects from you.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s why I want to ask a girl. Plus, you’re my assistant, so I need you to save my ass this instant.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, you.

name: Kurisu
line: Why do you need to ask a girl anyway?

name: Kurisu
line: Urushibara-san is actually a guy? That’s totally ridiculous.

name: Rintaro
line: But it’s the truth. Was the truth.

name: Kurisu
line: So basically, umm...

name: Kurisu
line: She looked like Hashida?

name: Rintaro & Kurisu
line: Ugh.

name: Kurisu
line: Unacceptable! There’s no way such a cute girl was a guy.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, hold your horses. I never said that Lukako looked like a guy.

name: Rintaro
line: He actually looked pretty much the same. He was always androgynous, so much you couldn’t help but think he was secreting excess female hormones or something.

name: Kurisu
line: He looked like she does now?

name: Kurisu
line: Acceptable.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway. You want to turn her back into a guy?

name: Rintaro
line: Unless we do, Mayuri dies.

name: Kurisu
line: Mayuri’s life is tied to Urushibara-san’s gender... That’s so crazy it doesn’t seem real at all.

name: Kurisu
line: Have you come up with a solution?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course. I’ll have Lukako turn back into a guy.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t know if she’s going to appreciate that.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s why I’m consulting you, so I can find a way to do this while hurting her the least.

name: Rintaro
line: ...If only I hadn’t been so careless.

name: Rintaro
line: I shouldn’t have let so many people send D-Mails.

name: Kurisu
line: Regret won’t change anything.

name: Kurisu
line: There’s only one piece of advice I can give.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t say anything to Urushibara-san.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Kurisu
line: Based on what you’ve told me, you have the advantage this time. You already know the contents of the D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: So you don’t have to tell her -- him? Ex-him?

name: Kurisu
line: ...You don’t have to tell Urushibara-san. Just send the cancellation D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: You mean pose as Lukako and send the mail to her mother myself?

name: Kurisu
line: If the worldline changes, then that will all be undone.

name: Kurisu
line: In which case, ethical concerns don’t really matter.

name: Rintaro
line: Just one problem.

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t know her mother’s pager number.

name: Kurisu
line: What!? Are you an idiot!? Why didn’t you write it down!?

name: Rintaro
line: I didn’t think I would need it!

name: Kurisu
line: What if you just ask for the pager number directly? Think up a good excuse.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s going to look suspicious...

name: Kurisu
line: What are you so scared of? That’s not the vain and arrogant Okabe I know.

name: Kurisu
line: Just make up some nonsense like you always do. I mean, you know how gullible she is, right?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Wow, I hate myself for saying that. I’m a bad girl.

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe I should just tell her the truth. Sincerity will work better than underhanded tricks... I think.

name: Kurisu
line: A mad scientist, sincere? That’s a good one.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s more like you to say ’I’ll brainwash her, muhahaha!’.

name: Rintaro
line: I will shoulder Lukako’s pain. That’s my responsibility.

name: Rintaro
line: When I cancel that D-Mail, the fact that she was a girl will be undone.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m the only one who can carry that burden.

name: Kurisu
line: So what are you talking to me for? Go to her now, and tell her what you told me.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah... you’re right.

name: Luka
line: Ah, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: I-I’m sorry, I left Samidare in my room...

name: Rintaro
line: No, that’s okay.

name: Luka
line: R-really?

name: Luka
line: Is... something wrong?

name: Rintaro
line: W-well...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako!

name: Luka
line: Uh, yes!?

name: Rintaro
line: Please listen carefully. The truth is...

name: Rintaro
line: You used to be a guy.

name: Luka
line: You’re... saying that again? Sniff...

name: Rintaro
line: Listen! Unless you turn back into a guy... Mayuri will die.

name: Luka
line: Eh...

name: Luka
line: You’re... joking, right?

name: Luka
line: I can’t... believe any of it...

name: Luka
line: This is more roleplaying, right? You’re being Kyouma-san, right? Right?

name: Luka
line: I don’t like that backstory. It hurts... and I think it would hurt Mayuri-chan too...

name: Rintaro
line: I know you’re confused, hearing this so suddenly. But it’s all true. I’ve witnessed her death countless times.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry. I know I’m being selfish. But I’m begging you. To save Mayuri... I need you to become a guy again.

name: Luka
line: Please tell me you’re joking, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: I can’t possibly be a guy... I don’t want to be...

name: Luka
line: I’ve always been a girl... ever since I was born. This is cruel.

name: Luka
line: And why do I have to hear it... from you, of all people?

name: Luka
line: I’m so embarrassed... sniff... this isn’t right...

name: Rintaro
line: What’s to be embarrassed about? I have a harder time thinking of you as a girl anyway.

name: Luka
line: ...that’s how... you... of me...

name: Rintaro
line: What? I couldn’t hear you.

name: Luka
line: So that’s how you think of me...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako! Wait!!

name: Kurisu
line: You raised a flag.

name: Rintaro
line: What are you talking about?

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t you get it? You raised a flag. Or I guess you could say you tripped over a flag that was already raised.

name: Rintaro
line: You mean a death flag?

name: Kurisu
line: Why!? It’s a romance flag, genius.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...!

name: Kurisu
line: Urushibara-san likes you.

name: Kurisu
line: When her beloved Hououin Kyouma told her she was a guy, it tore her pure maidenly heart into tiny little pieces.

name: Kurisu
line: In other words, your plan was a massive failure.

name: Kurisu
line: Love is trouble. There’s no formula for calculating people’s feelings. Too many unknowns to solve for.

name: Kurisu
line: The direct approach was a mistake. It’ll be even harder to persuade her now.

name: Kurisu
line: You should think of another way this time. Like asking her mother directly.

name: Kurisu
line: Though I’m sure the Urushibara family already thinks of you as the man who made their daughter cry. So they might have their guard up.

name: Rintaro
line: Um... when do you think I first set off that romance flag?

name: Kurisu
line: How should I know?

name: Rintaro
line: I mean, think about it. Lukako was a guy last week. If he already liked me at that point, then...

name: Kurisu
line: That’s just your perspective.

name: Kurisu
line: From everyone else’s perspective, she was always a girl. It makes perfect sense.

name: Kurisu
line: Think in terms of the current worldline.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, there’s a bigger problem.

name: Kurisu
line: Will changing Urushibara-san’s gender to male really bring the IBN 5100 back?

name: Rintaro
line: Something is different from the previous worldline.

name: Rintaro
line: According to Lukako’s father, the IBN 5100 was definitely at Yanabayashi Shrine.

name: Rintaro
line: Suzuha gave it to Faris’s dad. After he died, Faris donated it to Yanabayashi Shrine...

name: Rintaro
line: That sequence is the same as on the worldline where I obtain the IBN 5100.

name: Kurisu
line: So you’re gradually approaching the original worldline.

name: Kurisu
line: You know, I’ve been thinking. You really shouldn’t be able to change the worldline so easily.

name: Rintaro
line: What makes you say that?

name: Kurisu
line: I mean, there are six billion people in the world.

name: Kurisu
line: It doesn’t make sense that switching a single person’s gender could cause such a huge change in the worldline.

name: Rintaro
line: According to Suzuha, taking different actions after a time leap will only change divergence by around 0.000001%, if at all.

name: Rintaro
line: But when I canceled Faris’s D-Mail, there was a 0.05% change.

name: Kurisu
line: 0.05% is pretty big.

name: Kurisu
line: What did Amane-san have to say about that?

name: Rintaro
line: The year 2010 is a major attractor field junction, and the key is whether or not I obtain an IBN 5100.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe the divergence meter actually measures your distance to the IBN 5100...

name: Kurisu
line: In any case, what you’re saying is that all of the D-Mails we sent had an influence on the IBN 5100’s location somehow?

name: Rintaro
line: There were also some D-Mails that didn’t activate Reading Steiner.

name: Kurisu
line: Hmmm. So just cancel the D-Mails that activated Reading Steiner, and the IBN 5100 might come back to you.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Kiryu Moeka.

name: Rintaro
line: So what should I do about Lukako?

name: Kurisu
line: Well, you tripped a romance flag, so...

name: Kurisu
line: Hmm...

name: Kurisu
line: B-by the way, Okabe. Is there... someone you like?

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-why aren’t you answering?

name: Rintaro
line: Not really.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh... okay.

name: Rintaro
line: Why do you ask?

name: Kurisu
line: Ah, no, just wondering! There’s no hidden meaning, okay!?

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you mad? Also, your face is red.

name: Kurisu
line: Is not!

name: Kurisu
line: A-anyway! You should go out with Urushibara-san!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Seriously?

name: Kurisu
line: Y-you don’t like anyone else, right? Then answer her feelings, you dummy.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri dies in two days. I don’t have time to play boyfriend.

name: Kurisu
line: Just go out with her.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Seriously?

name: Kurisu
line: If there’s nobody you like, then there’s no reason not to, is there?

name: Kurisu
line: Get close and help her work through her feelings. Then she’ll probably tell you what you need to know.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri dies in two days. I don’t have time for that touchy-feely stuff.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Only consider this as a last resort.

name: Kurisu
line: If you’re willing to hurt Urushibara-san, you can always take the information by force.

name: Kurisu
line: She’ll forget after the worldline changes, won’t she? In that case, I think it’s a valid option.

name: Kurisu
line: But only when compared to Mayuri’s death.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I hate myself for suggesting this.

name: Rintaro
line: No, you’re right. I need to consider every possible option.

name: Rintaro
line: But I don’t want to do that if there’s any other choice.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? Ah, there you are!

name: Rintaro
line: You’re early. It’s still eight. Something happening today?

name: Mayuri
line: I’m here to scold you, Okarin!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s very disappointed in you!

name: Rintaro
line: What did I do?

name: Mayuri
line: You can’t fool me, Okarin. You made Luka-chan cry, didn’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: H-how did you...

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan told me. She said you said she was a guy.

name: Rintaro
line: Damn...

name: Mayuri
line: Why would you say such a mean thing, Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: M-Mayuri, it doesn’t involve you. This is a serious, confidential matter involving the Organization--

name: Mayuri
line: It does too involve me. Luka-chan is Mayushii’s friend!

name: Mayuri
line: If you don’t tell me, we’re not friends anymore, okay? I’m gonna quit being a lab mem!

name: Mayuri
line: Why did you say such a mean thing?

name: Mayuri
line: ...You’re worried about something, aren’t you?

name: Mayuri
line: I can tell. I’ve been watching you longer than anyone, Okarin...

name: Mayuri
line: And yesterday, you talked with Chris-chan for a looong time, didn’t you?

name: Mayuri
line: If something’s wrong, you should talk to Mayushii too, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: I want to help too... okay? Now, let’s go apologize to Luka-chan. Will you do that for me? Mayushii will come too, so let’s--

name: Rintaro
line: Heh... heh heh heh, muhahahaha!

name: Mayuri
line: O-Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: Come now, Mayuri. Me, worry? Don’t be ridiculous!

name: Rintaro
line: I am the insane mad scientist, Hououin Kyouma! I have nothing to worry about!

name: Rintaro
line: All I have... is the hunger for chaos! Muhahahaha!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin...

name: Rintaro
line: Alright...

name: Mayuri
line: Where are you going? Mayushii’s not done talking.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m going to Lukako’s.

name: Mayuri
line: Really? You’re going to apologize? Then let Mayushii come too!

name: Rintaro
line: No, that will just make it harder.

name: Rintaro
line: Please, take care of the lab while I’m gone.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Ahem.

name: Luka
line: You came...

name: Luka
line: Thank you.

name: Rintaro
line: What did you tell Mayuri?

name: Luka
line: ...S-sorry. But Mayuri-chan’s the only one I could talk to about this.

name: Rintaro
line: I mean, how much did you tell her?

name: Luka
line: I kept most of it a secret. Especially the stuff about her dying...

name: Rintaro
line: Do you still think I’m joking?

name: Rintaro
line: Umm, you said you had something important to talk about, nya?

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yes?

name: Luka
line: ...want to ask...

name: Rintaro
line: Yes?

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san... about what you said yesterday...

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah.

name: Luka
line: I... believe you.

name: Rintaro
line: T-that’s great!

name: Luka
line: ...so, well...

name: Luka
line: In exchange... for becoming a guy again...

name: Luka
line: For today... and tomorrow...

name: Luka
line: We can stop... before Mayuri-chan is in danger...

name: Luka
line: Please be my...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hm? I couldn’t hear you. One more time.

name: Luka
line: Please be my b...end

name: Rintaro
line: Speak up. I’ll do anything I can.

name: Luka
line: Boy...end...

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Luka
line: P-please be my boyfriend!

name: Rintaro
line: Wh-why?

name: Luka
line: ...like you.

name: Rintaro
line: L-let me think about it! Give me two -- no, five minutes!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin! How’d it go?

name: Mayuri
line: Did you apologize to Luka-chan?

name: Rintaro
line: Uh, yeah. So put the Juicy Chicken Number One in the microwave and nuke it so that the D-Mail’s basically ABC and...

name: Mayuri
line: Huwha?

name: Rintaro
line: The microwave was developed by knights of the Rosicrucian Order who used alchemy. Meaning that the sound of the chime is the brainwashing device, while the chime itself actually doesn’t have any meaning at all...

name: Mayuri
line: Waaah, Okarin’s broken!

name: Mayuri
line: What are you doing?

name: Rintaro
line: M-making a tactical retreat.

name: Mayuri
line: Retreat...?

name: Kurisu
line: Stop staring. You’re distracting me. How many times do I have to tell you?

name: Rintaro
line: Genius neuroscientist, I need to talk to you.

name: Kurisu
line: Make it short.

name: Rintaro
line: I want you to come with me to Yanabayashi Shrine.

name: Kurisu
line: Tell me why. If it’s a date or something, then I refuse.

name: Rintaro
line: H-Hououin Kyouma does not go on dates. Much less with his assistant. Ridiculous.

name: Rintaro
line: S-so... I need you to explain the differences between the male brain and the female brain.

name: Kurisu
line: What.

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san... and Makise-san. Did you come to pray?

name: Kurisu
line: A-ahem. Actually, we have something to talk to you about, Urushibara-san.

name: Luka
line: What might that be?

name: Kurisu
line: Did you know? Male and female brains are very different.

name: Luka
line: What...?

name: Kurisu
line: Male brains are right-dominant. Female brains are left-dominant.

name: Luka
line: Y-yeah...?

name: Kurisu
line: By the way, the right brain handles image processing, spacial processing, and comprehensive judgment. The left brain handles things like language, and calculation.

name: Kurisu
line: The right and left brains are connected by the corpus callosum, which is more developed in females.

name: Kurisu
line: You know how people say that girls are better at multitasking? That can be explained by the development of the corpus callosum.

name: Luka
line: Uh... what...?

name: Kurisu
line: Actually, these theories are kinda fringe. They’re not really that credible.

name: Kurisu
line: So if you don’t mind, I’d like to do an experiment.

name: Luka
line: A-an experiment?

name: Kurisu
line: I want to try mapping your brain patterns to see if they’re more female or male.

name: Luka
line: What is mapping...?

name: Kurisu
line: Brainwave mapping. We just take a sample of your brainwaves. Anyway, you’ll understand if you try it. Okay? Okay? It won’t hurt a bit.

name: Luka
line: N-no thanks...

name: Kurisu
line: It’ll be okay, I promise. It won’t hurt a bit. Just come to the lab and we’ll--

name: Rintaro
line: What kind of perverted old man are you!?

name: Kurisu
line: Fwahn! Wh-what!?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t you what me! What did we come here for!? What are you going to do if you scare Lukako away!?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m just treating her like a valuable test sub--

name: Rintaro
line: Go back to the lab, you experiment-loving girl!

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah, okay. So that’s the thanks I get for going out of my way to help you. I’m gone. You’re on your own now.

name: Luka
line: Um... what was Makise-san talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: Well, basically...

name: Rintaro
line: Y-you’re actually a guy.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? There you are!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s very disappointed in you!

name: Mayuri
line: You made Luka-chan cry, didn’t you?

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan told me. She said you said she was a guy.

name: Mayuri
line: Why would you say such a mean thing, Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: ...I’m going to see her now, so don’t worry.

name: Mayuri
line: R-really? Thank goodness. If you weren’t gonna apologize, then Mayushii was never gonna talk to you again.

name: Luka
line: P-please be my boyfriend!

name: Rintaro
line: Christina! Christina!

name: Mayuri
line: Is Chris-chan sleeping? She worked all night, so you shouldn’t wake her up.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina! Please wake up!

name: Kurisu
line: ...Oh, shut up.

name: Mayuri
line: Chris-chan, tutturu♪

name: Kurisu
line: What is it?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m going to Yanabayashi Shrine. Come with me.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s time for Operation Christina II.

name: Luka
line: Until... the 15th...

name: Luka
line: We can stop... before Mayuri-chan is in danger...

name: Luka
line: Please be my...

name: Luka
line: Please be my b...end...

name: Luka
line: Boy...end...

name: Luka
line: P-please be my boyfriend!

name: Rintaro
line: E-excuse me. I need a moment.

name: Kurisu
line: Sup, you filthy normal?

name: Rintaro
line: Who’s a normal? Think about how I feel for once.

name: Rintaro
line: Did you hear what Lukako said just now?

name: Kurisu
line: No. Fill me in.

name: Rintaro
line: You weren’t listening!?

name: Kurisu
line: How am I supposed to listen from all the way over here?

name: Rintaro
line: She confessed. Until the 15th. Then back to manhood.

name: Kurisu
line: Roger.

name: Kurisu
line: And? Why are you asking me? Just grant Urushibara-san’s wish.

name: Rintaro
line: B-but it’s Lukako!

name: Kurisu
line: What’s wrong with her? I mean, look how cute she is.

name: Rintaro
line: But she’s a--

name: Kurisu
line: Her being a guy might just be your imagination.

name: Kurisu
line: From my perspective, she’s always been a girl.

name: Rintaro
line: Gh...

name: Kurisu
line: Just give up. Bye.

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, wai--

name: Rintaro
line: Damn! Why did I even bring her along?

name: Luka
line: Um... were you on the phone... with Makise-san?

name: Rintaro
line: Hm? Oh, yeah...

name: Luka
line: Oh...

name: Luka
line: You looked like you were having fun...

name: Rintaro
line: N-nonsense.

name: Luka
line: So...

name: Luka
line: Your... answer...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Very well.

name: Rintaro

line: So, please...

name: Luka
line: Thank you... for everything.

name: Luka
line: Ah, this is when I use that phrase, right?

name: Luka
line: Umm, El Psy Kongalee...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s Kongroo.

name: Luka
line: El Psy Kongroo.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe? Mayuri called. She was mad. You stood her up on your promise to go to ComiMa.

name: Rintaro
line: Christina. I need you to enter a number into the PhoneWave (name subject to change).

name: Kurisu
line: What? Explain yourself.

name: Rintaro
line: Please, just do it... I’m sending a D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: The number is...

name: Luka
line: I really... don’t want to change back...

name: Luka
line: Because... because...

name: Luka
line: If I change back into a guy... I’ll have to hide my feelings for you!

name: Luka
line: It would be wrong for me to love you, if I’m a guy...

name: Luka
line: My memories of today will vanish too... won’t they?

name: Luka
line: That we held hands and walked together...

name: Luka
line: That we trained together after such a long time...

name: Luka
line: That I’m touching Okabe-san’s body right now...

name: Luka
line: I don’t want to forget... I don’t!

name: Luka
line: Because I love you... I love you, Okabe-san!

name: Luka
line: I want to save Mayuri-chan too, and I understand there’s no other way, but...

name: Luka
line: It still hurts...

name: Luka
line: At the very least, I want to keep my memories of today.

name: Luka
line: If I’d known it would hurt this much...

name: Luka
line: Then I never would’ve wished to become a girl in the first place.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako...

name: Luka
line: Sniff...

name: Luka
line: I’m sorry. I know ’that doesn’t matter’ to you, right? Sniff...

name: Rintaro
line: Even as a guy, you’re still Lukako to me. That won’t change.

name: Luka
line: Yes... It makes me happy to hear you say that...

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san... please send the email.

name: Luka
line: Please. Send it quickly...

name: Luka
line: If you let me feel your warmth any longer, I...

name: Luka
line: I might say even worse things...

name: Luka
line: I can’t hold back my feelings anymore!

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako...

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san... please!

name: Luka
line: Will you... remember me?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yes.

name: Luka
line: Will you remember me... as a girl?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yes.

name: Luka
line: Will you remember these four short days we were together?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yes.

name: Luka
line: Thank you... Okabe-san.

name: Luka
line: Farewell... my love...

name: Rintaro
line: No. I can’t do it!

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san... Why?

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t do it anymore... I can’t sacrifice anybody else’s memories!

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t have the right!

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako...

name: Mayuri
line: Sorry, Okarin. Did I wake you up?

name: Rintaro
line: No, I wasn’t really asleep.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re pretty early, Mayuri.

name: Mayuri
line: Actually, Mayushii’s here to pick up her costumes.

name: Mayuri
line: And breakfast!

name: Rintaro
line: Are you going to ComiMa now?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah♪ Daru-kun already left on the first bus.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh...

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, Okarin. Where’d you go with Luka-chan yesterday?

name: Mayuri
line: Did you have a fun date? You know, Luka-chan hasn’t replied to my mails since yesterday.

name: Rintaro
line: You emailed Lukako?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah. Mayushii’s a little worried, you know.

name: Mayuri
line: Did you make Luka-chan cry again? That would make Mayushii sad...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Sad?

name: Mayuri
line: Sad. Luka-chan is Mayushii’s friend.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you going to be at ComiMa all day?

name: Mayuri
line: Eh? Yeah, why?

name: Rintaro
line: Is it okay if I bring Lukako?

name: Mayuri
line: Really? Of course it’s okay!

name: Rintaro
line: You tried asking Lukako to cosplay, right? How’d it go?

name: Mayuri
line: Well... I couldn’t convince her

name: Mayuri
line: I don’t want to force her, you know. That would make her hate cosplay!

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, it might be a good idea to bring Luka-chan to ComiMa.

name: Mayuri
line: You think maybe if she saw other cosplayers having fun, Luka-chan might want to try it too?

name: Mayuri
line: Do you think we could get her to cosplay at the next ComiMa?

name: Rintaro
line: I wonder.

name: Mayuri
line: That would be nice.

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, will you really bring Luka-chan over today?

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah.

name: Mayuri
line: Will you come too, and look at the costumes Mayushii made?

name: Rintaro
line: Yes, I will.

name: Mayuri
line: Yay♪ That would make me really happy!

name: Mayuri
line: Welp, gotta get going.

name: Mayuri
line: Be sure to come, okay? I’ll be waiting. I’ll show you all the best stuff so you’ll want to come tomorrow too!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? Something wrong?

name: Rintaro
line: Nothing’s wrong. Just thinking up ways to defeat the Organization.

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s meet in Ariake in the afternoon.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay. I’ll be waiting.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s always here for you to talk to when you need her, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri...

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! I’m off!

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin?

name: Mayuri
line: You came! But you’re late.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii was waiting...

name: Mayuri
line: I was really lonely...

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry.

name: Mayuri
line: Where’s Luka-chan?

name: Rintaro
line: She’s not coming.

name: Mayuri
line: Did you make her cry again?

name: Rintaro
line: No...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: H-heheheh, muuhahaha! Fret not, Mayuri! Things between me and Lukako are absolutely marvelous!

name: Rintaro
line: That miko and I are tied by a strong bond. That’s right, Lukako and I are connected by fate, whether we like it or not!

name: Rintaro
line: And today I, the genius with an IQ of 170, have returned the smile to Lukako’s face.

name: Rintaro
line: She even said so herself. That it was fun to be with me in our pursuit of knowledge!

name: Mayuri
line: Really? That’s great!

name: Mayuri
line: So there’s no reason for Okarin and Luka-chan to break up, right?

name: Rintaro
line: Uh, right. We won’t break up.

name: Mayuri
line: Great! Then Mayushii can concentrate on ComiMa without any worries!

name: Rintaro
line: Are you going to participate tomorrow too?

name: Mayuri
line: Yup! It lasts three whole days.

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun’s late...

name: Mayuri
line: I called him just now, and he said he was still close by.

name: Rintaro
line: We don’t really have to wait for him.

name: Mayuri
line: Let’s wait a little bit longer.

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, do you think we can convince Luka-chan to cosplay somehow?

name: Mayuri
line: How should we persuade her, though?

name: Mayuri
line: I think Luka-chan would be an absolutely perfect Kirari-chan cosplayer.

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan’s so cute, she makes Mayushii’s heart throb, you know.

name: Mayuri
line: I want to spread Luka-chan’s cuteness to people all over the world. Don’t you, Okarin?

name: Mayuri
line: Ah, or maybe you plan to keep Luka-chan all to yourself? But you know, you shouldn’t monopolize her. Even Mayushii wants to kyun-kyun with Luka-chan!

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t mind. It’s not like I can keep her all to myself.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! Yay♪

name: Mayuri
line: Anyway, there’s one more reason I want to get Luka-chan to cosplay.

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan’s usually a quiet girl, right? She almost never says what she thinks.

name: Mayuri
line: When you cosplay, you become someone other than yourself.

name: Mayuri
line: That’s why I think that if Luka-chan cosplays once, she’ll definitely find a new Luka-chan, even if it’s embarrassing at first.

name: Mayuri
line: And when that happens, she’ll become more assertive than before, and maybe even dominate you, Okarin! Ehehe!

name: Rintaro
line: Can you see the stars?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Mayuri--

name: Itaru
line: Okarin! Mayu-shi!

name: Mayuri
line: Daru-kun! You’re late!

name: Itaru
line: Haa, whew, my bad. Man, it took forever to check my spoils.

name: Mayuri
line: Ok, let’s go!

name: Itaru
line: It was so hot today, I thought I was gonna die! How was the cosplay?

name: Mayuri
line: The breeze felt great!

name: Itaru
line: Maybe you should cosplay next time.

name: Itaru
line: And when did you get here, Okarin? Buy anything?

name: Rintaro
line: No.

name: Itaru
line: Huh? Why so grim? You have a girlfriend like one of those filthy normals now. You’ve got no right to be depressed.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? Is something wro--

name: Mayuri
line: Ah, guh, uh...

name: Itaru
line: Mayu-shi...?

name: Itaru
line: Mayu-shi! What’s wrong!?

name: Itaru
line: She’s not breathing...

name: Itaru
line: What is this... what the hell is this?

name: Itaru
line: Okarin! There’s something wrong with Mayu-shi!

name: Rintaro
line: ...She’s dead.

name: Itaru
line: Dead...? No way! We were just talking!

name: Itaru
line: Hey, Mayu-shi! Wake up! Where’s the camera!? We’re on candid camera, right!?

name: Rintaro
line: Daru.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri’s dead.

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s call an ambulance.

name: Itaru
line: Why did this happen...

name: Itaru
line: How can you be so calm!?

name: Itaru
line: She’s dead! She’s never coming back! Don’t you get it, Okarin!?

name: Rintaro
line: ...I get it.

name: Itaru
line: No, you don’t! She’s not breathing! See!?

name: Rintaro
line: I stood by... and let her die.

name: Itaru
line: What...?

name: Rintaro
line: I couldn’t save you, Mayuri.

name: Rintaro
line: No... I chose not to save you.

name: Rintaro
line: I abandoned you, Mayuri.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe. It’s been three days. Will you at least eat something?

name: Kurisu
line: You knew, didn’t you?

name: Kurisu
line: You knew that Mayuri would die.

name: Kurisu
line: Why don’t you time leap?

name: Kurisu
line: I was sure that you would do anything to save Mayuri, even use the Time Leap Machine.

name: Kurisu
line: What happened to your plan to change Urushibara-san’s gender and take back the IBN 5100?

name: Kurisu
line: You were so set on saving Mayuri. What are you still doing here?

name: Kurisu
line: Wait... did you already send the D-Mail? Did you already change worldlines?

name: Kurisu
line: If so, and you’re just a remnant Okabe left behind, then that means worldlines are parallel, and this line is doomed to continue without Mayuri...

name: Rintaro
line: ...I didn’t send the D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: ...I couldn’t change Lukako back into a guy.

name: Rintaro
line: Instead... I chose to accept fate.

name: Rintaro
line: I stood by... and let Mayuri die.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Will you eat?

name: Kurisu
line: I can make cup noodles, if you like. Or should I go get something?

name: Rintaro
line: Say something. I killed Mayuri. Why won’t you blame me?

name: Kurisu
line: I suppose I could, but why? It looks like you’ve already blamed yourself enough.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe we just don’t have the right to change the past after all.

name: Kurisu
line: Besides...

name: Kurisu
line: No one can blame you.

name: Kurisu
line: You’ve been fighting alone this whole time, one man disconnected from causality.

name: Kurisu
line: No one else can understand your pain.

name: Kurisu
line: No one else can understand the meaning of your choice.

name: Kurisu
line: There’s no way I can blame you, when I haven’t time leaped even once.

name: Rintaro
line: ...How can you be so understanding?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not. When you chose to save Mayuri with the Time Leap Machine, you must have known that no one would ever understand.

name: Kurisu
line: So accept what you’ve done.

name: Kurisu
line: Do that, and you’ll never forget the meaning of your choice.

name: Kurisu
line: However...

name: Kurisu
line: You should also take responsibility for the girl you did save.

name: Kurisu
line: Mayuri is dead. It’s sad -- no, sad doesn’t even begin to describe it -- but Mayuri is gone.

name: Kurisu
line: You couldn’t change convergence. You couldn’t defy fate.

name: Kurisu
line: But she is still alive. Thanks to you, she’s still alive, as a girl.

name: Kurisu
line: And I think she’s suffering alone, just like you.

name: Kurisu
line: Aren’t you the only one who can understand her suffering? You’re her accomplice, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: Her accomplice...

name: Rintaro
line: Thank you, Kurisu.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m glad I told you.

name: Luka
line: Sniff...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako...

name: Luka
line: Okabe... san.

name: Luka
line: Yesterday... I went to Mayuri-chan’s funeral...

name: Luka
line: Everyone cried. I didn’t know Mayuri-chan was loved by so many people...

name: Luka
line: Of course, I loved Mayuri-chan too...

name: Luka
line: I’m not really good with people, but she was always so nice to me...

name: Luka
line: She was my best friend...

name: Luka
line: Why, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: Why are we still alive?

name: Luka
line: Mayuri-chan is dead...

name: Luka
line: But I’m... still a girl...

name: Luka
line: It just feels wrong for me to keep living like this...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not wrong.

name: Luka
line: Is there a way to save Mayuri-chan?

name: Luka
line: That can’t be!

name: Luka
line: Let’s keep thinking! I’ll do anything to save Mayuri-chan!

name: Luka
line: I heard from Mayuri-chan before... that you made a device for traveling back in time.

name: Luka
line: If we use that...

name: Rintaro
line: We can’t.

name: Luka
line: If we go back in time, I’m sure we’ll find a way...

name: Rintaro
line: There is no way.

name: Rintaro
line: It may be cruel, but all we can do is accept Mayuri’s death and keep on living.

name: Luka
line: You can’t give up! Why are you giving up? Aren’t you sad at all that Mayuri-chan died?

name: Rintaro
line: ...There’s no way to save her.

name: Luka
line: No! I don’t want Mayuri-chan to die!

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako!

name: Rintaro
line: Did you think it was easy for me to give up?

name: Luka
line: Okabe-san...

name: Rintaro
line: She was my precious childhood friend. I would have done anything to save her.

name: Rintaro
line: I tried to find a way. I tried everything I could think of! Do you know how many times I’ve gone back!?

name: Rintaro
line: But nothing worked. The universe wants her dead. No matter how I try to avoid it, fate snatches Mayuri away.

name: Rintaro
line: I sacrificed other people’s memories and dreams. All to save Mayuri. I didn’t care who I hurt, as long as I could save her.

name: Rintaro
line: But I can’t do it anymore...

name: Rintaro
line: There’s nothing I can do...

name: Luka
line: ...I’m sorry.

name: Luka
line: I didn’t stop to think about your feelings.

name: Luka
line: But it’s not impossible... is it? There’s still one more way left...

name: Luka
line: If you turn me back into a guy...

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t do that.

name: Luka
line: Please, Okabe-san. I don’t want to be a girl so badly that I’d sacrifice Mayuri-chan!

name: Luka
line: Please, save Mayuri-chan!

name: Rintaro
line: I won’t turn you back into a guy.

name: Luka
line: Why...

name: Luka
line: Why won’t you!?

name: Rintaro
line: That’s what I chose. I can’t keep on hurting people to feed my ego.

name: Rintaro
line: Besides, even if we go back to the original worldline, there’s no guarantee we’ll avoid Mayuri’s death.

name: Rintaro
line: I won’t sacrifice anyone’s memories... I won’t sacrifice your memories... for a small chance like that.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s over.

name: Luka
line: But, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: This is unforgivable...

name: Luka
line: I don’t deserve to live like this...

name: Luka
line: How can I go on... knowing that me being a girl contributed to Mayuri’s death?

name: Luka
line: That’s too heavy a burden... for me to bear...

name: Luka
line: Why...

name: Luka
line: Why didn’t you send the mail to my mom’s pager 18 years ago?

name: Luka
line: Why didn’t you choose Mayuri-chan over me?

name: Rintaro
line: You have nothing to be ashamed of. It was my choice.

name: Rintaro
line: I killed Mayuri. The guilt is mine.

name: Rintaro
line: Besides, I want you to be happy.

name: Luka
line: Happy? How can I possibly be happy...

name: Luka
line: When Mayuri died because of me?

name: Rintaro
line: It wasn’t because of you. Please, never say that again. You may be sad now, but...

name: Rintaro
line: I want you to keep going forward, and live enough for Mayuri, too.

name: Luka
line: No... I don’t want that!

name: Luka
line: In that case... I want to help bear your burden, together...

name: Rintaro
line: Bear it together? Don’t be ridiculous.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m a man disconnected from causality. I chose to stand by and let Mayuri die.

name: Luka
line: Then I’ll disconnect myself from causality too...

name: Luka
line: I regained my memories of being a guy, so doesn’t that mean I’m already disconnected?

name: Luka
line: I also know that I’m only a girl because Mayuri paid for it with her life...

name: Luka
line: We’re... accomplices.

name: Luka
line: This sadness. This guilt.

name: Luka
line: I want us both to embrace them, so we don’t forget...

name: Rintaro
line: I understand.

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s bear our burden together.

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s live with these memories... together.

name: Luka
line: Can I stay by your side forever?

name: Luka
line: I love you...

name: Luka
line: I know I’m betraying Mayuri-chan... but I want to be with you forever.

name: Rintaro
line: Of course.

name: Luka
line: Hey, Okabe-san...

name: Luka
line: There’s one thing that I should have done for Mayuri-chan, but didn’t.

name: Luka
line: And because I didn’t, I made her sad.

name: Rintaro
line: What was it?

name: Luka
line: ...Cosplay.

name: Mayuri
line: I think Luka-chan would be an absolutely perfect Kirari-chan cosplayer!

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan’s so cute, she makes Mayushii’s heart throb, you know.

name: Mayuri
line: Luka-chan’s usually a very obedient girl, you know? She rarely speaks her mind.

name: Mayuri
line: When you cosplay, you become another you.

name: Mayuri
line: That’s why I think that if Luka-chan cosplays once, she’ll definitely find a new Luka-chan, even if it’s embarrassing at first.

name: Mayuri
line: And when that happens, she’ll become more assertive than before, and maybe even dominate you, Okarin! Ehehe!

name: Luka
line: Can your time machine take me back to that day?

name: Rintaro
line: You mean you want to go back!?

name: Rintaro
line: Are you serious?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s too dangerous. So far, I’m the only one who’s used it.

name: Luka
line: Please!

name: Luka
line: At the very least, I want to see Mayuri-chan off with a smile.

name: Luka
line: Because I wasn’t able to do anything for her...

name: Rintaro
line: But I thought you couldn’t handle all the otaku.

name: Luka
line: I am a bit scared... but this is something I have to do.

name: Luka
line: Besides, I want to truly be the same as you, Okabe-san.

name: Luka
line: If I use that device... I’ll be completely disconnected from causality, won’t I?

name: Luka
line: And then, I could feel what you feel...

name: Luka
line: So please...

name: Rintaro
line: What time will you jump to?

name: Luka
line: The morning of that day.

name: Luka
line: If I jump to the day before, I don’t think I’ll be mentally stable enough to accept it as reality.

name: Luka
line: That’s why...

name: Rintaro
line: Once you’ve leaped safely, get in touch with me. I’m sure I’ll help you get to Mayuri.

name: Luka
line: Okay...

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry. Your brain will hurt a bit, but the pain will go away soon.

name: Luka
line: O-okay...

name: Rintaro
line: You must not get distracted once you reach the other side. Calm down and try to grasp your surroundings.

name: Rintaro
line: It’ll be okay. I’m with you.

name: Luka
line: ...I’m going.

name: Luka
line: I’ll be sure to come back!

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah. I’ll be waiting.

name: Luka
line: Okabe-sa--

name: Rintaro
line: What the...

name: Luka
line: Want to see the pictures?

name: Rintaro
line: Pictures?

name: Luka
line: It worked. I did it.

name: Luka
line: Don’t you remember? You suddenly started acting different just now.

name: Rintaro
line: Right after you leaped into the past, I found myself standing here.

name: Rintaro
line: Did you go to ComiMa?

name: Luka
line: Mayuri-chan... was so happy...

name: Rintaro
line: It looks like we really got carried away...

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Lukako.

name: Luka
line: Yes?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re...

name: Rintaro
line: You’re a guy, right?

name: Luka
line: Um... yes?

name: Rintaro
line: Do you... like me?

name: Luka
line: W-what? I... don’t understand.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Do you like me?

name: Luka
line: Um...

name: Luka
line: I respect you!

name: Luka
line: If I change back into a guy... I’ll have to hide my feelings for you!

name: Rintaro
line: Thanks. You are my disciple, now and forever. Agreed?

name: Luka
line: Y-yes! Of course I am.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako, do you remember breaking an old computer in the shrine storehouse last year?

name: Luka
line: An old computer? No, I don’t remember anything like that.

name: Luka
line: I don’t really understand computers. I haven’t played with them much.

name: Rintaro
line: Go get your father for me.

name: Luka’s Father
line: An old computer... yes, I do remember.

name: Luka’s Father
line: I’ll go check. Please wait a moment.

name: Luka’s Father
line: It’s gone. I couldn’t find it anywhere.

name: Luka’s Father
line: The lock to the storehouse was broken. Someone may have stolen it.

name: Rintaro
line: Stolen it?

name: Luka’s Father
line: There’s evidence someone dragged something heavy away. That wasn’t there at the end-of-the-year cleaning, and the lock wasn’t broken when I checked last month.

name: Luka’s Father
line: I never expected a thief would break in.

name: Luka
line: Then shouldn’t we report it to the police?

name: Rintaro
line: This isn’t going to work.

name: Luka
line: Um, Okabe-san. I don’t really understand, but please don’t be sad.

name: Luka
line: J-just go ’It matters not!’ like you always do.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re using that phrase wrong, you know.

name: Mayuri
line: Phew. I’m stuffed! I barely ate today, so I was hungry!

name: Kurisu
line: Is there more tomorrow?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah, and the day after, too.

name: Mayuri
line: Okeydokey! Mayushii’s got an early day tomorrow, so I’m going home.

name: Mayuri
line: Hey guys, why don’t you come too?

name: Kurisu
