line: What did her last email say before she stopped contacting you?

name: Moeka
line: ...’Leave the IBN 5100 at the designated location.’

name: Rintaro
line: What was the designated location?

name: Moeka
line: The coin locker... in front of Daibiru...

name: Rintaro
line: I’m using your phone.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe!?

name: Rintaro
line: You at the lab?

name: Kurisu
line: Haah... don’t worry me like that... idiot...

name: Rintaro
line: What, were you worried about me?

name: Kurisu
line: I-I mean, you set off an obvious death flag. I’m surprised you’re still alive!

name: Rintaro
line: Where are you now?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m standing by at the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: Set up the machine. I’m sending another D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: Destination?

name: Rintaro
line: ...July 31st, 11 AM.

name: Kurisu
line: 11 AM on the 31st...

name: Kurisu
line: Okay, all set.

name: Rintaro
line: Alright, activate it.

name: Kurisu
line: Activated.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Well?

name: Rintaro
line: Nothing. Why won’t it change!?

name: Kurisu
line: Another mistake?

name: Rintaro
line: No, there’s no way! I know what Moeka’s message said. This D-Mail should have canceled it.

name: Kurisu
line: What did the first D-Mail say?

name: Rintaro
line: That the IBN 5100 was at Yanabayashi Shrine. I tried to cancel it by telling her it’s a trap, but it didn’t work.

name: Rintaro
line: I’ll try to phrase it differently.

name: Kurisu
line: Wait. We went through this with the LOTO SIX experiment, remember?

name: Kurisu
line: The person who reads the D-Mail chooses whether or not to act accordingly.

name: Kurisu
line: Kiryu learned that the IBN 5100 was at the shrine. Though the cancellation mail came right afterward, I guess she ignored it and went anyway.

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe she didn’t believe the cancellation mail. Or maybe she was so diligent she decided to check it out even when told not to.

name: Kurisu
line: Damn. Even when told it was too risky to go to the shrine, she went anyway...

name: Rintaro
line: We need a more persuasive message. Something that will prevent her from going to the shrine.

name: Kurisu
line: Like what?

name: Rintaro
line: What if I send a D-Mail to myself on July 30th? Could I beat her to the IBN 5100?

name: Kurisu
line: Were you even interested in the IBN 5100 then?

name: Kurisu
line: What?

name: Rintaro
line: Moeka’s handler. She’s obsessed with FB. If the mail comes from FB, she’ll do whatever it says.

name: Kurisu
line: Do you have FB’s phone?

name: Rintaro
line: No. They haven’t even met. We don’t know where FB is.

name: Kurisu
line: Then there’s nothing we can do.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Give me a little time.

name: Kurisu
line: Gonna make me wait again? Well, I’ve been pulling all-nighters recently, so whatever.

name: Kurisu
line: Just don’t do anything stupid, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Looks like we’re searching for FB now.

name: Rintaro
line: How exactly did you become a Rounder?

name: Moeka
line: Four years ago... I tried... to kill myself.

name: Moeka
line: I had... no hope. I wanted to get away... from everything.

name: Rintaro
line: Why?

name: Moeka
line: ...No big reason.

name: Moeka
line: Little things... lots of little things... piled up.

name: Moeka
line: I’ve always been... like this.

name: Rintaro
line: And your family?

name: Moeka
line: I locked myself in my room... and overdosed on sleeping pills.

name: Moeka
line: But I didn’t die.

name: Moeka
line: Afterwards... I got a mail.

name: Moeka
line: Recruiting Rounders, it said... It was sent to hundreds of people... not just me.

name: Moeka
line: Nothing mattered anymore... so on a whim... I replied.

name: Moeka
line: And then... FB contacted me.

name: Moeka
line: Ever since... I’ve followed... FB’s orders.

name: Rintaro
line: Were you always stationed in Akiba?

name: Moeka
line: Until three months ago... I was in Nagoya. Before that... Yokohama. Before that...

name: Rintaro
line: How many IBN 5100s have you found so far?

name: Moeka
line: Not even one...

name: Rintaro
line: So what now? Are you going to sit here, wallowing in despair, until you kill yourself four days from now?

name: Rintaro
line: Or do you want to rebel against fate?

name: Moeka
line: Rebel?

name: Rintaro
line: FB used you and threw you away. Accept it. And then ask yourself what you’re going to do about it.

name: Moeka
line: Even if FB... did use me...

name: Moeka
line: That... was the only place... I belonged.

name: Moeka
line: That was the first time... in my entire life... that I was needed.

name: Moeka
line: FB gave me... purpose.

name: Moeka
line: To protect that purpose... to protect FB...

name: Moeka
line: I would do... anything.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re beyond hope.

name: Rintaro
line: Drown in your dependence for all I care. Your death has already been decided.

name: Rintaro
line: But I won’t let fate have its way. I’m rebelling to the end.

name: Rintaro
line: The light’s on!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Let’s not go crazy.

name: Rintaro
line: You put the IBN 5100 in the bottom-right locker. Correct?

name: Moeka
line: ...How?

name: Rintaro
line: Out of all the lockers, only three could hold the IBN 5100. Out of those three, only the bottom one was in use.

name: Rintaro
line: If that’s the one you used, then FB hasn’t picked it up yet.

name: Rintaro
line: Do you know what that means?

name: Rintaro
line: It means that if we stake out the locker, you’ll get to meet FB.

name: Rintaro
line: It hadn’t occurred to you? Some secret agent you are.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m headed there now. You coming?

name: Moeka
line: What will you do... if you meet her?

name: Rintaro
line: Borrow her phone.

name: Moeka
line: I can’t meet her... I’m too afraid. The real me could never... live up to her expectations...

name: Rintaro
line: Something tells me her expectations were never that high to begin with.

name: Rintaro
line: What are you doing here?

name: Moeka
line: I’ll... keep watch too.

name: Moeka
line: Is that... okay?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Why the change of heart?

name: Rintaro
line: You were comfortable with your mail-only relationship, weren’t you? I thought you wanted to maintain that distance.

name: Rintaro
line: So what made you decide to risk a meeting?

name: Moeka
line: At this rate...

name: Moeka
line: If I lose contact with FB... I’ll lose... my connection...

name: Rintaro
line: To the world?

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t bear to be alone yourself, yet you’d end an innocent girl’s life because some person you’ve never met told you to.

name: Rintaro
line: A cultist, that’s what you are.

name: Rintaro
line: What’s this?

name: Rintaro
line: Whoa! Milk and bean buns!

name: Rintaro
line: You brought this for me?

name: Rintaro
line: Very well. You may join the stakeout.

name: Rintaro
line: Is that FB?

name: Moeka
line: FB... is a woman.

name: Rintaro
line: So... maybe she hired someone to pick it up.

name: Rintaro
line: Follow him!

name: Rintaro
line: Weird.

name: Moeka
line: He’s getting off...

name: Rintaro
line: Clever...

name: Rintaro
line: They’ll make their move at Shinjuku.

name: Rintaro
line: That guy’s gonna get off, but he actually hands the package to someone else.

name: Rintaro
line: He got us good just now.

name: Moeka
line: Just now?

name: Rintaro
line: I just time leaped from an hour in the future.

name: Moeka
line: Time... leaped?

name: Station Announcer
line: Now arriving at Shinjuku.

name: Rintaro
line: I knew it!

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...

name: Rintaro
line: Nervous?

name: Rintaro
line: You look terrified. How long have you been driving?

name: Moeka
line: ...First time.

name: Rintaro
line: What? This is your first time!? Oh come on... just don’t crash.

name: Rintaro
line: He’s coming!

name: Moeka
line: What does this mean?

name: Moeka
line: Where is FB?

name: Rintaro
line: The question is why did he bring it inside. Is he just holding onto it? Or...

name: Moeka
line: M4 is my codename...

name: Moeka
line: FB... gave it to me.

name: Rintaro
line: So... time for another stakeout.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s them!

name: Moeka
line: What now?

name: Rintaro
line: Tennouji’s wife might be FB.

name: Kurisu
line: I thought I asked you to keep me posted.

name: Rintaro
line: I’ve been busy.

name: Kurisu
line: Busy. Right.

name: Rintaro
line: Were you worried about me?

name: Kurisu
line: O-of course not! Why should I care what you’re up to?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s just... Mayuri was really worried. I don’t want to see her sad.

name: Kurisu
line: So at least give her a call, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m doing this to save Mayuri.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m close to discovering our true enemy.

name: Kurisu
line: Our enemy? But...

name: Kurisu
line: Isn’t she our enemy?

name: Rintaro
line: She is an enemy, but we’re cooperating in order to uncover the truth.

name: Kurisu
line: Isn’t she the one who... killed Mayuri?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yes.

name: Kurisu
line: Whatever. So where are you going now? Take me with you.

name: Rintaro
line: Have you gone mad, assistant mine?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m perfectly sane, and I’m not your assistant.

name: Rintaro
line: It could be dangerous.

name: Kurisu
line: Eh...

name: Kurisu
line: Do I die today?

name: Rintaro
line: No. You don’t die.

name: Kurisu
line: Then there’s no problem. This worldline has essentially guaranteed my survival.

name: Tennouji
line: Make yerselves at home.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re an early riser, Mister Braun.

name: Tennouji
line: Yeah. Gotta see my little girl off to school.

name: Tennouji
line: I know it’s summer break, but habits die hard.

name: Rintaro
line: Is your daughter still asleep?

name: Tennouji
line: Hey. You thinking of trying something while she’s sleeping? Touch her and I’ll break your head, got it?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry.

name: Rintaro
line: A few hours ago, six men stopped by this house to pick up a package, which they then delivered to France. You were there. I saw you.

name: Tennouji
line: And?

name: Rintaro
line: The package contained an IBN 5100. You know what that is, of course.

name: Tennouji
line: Yeah, the legendary retro PC.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you just another courier? Or are you...

name: Rintaro
line: A Rounder?

name: Tennouji
line: Did you betray us, M4?

name: Moeka
line: No... are you... FB?

name: Tennouji
line: Ever heard of Ferdinand Braun?

name: Tennouji
line: C’mon, he was the Nobel Prize-winning physicist who invented the Braun Tube.

name: Tennouji
line: Ferdinand Braun. Initials?

name: Tennouji
line: Now you get it.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...

name: Rintaro
line: Let me ask you one thing.

name: Rintaro
line: Your wife...

name: Tennouji
line: She died having Nae. Why?

name: Moeka
line: No... that can’t be...

name: Tennouji
line: I thought I was your world, M4. Now you’re running away?

name: Rintaro
line: So you’re a Rounder. SERN’s dog!

name: Tennouji
line: Their dog? Yeah... you ain’t wrong.

name: Rintaro
line: If you shoot, it’ll wake up your daughter.

name: Tennouji
line: So what?

name: Rintaro
line: Do you want your daughter to see you commit murder?

name: Tennouji
line: My little girl’s smart as a button. She’ll understand.

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t believe you’re a Rounder! You, of all people!

name: Rintaro
line: Hashida Suzu didn’t give you a home so you could turn it into a safehouse for SERN!

name: Tennouji
line: You knew Suzu-san? You should’ve said something!

name: Tennouji
line: Anyway, what gives you the right to speak for her, huh? She died ten years ago. You were what, eight?

name: Tennouji
line: How do you know how she’d feel?

name: Rintaro
line: ...She told me.

name: Rintaro
line: She was here, in this time, not five days ago!

name: Suzuha
line: I’ll bring it to you here in Akihabara. That’s my duty, and I’ll see it through. The rest is up to you.

name: Suzuha
line: Change the future. Please.

name: Rintaro
line: She was right there, and you never knew it!

name: Rintaro
line: Hashida Suzu... no, Amane Suzuha was a time traveler! She came from the future to stop SERN!

name: Tennouji
line: Wha...t?

name: Rintaro
line: You never noticed, FB? The woman who saved your life came from the year 2036. She was one of us, a lab member, the daughter of Hashida Itaru.

name: Rintaro
line: Suzuha hated SERN! And here you are, a man who owes her everything, doing their dirty work!

name: Rintaro
line: Is this how you honor Suzuha’s memory!?

name: Tennouji
line: Stop making shit up!

name: Rintaro
line: How did you turn out this way?

name: Tennouji
line: Fuck you! It’s complicated.

name: Moeka
line: Are you... really FB?

name: Tennouji
line: Yeah, I am.

name: Moeka
line: The mails...

name: Tennouji
line: I wrote them. Why did I pretend to be a woman? Camouflage, obviously. Had to hide my identity.

name: Tennouji
line: The internet’s full of guys pretending to be girls.

name: Tennouji
line: I gotta say though, M4, you send too much goddamn mail.

name: Tennouji
line: Who has time for that shit? You better be grateful I bothered to reply.

name: Moeka
line: No...

name: Moeka
line: FB was like... a mother to me...

name: Moeka
line: I’d do anything for FB...

name: Tennouji
line: That was the point. It’s easy to manipulate nutjobs like you. Just gotta give ’em something to cling to.

name: Rintaro
line: Enough!

name: Moeka
line: Why did you... stop emailing me?

name: Tennouji
line: Huh? Oh, right. Your usefulness ended the second you dropped off that IBN 5100.

name: Moeka
line: I’m... useless?

name: Tennouji
line: Recruiting members directly is bad for secrecy, but the Rounders make up for it by choosing expendable assets with nowhere else to go.

name: Tennouji
line: Any member who finds an IBN 5100 is eliminated. No exceptions.

name: Tennouji
line: That way, SERN gets to keep their secrets, plus have a cheap army of outcasts like us.

name: Moeka
line: FB...

name: Tennouji
line: We’re all expendable, every last one of us. And it sucks, let me tell you.

name: Tennouji
line: As soon as our job’s done, they get rid of us. Guess that makes us cattle, not dogs.

name: Tennouji
line: Disobey orders, and they go after your family. I can’t let them touch my little girl, can I?

name: Rintaro
line: Wait! Don’t--

name: Tennouji
line: Sorry for everything, Suzu-san.

name: Tennouji
line: Really, how did I turn out this way?

name: Moeka
line: Ah...ah...

name: Moeka
line: No... why...

name: Rintaro
line: You fool...

name: Rintaro
line: You left your daughter all alone!

name: Rintaro
line: How could you die with a smile!?

name: Rintaro
line: ...She’s gone?

name: Rintaro
line: ...His phone.

name: Kurisu
line: ...So the manager was FB.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Moeka...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s possible... that FB did what he did so you could live.

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe he didn’t abandon you.

name: Rintaro
line: Maybe, by pushing you away, he was trying to keep you safe.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe! We need to send the D-Mail now.

name: Kurisu
line: Miss this chance, and you could be in a lot of trouble.

name: Kurisu
line: Your goal is to save Mayuri, not take revenge on SERN. Right?

name: Kurisu
line: ...I don’t want anyone else to be hurt because of the machine we built.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah. You’re right.

name: Rintaro
line: Do you think Daru’s still in the lab?

name: Kurisu
line: I’ll try calling.

name: Kurisu
line: He said he’ll be there in five minutes.

name: Kurisu
line: By the way, something weird happened back there.

name: Kurisu
line: While I was waiting outside, I heard a gunshot.

name: Kurisu
line: And right after that... I saw her.

name: Rintaro
line: Her... who?

name: Kurisu
line: Nae-chan.

name: Kurisu
line: She ran out the back door.

name: Kurisu
line: When I called her to stop... our eyes met.

name: Rintaro & Kurisu
line: Wha!?

name: Rintaro
line: Wait! Don’t--

name: Nae
line: Hi!

name: Moeka
line: Guh...

name: Nae
line: Aha!

name: Nae
line: Ahaha!

name: Nae
line: Ahahaha!

name: Kurisu
line: No way...

name: Nae
line: Yes way.

name: Nae
line: I won’t forgive you.

name: Nae
line: Daddy died because of you.

name: Nae
line: I’ll never forgive you.

name: Nae
line: I’ll kill you with my own two hands.

name: Nae
line: Okabe Rintaro.

name: Nae
line: I’ll come for you in fifteen years. I hope you spend them quivering in terror.

name: Nae
line: Aha! Ahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: Wh-what the hell was that? A demon? Was she possessed?

name: Rintaro
line: W-what about Moeka!?

name: Kurisu
line: Calm down!

name: Kurisu
line: Check on Kiryu-san! I’ll call an ambulance.

name: Kurisu
line: No, wait! Before that...

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe you should just send the D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: Moeka!

name: Rintaro
line: Hang in there!

name: Rintaro
line: Can you hear me!? Moeka!

name: Moeka
line: I... killed...

name: Moeka
line: ...someone...

name: Moeka
line: ...precious... to you...

name: Moeka
line: This... is my punishment...

name: Moeka
line: I’m... sorry...

name: Moeka
line: I’m so...rry...

name: Moeka
line: I had... nothing... except FB...

name: Moeka
line: The only... place... I belonged...

name: Moeka
line: I would... kill... to protect it...

name: Moeka
line: You’re right... to hate me...

name: Moeka
line: I’m... so...rry...

name: Rintaro
line: I forgive you.

name: Rintaro
line: I forgive you.

name: Rintaro
line: I forgive you.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: I think you should send the D-Mail.

name: Kurisu
line: Everything’s ready at the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah...

name: Rintaro
line: Hey, Christina.

name: Rintaro
line: When I send the D-Mail and change divergence, do you think Moeka’s fate will change?

name: Kurisu
line: Based on the attractor field model you spoke of...

name: Kurisu
line: She’ll be more likely to live if divergence exceeds 1%.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Sorry. I wish I knew what to say.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t worry about it.

name: Rintaro
line: ...You’re alive.

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: Your supervisor? You mean FB?

name: Tennouji
line: Doing your duty sets you up for disposal. So we’re more like cattle than dogs.

name: Nae
line: I won’t forgive you, until I kill you with my own hands.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Okabe?

name: Rintaro
line: Wasn’t there something strange about that girl?

name: Kurisu
line: That girl... you mean Nae-chan?

name: Kurisu
line: ...She was like a different person.

name: Rintaro
line: What did she mean, she’ll kill me in fifteen years?

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t worry about it, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: Send the D-Mail right now. That’ll solve everything.

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t pretend I didn’t see that.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m time leaping. Back to the lab.

name: Kurisu
line: Our enemy? But...

name: Kurisu
line: Isn’t she our enemy?

name: Rintaro
line: ...It’s about 7 AM, right?

name: Kurisu
line: Huh?

name: Kurisu
line: Well, yeah, but where did that question come from?

name: Kurisu
line: There really was a gunshot...

name: Rintaro
line: Wait!

name: Rintaro
line: Stop!

name: Rintaro
line: Are you really Tennouji Nae?

name: Rintaro
line: You plan to kill Kiryu Moeka after this, don’t you?

name: Nae
line: That’s right.

name: Rintaro
line: Revenge for your father?

name: Nae
line: You and Kiryu Moeka killed Daddy.

name: Rintaro
line: Your dad killed himself. He blew his own brains out.

name: Rintaro
line: He would have done it even if we hadn’t been here.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not our fault.

name: Nae
line: I don’t care.

name: Nae
line: Kiryu Moeka was there when Daddy died, but she didn’t stop him.

name: Nae
line: I won’t forgive her.

name: Nae
line: Nor you, Okabe Rintaro.

name: Nae
line: You weren’t there, but Daddy wouldn’t have died if you hadn’t gotten involved.

name: Nae
line: But I won’t kill you now. I can’t.

name: Nae
line: I’ll kill you in fifteen years. Keep living in fear until then.

name: Rintaro
line: Who... are you?

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean, you’ll kill me in fifteen years?

name: Nae
line: Exactly what it sounds like.

name: Nae
line: Fifteen years from now, I killed you.

name: Nae
line: You still don’t get it?

name: Nae
line: Just now, you asked who I am.

name: Nae
line: I am Tennouji Nae. No doubt about that.

name: Nae
line: But I remember the next fifteen years.

name: Rintaro
line: Time leap!?

name: Rintaro
line: Gh, aah...!

name: Nae
line: Ahahahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: Damn... it...

name: Nae
line: Wanna hear how I killed you?

name: Nae
line: In the future, you were one of the founders of the resistance against SERN.

name: Nae
line: But I captured you, and imprisoned you, and tortured you every which way I could think of!

name: Nae
line: You cried, and screamed, and begged for your life, all while covered in piss and shit!

name: Nae
line: You were one sorry sight, Okabe Rintaro.

name: Nae
line: After I ran out of things to do, I finally slit your throat. And then I stabbed you! Over and over and over again, so many times I don’t even remember.

name: Nae
line: That’s how your life is going to end. That’s your punishment for murdering Daddy!

name: Rintaro
line: Ugahhh!

name: Nae
line: Aha!

name: Nae
line: SERN confiscated your Time Leap Machine. They kept it locked away for fifteen years. Until I came for it.

name: Nae
line: After I became a Rounder and killed you, I used that machine to come all the way back here.

name: Nae
line: It was hard, let me tell you. That piece of shit can’t leap more than 48 hours at a time.

name: Nae
line: 2738 leaps.

name: Nae
line: I messed up a few times, though, so it was really more like twice that. At least. I kinda lost count after a while!

name: Nae
line: Revenge was all I lived for. I won’t let anyone get in my way. I will kill Kiryu Moeka with my own two hands.

name: Nae
line: I won’t let that bitch kill herself. She doesn’t deserve to go out easy.

name: Rintaro
line: You leapt fifteen years just for that?

name: Nae
line: Just for that?

name: Rintaro
line: Gah, gwaaah...!

name: Nae
line: It might not mean much to you, but to me, killing you two means everything!

name: Rintaro
line: So you kill Moeka... but what comes next?

name: Nae
line: Next?

name: Rintaro
line: Are you gonna repeat those fifteen years all over again?

name: Nae
line: Hmph. What do I care about those fifteen years?

name: Nae
line: There’s nothing for me there...

name: Nae
line: I don’t need anything from you now.

name: Nae
line: Just wait in fear and regret, Okabe Rintaro. Until I come for you in fifteen years.

name: Rintaro
line: Hahaha...

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe!

name: Kurisu
line: What happened!? Are you okay!?

name: Rintaro
line: The phone...

name: Kurisu
line: I brought it, but...

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, tell me what happened, will you!?

name: Kurisu
line: Should I call an ambulance!?

name: Rintaro
line: Calm down...

name: Rintaro
line: I’m gonna send the D-Mail now.

name: Kurisu
line: R-right. If the worldline changes, then this wound will go away.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey... why do you think Tennouji didn’t kill Moeka?

name: Kurisu
line: What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: I think... I think he wanted to save Moeka.

name: Rintaro
line: I hope it works out on the Beta worldline.

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry, Nae...

name: Rintaro
line: But I can’t let you have your revenge.

name: Moeka
line: Okabe-kun...

name: Moeka
line: How did you know where I...

name: Rintaro
line: Let me kill some time here!

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: FB told you to stop...

name: Tennouji
line: Doing your duty sets you up for disposal. So we’re more like cattle than dogs.

name: Nae
line: Live in fear and regret, Okabe Rintaro. Until we meet again in fifteen years.

name: Rintaro
line: Have you been to Kiryu Moeka’s apartment?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Huh?

name: Kurisu
line: Moeka-san’s apartment? Never.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, okay.

name: Kurisu
line: Why do you ask?

name: Rintaro
line: It doesn’t matter. Just wondering.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s here!

name: Rintaro
line: Daru! Daru! Where’s my super hacka!?

name: Kurisu
line: Uh, he’s not here.

name: Kurisu
line: He went to ComiMa, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: Daru! Christina!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s time for the final phase of Operation Verthandi!

name: Rintaro
line: The IBN 5100, Daru!

name: Itaru
line: ...Yeah?

name: Rintaro
line: Listen to me, man! We have an IBN 5100!

name: Itaru
line: Of course we do. You’re the one who found it, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: Yes! Yes I did! I found it at Yanabayashi Shrine!

name: Itaru
line: ...Have you been drinking too much soda?

name: Kurisu
line: Let me sleep, for crying out loud.

name: Kurisu
line: I was up all night.

name: Rintaro
line: A question, Daru. Have you researched how to use the IBN 5100?

name: Itaru
line: Huh? Well, yeah, I guess.

name: Itaru
line: Can you believe I did it while preparing for ComiMa? I’m like a saint or something. They’d knight me for this in England.

name: Rintaro
line: Then we shall call you Sir Super Hacka!

name: Itaru
line: Hell no.

name: Kurisu
line: Will you guys shut up? You’re giving me a headache.

name: Rintaro
line: Hear me, lab mems!

name: Rintaro
line: Our long struggle has at last reached its climax! Ragnarok is at hand!

name: Rintaro
line: Now we must deliver the decisive blow. With the power of the IBN 5100, we shall crack SERN’s most secure database and destroy it from the inside!

name: Rintaro
line: Through the cowardly apparatus known as Echelon, the enemy has acquired precious intelligence on our activities. Now they plot to steal our sacred time machine, upon which rest the hopes and dreams of all mankind!

name: Rintaro
line: Beneath its scholarly trappings, SERN is a hive of scum and villainy, of men who would sacrifice innocent souls in their quest to rule all space and time. But now we are poised to crush them with the Hammer of Justice!

name: Rintaro
line: And when we do, they will know once and for all by whose hand the wheel of fate truly turns!

name: Rintaro
line: When the sun sets upon the battlefield, the foul System that rules the world will crumble! And from the flames, a new age will rise! An age of glorious, unfettered Chaos!

name: Kurisu
line: Argh! Shut up!

name: Kurisu
line: What are you talking about!?

name: Itaru
line: Nobody can know the darkness in Okarin’s heart...

name: Kurisu
line: First, get your character straight! What kind of mad scientist talks about the Hammer of Justice?

name: Itaru
line: I guess he just got caught up in the heat of the moment. Maybe he regrets it now.

name: Rintaro
line: Come on, guys! Stop complaining and get ready!

name: Itaru
line: Get ready?

name: Rintaro
line: To crack SERN! Weren’t you listening?

name: Kurisu
line: Uh, I don’t think that’s a good idea.

name: Rintaro
line: When did you become a goody two shoes? Where’s your ambition!?

name: Kurisu
line: Are you trying to get us arrested?

name: Rintaro
line: That’s not the problem!

name: Rintaro
line: It’s taken me so long -- so long -- just to reach this point!

name: Rintaro
line: This is my chance to escape the Alpha worldline and save Mayuri. I won’t let anyone get in my way. Anyone!

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe...

name: Itaru
line: W-why so serious, man?

name: Rintaro
line: Please!

name: Rintaro
line: Please, hear me out.

name: Itaru
line: I-it’s not like I’m cracking for you or anything, okay!?

name: Kurisu
line: Oh god...

name: Rintaro
line: This all happened because of the very first D-Mail I sent to Daru.

name: Rintaro
line: SERN intercepted that D-Mail with Echelon and figured out what it meant, then sent their Rounders after us.

name: Rintaro
line: They will kill Mayuri, kidnap us, and steal the Time Leap Machine.

name: Rintaro
line: I tried to save Mayuri, but nothing worked. Every worldline converged on the same result, just as attractor field theory said they would.

name: Itaru
line: You know, if this is all in your head, I think you’ve got a career as a light novel author ahead of you.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s true. All of it.

name: Rintaro
line: To prevent Mayuri’s death...

name: Rintaro
line: We need to escape from the Alpha worldline. And I think we can do that by canceling all of our changes to the timeline so far.

name: Rintaro
line: That should return us to the Beta worldline, the worldline that existed before I sent that first D-Mail.

name: Rintaro
line: There’s just one more step. We need to erase the first D-Mail from SERN’s database.

name: Kurisu
line: Fascinating.

name: Itaru
line: You believe him, Makise-shi?

name: Kurisu
line: In theory. I’d like to see objective data, but that’s obviously impossible.

name: Rintaro
line: Relax. Your Time Leap Machine worked perfectly.

name: Kurisu
line: O-of course it did.

name: Kurisu
line: Besides, we were already planning to crack SERN’s database, weren’t we?

name: Kurisu
line: Fine. Let’s see what’s in there. If the mail data exists, then it’s proof that what you said is true.

name: Itaru
line: So what you’re saying is, ’don’t think, feel.’ Got it.

name: Kurisu
line: Uh, you lost me.

name: Rintaro
line: What he meant to say was, ’don’t think, do.’

name: Itaru
line: Done bridging them. I need to tinker with the settings a little, but we should be up and running in about ten minutes.

name: Rintaro
line: Alright.

name: Kurisu
line: So the first D-Mail started everything...

name: Kurisu
line: Was that the one you showed me at ATF?

name: Kurisu
line: The one that said I died or something.

name: Rintaro
line: Right. I found you dead at Radi-Kan and sent Daru an email. Daru happened to be experimenting on the PhoneWave (name subject to change) at the time, so the discharge phenomenon occurred and the mail... was...

name: Kurisu
line: What?

name: Rintaro
line: And I’m supposed to choose?

name: Rintaro
line: There’s no way...

name: Rintaro
line: I can’t choose... I can’t!

name: Rintaro
line: Is this how it ends!?

name: Rintaro
line: Suzuha... Faris... Lukako... Moeka... Is this what I sacrificed your memories for!?

name: Rintaro
line: There’s no way...

name: Rintaro
line: I... can’t save her.

name: Mayuri
line: Haah, we’re finally home♪

name: Rintaro
line: What are you gonna do now? Head straight home?

name: Mayuri
line: Actually, I was thinking of going to the lab.

name: Rintaro
line: Need something?

name: Mayuri
line: Not really, but it’s been a while since I got to relax with Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: I’m a little hungry, so I’ll buy some Juicy Chicken Number One on the way.

name: Rintaro
line: Back to the lab, then.

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, Okarin. Why did you come with Mayushii today?

name: Mayuri
line: You’ve never come with me to ComiMa before. You’re not interested in moe, right?

name: Rintaro
line: I like robot anime.

name: Mayuri
line: So why did you come with me today?

name: Rintaro
line: Well...

name: Mayuri
line: Well?

name: Rintaro
line: ...I just felt like it.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh...

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako...

name: Rintaro
line: I thought maybe you’d managed to get Lukako to cosplay, so I came to laugh at him. Too bad he didn’t come.

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah... Luka-kun would be super popular if he did come, though.

name: Mayuri
line: People would take his picture and post it all over the internet, then everyone in the world would see how cute he is!

name: Mayuri
line: And after he became a superstar, Mayushii would see him on TV and think, ’wow, he’s gone so far...’

name: Rintaro
line: It’s scary ’cause it’s true.

name: Mayuri
line: ...Okarin?

name: Mayuri
line: Thank you for today.

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you thanking me?

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! Well, like I said, this is the first time Okarin’s ever come to ComiMa with me.

name: Mayuri
line: It made Mayushii really happy♪

name: Mayuri
line: Ah, but you know what would make me even happier? If you cosplay next time!

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah, I’ll think about it.

name: Mayuri
line: Really? You’ll cosplay for me?

name: Rintaro
line: Only if you cosplay too.

name: Rintaro
line: Lukako too... and Christina, of course. Convince them to cosplay first.

name: Rintaro
line: If you manage that, then I, the great and insane mad scientist Hououin Kyouma, will grace ComiMa with my august presence.

name: Mayuri
line: Wow... that’s gonna be tough.

name: Mayuri
line: But it sounds really fun too!

name: Mayuri
line: Besides, I think Chris-chan secretly wants to cosplay. So there’s hope♪

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s gonna do her best!

name: Rintaro
line: Wait here, Mayuri.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin!!

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri!

name: Mayuri
line: O...kari...

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri... I’m sorry. It’s my fault.

name: Mayuri
line: Finally... Mayushii was...

name: Mayuri
line: useful... to Okarin...

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...t?

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri...

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t see the stars from here...

name: Rintaro
line: How could this happen?

name: Rintaro
line: What do you mean, you were finally useful? Tell me, Mayuri...

name: Kurisu
line: There you are.

name: Kurisu
line: What are you doing here?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Nothing.

name: Rintaro
line: How did you know I was here?

name: Kurisu
line: You said you wanted to be alone. I ran the numbers and concluded that I had the greatest probability of finding you here.

name: Rintaro
line: Then leave me alone. You don’t have to look for me. I’m not a lost little boy.

name: Kurisu
line: H-hey! Is that how you treat someone who’s worried about you?

name: Kurisu
line: N-not that I’m worried about you or anything!

name: Kurisu
line: I was going to leave you alone at first.

name: Kurisu
line: But you’ve been acting weird the last couple days. I mean, you’re always weird, but more than usual.

name: Kurisu
line: You look like a kid forced to eat crappy oatmeal. What happened?

name: Rintaro
line: Nothing...

name: Kurisu
line: Then why did you cancel the cracking of SERN?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re the one who said we shouldn’t.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, so you’re afraid of triggering arrest flags. I get it.

name: Rintaro
line: You should praise me for obeying the law for a change.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s not like you at all. What happened to your ego? What happened to the insane mad scientist, Hououin Kyo--

name: Rintaro
line: To hell with my ego!

name: Rintaro
line: This time, it’s not that simple.

name: Rintaro
line: I have to choose which friend to let die. It would be so much easier if I knew what was right.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Which friend to let die? What are you talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m just a student, Christina. You know?

name: Rintaro
line: The insane mad scientist Hououin Kyouma? That’s just a fantasy. A character I made up. I bet you had no idea.

name: Kurisu
line: Uh... I may have figured that out when we first met.

name: Rintaro
line: When we first met...

name: Kurisu
line: Tell me, Okabe. What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Do I have to tell you?

name: Kurisu
line: You’ve never hesitated to ask me for help before.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t hold back now.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Then prepare yourself.

name: Rintaro
line: What I’m about to tell you is the absolute truth.

name: Rintaro
line: And it could also be... your death sentence.

name: Rintaro
line: Remember what I told you before? When we delete the D-Mail from SERN’s database, we’ll reach the Beta worldline, where Mayuri doesn’t die.

name: Kurisu
line: And where SERN doesn’t take over the world, right. Everyone lives. Everyone is free. You made it sound perfect.

name: Rintaro
line: Perfect? It’s anything but.

name: Rintaro
line: I showed you the first D-Mail, didn’t I? The one that started it all.

name: Rintaro
line: On the Beta worldline, the events described in that D-Mail actually happened.

name: Rintaro
line: Kurisu. On the Beta worldline...

name: Rintaro
line: You die on July 28th.

name: Rintaro
line: And according to the attractor field model, nothing can prevent that from happening.

name: Rintaro
line: If I want to save Mayuri, I have no choice... but to let you die!

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: How credible do you find this attractor field model?

name: Rintaro
line: Credible?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s all secondhand info from John Titor -- from Amane-san, isn’t it?

name: Kurisu
line: I get that it’s the accepted model in 2036.

name: Kurisu
line: But how exactly did scientists prove the existence of attractor fields?

name: Rintaro
line: Are you trying to say the model may be wrong? But I know for certain that convergence exists. I’ve experienced it firsthand.

name: Kurisu
line: Even if they’re right about convergence...

name: Kurisu
line: What about the relationship between worldlines?

name: Rintaro
line: The moment I change worldlines, everything is reconstructed. Past, present, and future.

name: Kurisu
line: But that’s just from your perspective, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: Once you go to the Beta worldline, the ’me’ that your brain perceives will die.

name: Kurisu
line: In other words, your perspective will have chosen the worldline where I die instead of the one where I don’t. However...

name: Kurisu
line: Why can’t the world your brain perceives be different from the world my brain perceives?

name: Rintaro
line: So you’re saying worldlines are independent?

name: Kurisu
line: Like trains, maybe.

name: Rintaro
line: Trains?

name: Kurisu
line: Um, let me give you an easy example...

name: Kurisu
line: If I want to take the train from Akiba to Yokohama, which route should I use?

name: Rintaro
line: I didn’t know you were a railfan.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s just an example. Geez.

name: Kurisu
line: You choose to take the Yamanote Line to Tokyo Station, then transfer to the Tokaido Main Line for the rest of your trip.

name: Kurisu
line: But I take the Yamanote Line to Osaki, then transfer to the Shonan-Shinjuku Line.

name: Kurisu
line: Another person -- say, Hashida-san -- might decide to take the Keihin Tohoku Line for some reason.

name: Kurisu
line: And Mayuri might ride the Shinkansen from Tokyo.

name: Kurisu
line: You and I ride the same train until Tokyo Station. But from there, we ride different lines, while still aiming for the same destination.

name: Rintaro
line: And that applies to the universe? You’re claiming the existence of parallel worlds?

name: Kurisu
line: ...I like to use my imagination too, sometimes.

name: Kurisu
line: But where’s the proof that there’s only one world?

name: Rintaro
line: Suzuha said so... and then there’s Reading Steiner.

name: Kurisu
line: In other words, an unknown time traveler and your unexplainable super power.

name: Rintaro
line: But we knew Suzuha...

name: Kurisu
line: There’s no way to prove that she was Hashida’s daughter, or anything she said about 2036 either. Not without going there ourselves.

name: Kurisu
line: And if Reading Steiner is what you say, then it means that your subjective experience influences the memories of every single human being.

name: Kurisu
line: That’s completely absurd, Okabe. If it’s true, then you’re literally a god.

name: Kurisu
line: But there are no gods in reality.

name: Kurisu
line: The world doesn’t revolve around you.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s just your brain making you believe that it does.

name: Kurisu
line: If that makes you this world’s god, then I must be a god too. My brain is just as big as yours.

name: Rintaro
line: What are you trying to say?

name: Kurisu
line: Let’s say you choose the worldline where I die. That doesn’t mean I have to do the same.

name: Kurisu
line: The fact is that I am standing here right now, observing the world with my own subjectivity.

name: Kurisu
line: I already exist on a worldline where I don’t die.

name: Kurisu
line: Even if your perspective shifts to the Beta worldline, my perspective might remain here.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s a question of where the soul lies. And I won’t let you have your way with my soul.

name: Rintaro
line: No true scientist would accept a hypothesis that flimsy.

name: Kurisu
line: But there’s a chance I’m right.

name: Kurisu
line: So you have nothing to worry about.

name: Kurisu
line: The problem is that you don’t want to let me die, right?

name: Kurisu
line: But if my hypothesis is correct, I’ll still be alive on another possible worldline.

name: Kurisu
line: So there’s no reason to be afraid.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s just a hypothesis.

name: Kurisu
line: The same is true of attractor fields.

name: Kurisu
line: It hasn’t been proven. Even if someone did prove it by 2036, that doesn’t help us here in the present.

name: Kurisu
line: In other words...

name: Kurisu
line: Anything is possible.

name: Kurisu
line: You really don’t have to worry about me, Okabe. It would just hurt my pride if you did.

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t say it like that.

name: Kurisu
line: Your phone’s ringing.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh, yeah. It’s Mayuri.

name: Kurisu
line: Answer it. I don’t mind.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hello?

name: Mayuri
line: Ah...

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah...

name: Rintaro
line: What’s wrong?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, I heard from Daru-kun that Okarin’s been acting kinda strange.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii was so preoccupied with ComiMa, she didn’t really notice...

name: Mayuri
line: Even though she usually notices right away when Okarin’s not happy...

name: Mayuri
line: I’m sorry, Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, did something happen?

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: There’s... nothing wrong.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh...

name: Mayuri
line: You know, you used to talk to Mayushii about a lot of things, remember?

name: Mayuri
line: Like, umm, the Organization’s four leaders. Their names are Back Turkish, Virginian Burp, Balloon Drag Queen, and Wide-eye Gore, right?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Black Tortoise, Vermilion Bird, Blue Dragon, and White Tiger.

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah, that!

name: Mayuri
line: You know, it was really fun talking to Okarin about stuff like that...

name: Mayuri
line: But now...

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Okarin? If Mayushii’s a burden... just say so, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: What!? I never...!

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe. I’m hanging up now. If you feel like talking to Mayushii about anything, just call okay?

name: Mayuri
line: Tutturu♪

name: Kurisu
line: What did Mayuri say?

name: Kurisu
line: You’re such a wimp. I’m disappointed in you.

name: Rintaro
line: Aren’t you afraid of dying?

name: Kurisu
line: Did you not hear what I just said?

name: Rintaro
line: I heard, but--

name: Rintaro
line: How are you a burden!? Don’t say things like that, dammit!

name: Rintaro
line: Why is she only serious at times like this!?

name: Kurisu
line: A burden, huh...

name: Rintaro
line: I’ve never felt Mayuri was a burden. Not once.

name: Kurisu
line: Then you should tell her that.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: The old you wouldn’t have worried about anything.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, you should go see Mayuri.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m sure she has a lot to say.

name: Mayuri
line: Hey, Granny.

name: Mayuri
line: I’ve been having scary dreams lately.

name: Mayuri
line: In my dreams, bad things keep happening to me.

name: Mayuri
line: Like someone shoots me, or a car hits me, or I get run over by a train...

name: Mayuri
line: It’s so real. It hurts so much, and I feel so sad, and I try to call for help but nothing comes out...

name: Mayuri
line: Why do you think I’m having these dreams?

name: Mayuri
line: And you know, they always end the same way...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s crying, and Okarin comes to save me.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii tries to say ’thank you, Okarin,’ but Okarin can’t hear my voice.

name: Mayuri
line: He holds Mayushii, and makes a very sad face like he’s going to cry. But he never does, you know? I can tell he’s forcing himself not to cry.

name: Mayuri
line: That makes Mayushii even more sad. I try to say ’sorry, sorry,’ but he still can’t hear.

name: Mayuri
line: And that’s when I wake up.

name: Mayuri
line: Why am I having these dreams?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, right! We have a lot more lab mems now, you know!

name: Mayuri
line: There’s Chris-chan, Moeka-san, Luka-kun, and Feris-chan. There’s also Suzu-san, but she moved away.

name: Mayuri
line: That makes eight of us. It’s really amazing.

name: Mayuri
line: You know, it was just Okarin and Mayushii at first.

name: Mayuri
line: Back then, Okarin seemed kinda bored most of the time.

name: Mayuri
line: But now, he’s having so much fun.

name: Mayuri
line: And that makes Mayushii happy too!

name: Mayuri
line: It’s so busy, but it’s really exciting.

name: Mayuri
line: Especially now that Chris-chan is here. She’s really smart, you know. She got a paper published in a famous magazine!

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii really admires her.

name: Mayuri
line: She even made a time machine! Oh, but can’t forget Okarin and Daru-kun helped too.

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, sometimes I remember...

name: Mayuri
line: Back when it was just the two of us.

name: Mayuri
line: When Mayushii had only just become Okarin’s hostage.

name: Mayuri
line: I’d go to the lab after school, but Okarin wouldn’t be there. So I’d tidy up the room, and decorate it with cute things. Then Okarin would finally show up a little later.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii would say ’welcome back’. But instead of saying ’I’m back,’ Okarin would say ’Good work,’ like a big boss or something.

name: Mayuri
line: Every day, we’d spend a few hours just hanging out, doing nothing, and then we’d go home together.

name: Mayuri
line: We didn’t talk much, but it wasn’t bad.

name: Mayuri
line: We were just there... together, you know?

name: Mayuri
line: We’d sit next to each other on the sofa. Okarin would work on his big plans, and Mayushii would read manga or play games.

name: Mayuri
line: And sometimes we’d have a snack together.

name: Mayuri
line: It was so nice and relaxing...

name: Mayuri
line: I never wanted to leave.

name: Mayuri
line: I’d start feeling like a real hostage, and I’d laugh ’ehehe’ to myself.

name: Mayuri
line: Then Okarin would turn to me and say...

name: Rintaro
line: Did something good happen?

name: Mayuri
line: Yup. Well, not really, but kinda.

name: Rintaro
line: Ah, it must have been an illusion. We could be under attack from Illusion Conductor, one of the Organization’s feared agents.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh... gotta be careful, then. But you know, I’m sure that Mr.Illusion Kidhugger--

name: Rintaro
line: Conductor. Not Kidhugger.

name: Mayuri
line: I’m sure he’s not a bad guy.

name: Mayuri
line: I felt so happy there.

name: Mayuri
line: So happy I could cry.

name: Mayuri
line: I wanted to stay like that forever.

name: Mayuri
line: Ah! But that doesn’t mean I don’t like how things are now, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: You know, I haven’t talked to Okarin much lately.

name: Mayuri
line: Maybe Mayushii’s getting a little lonely.

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, I don’t want to be a burden on Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s just one big nuisance, isn’t she...

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Granny?

name: Mayuri
line: ...I can’t stay like this forever, can I?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course you can!

name: Mayuri
line: Huh?

name: Mayuri
line: It’s Okarin♪

name: Mayuri
line: Wow, how’d you know I was here?

name: Rintaro
line: I always know where my hostage is.

name: Mayuri
line: Hostage...

name: Rintaro
line: You cannot escape my grasp. Not ever.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh...

name: Mayuri
line: But don’t wear yourself out, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii’s a little worried.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Hououin Kyouma is not so weak as to require your concern.

name: Rintaro
line: When the time comes, I’ll tell you everything.

name: Mayuri
line: ...Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: So stay with me until then, like you always have.

name: Mayuri
line: ...Okay.

name: Mayuri
line: Let’s head back, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: Shouldn’t we get some dango for ourselves first?

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe! Of course♪

name: Kurisu
line: ...Okabe.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re alive...

name: Kurisu
line: Right. I forgot I might run into you here.

name: Rintaro
line: What were you doing?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Thinking.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh...

name: Rintaro
line: Looks like I’m in your way, so I’ll just go.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Oh, okay.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey. It’s raining.

name: Kurisu
line: Huh? Oh, yeah.

name: Rintaro
line: Whoa!

name: Kurisu
line: What the hell!?

name: Kurisu
line: Whew, what a surprise.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s what you get for tempting the sky gods.

name: Kurisu
line: You should’ve warned me sooner. Even my underwear’s soaked.

name: Rintaro
line: Same here. I bet you’re glad it’s dark, huh?

name: Kurisu
line: What do you mean?

name: Rintaro
line: If the lights were on, I’d be able to see everything.

name: Kurisu
line: Ugh, I forgot that you’re a perv too.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re the one who announced that your underwear was wet.

name: Kurisu
line: J-just drop it! If you’re imagining what color my underwear is, I’ll kill you!

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not imagining anything.

name: Kurisu
line: Achoo!

name: Rintaro
line: Cold?

name: Kurisu
line: I’m not stripping naked, if that’s what you’re suggesting! Your pervy tricks won’t work on me!

name: Rintaro
line: Who said strip!? Calm down, will you!?

name: Kurisu
line: Grr...

name: Rintaro
line: But if you want to strip, go right ahead. I can’t make out your scrawny figure in this light anyway.

name: Kurisu
line: Another word, and I’ll make you eat your cerebral neocortex with ponzu sauce!

name: Rintaro
line: S-sorry.

name: Kurisu
line: A storm like that shouldn’t last long. Guess we’ll just wait it out.

name: Kurisu
line: H-hey, get your own stair!

name: Kurisu
line: W-what?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re the one who said not to speak.

name: Kurisu
line: Y-you’re too close...

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t come any closer, okay? You can stay where you are, but come any closer, and I’ll push you away, okay?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Don’t look at me.

name: Rintaro
line: Impossible! How can you see where I’m looking!?

name: Kurisu
line: So you were looking.

name: Rintaro
line: Damn. Must have caught on something when we ran inside.

name: Kurisu
line: What are you talking about?

name: Rintaro
line: Just a little tear in my coat.

name: Kurisu
line: Is clumsiness one of your character traits?

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t be ridiculous. I am a mad scientist. I bear the curse of insanity, not clumsiness.

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah, yeah.

name: Kurisu
line: Give it here.

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Kurisu
line: I happen to have a sewing kit with me. I’ll stitch it up for you.

name: Rintaro
line: A sewing kit? You?

name: Kurisu
line: Something wrong with that?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re an experiment-loving girl. You’re not supposed to be... domestic.

name: Kurisu
line: Can’t I be a domestic experiment-loving girl?

name: Rintaro
line: You? Domestic?

name: Kurisu
line: Relatively, maybe. Well, actually, I don’t know the domesticity index for Japanese high school girls these days.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s wet, so it’s kinda hard to thread.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Did you really just happen to have that on you?

name: Kurisu
line: Get over it already. Is it really so wrong for me to have a sewing kit?

name: Rintaro
line: It’s not wrong. It just seems like you planned for this.

name: Kurisu
line: So you’re saying I brought it with me because I somehow knew your coat was going to get ripped. Uh-huh.

name: Kurisu
line: Ridiculous.

name: Kurisu
line: And before you get the wrong idea, I’m not fixing your coat because I want to or anything, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Nice tsundere line.

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t mock me. You just happened to tear your clothes, and I just happened to have a sewing kit handy when you did. It’s coincidence. That’s all.

name: Rintaro
line: Coincidence...

name: Rintaro
line: Hey... you didn’t time leap, did you?

name: Kurisu
line: So now you’re saying that I went back in time for the sole purpose of repairing your stupid lab coat. Uh-huh.

name: Kurisu
line: Ridiculous. Ridiculous! There. It’s so important I said it twice. Comprendes?

name: Rintaro
line: You’re right. If you had time leaped, you would’ve brought a towel, not a sewing kit.

name: Kurisu
line: What’s that, sarcasm? All you do is complain.

name: Kurisu
line: Here.

name: Rintaro
line: Thanks.

name: Kurisu
line: Um, by the way... it was dark, so I couldn’t really see.

name: Kurisu
line: If it turns out bad, it’s not my fault. It was dark. That’s all.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, and I hope you like the color. Because I have no idea which thread I used.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s... random?

name: Kurisu
line: Black, red, or pink. Those are the three possibilities.

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s just hope it’s not pink...

name: Kurisu
line: Achoo!

name: Rintaro
line: Cold?

name: Kurisu
line: I guess.

name: Rintaro
line: Take my coat.

name: Kurisu
line: But it’s wet.

name: Rintaro
line: Well, yeah, but...

name: Kurisu
line: ...Have you made your decision yet?

name: Kurisu
line: Sigh... You still haven’t made up your mind?

name: Kurisu
line: You like Mayuri, don’t you?

name: Rintaro
line: What?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s probably just my imagination, but lately, I’ve been seeing things. Like a strange sort of deja vu.

name: Kurisu
line: In these visions, you’re fighting to save Mayuri all by yourself. You never give up, no matter how much it hurts.

name: Kurisu
line: Then you come to me for help. You’re so desperate, so earnest, that I just have to do what I can.

name: Kurisu
line: N-not that I’m doing it for you, okay!? I just want to save Mayuri, that’s all.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, these images are stuck in my head, like memories.

name: Kurisu
line: I tried self-analysis. Maybe I’m mistaking dreams for reality, projecting my hopes and fantasies... I don’t know.

name: Kurisu
line: But there’s one thing I do know.

name: Kurisu
line: You have to save Mayuri.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Aren’t you afraid?

name: Kurisu
line: You know, it kinda feels like we’re trapped in an ancient ruin.

name: Kurisu
line: Like the world ended...

name: Kurisu
line: And we’re the only two people left.

name: Kurisu
line: I’ve been thinking.

name: Kurisu
line: Say you go to the Beta worldline, and everyone else goes with you.

name: Kurisu
line: What if I can’t go with you? What if I’m the only one left behind?

name: Kurisu
line: Would the entire world become like this place?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s just a theory... but I can’t help but wonder.

name: Rintaro
line: I’ll save you. Not just Mayuri, but--

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t make promises you can’t keep!

name: Kurisu
line: You asked me if I wasn’t afraid.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Of course I’m afraid.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe I’ll disappear. Maybe I’ll be left behind all alone.

name: Kurisu
line: Or maybe only you will disappear and everything else will stay the same.

name: Kurisu
line: The world will continue, and nobody will even know that you existed. I’ll go back to America as if nothing ever happened.

name: Kurisu
line: Maybe... maybe... maybe!

name: Kurisu
line: I feel hopeless, just thinking about all the possibilities.

name: Kurisu
line: But even so!

name: Kurisu
line: Do you think I would tell you to let Mayuri die!?

name: Rintaro
line: Kurisu...

name: Kurisu
line: Jesus, it’s cold!

name: Kurisu
line: It’s because of these wet clothes! This sucks.

name: Kurisu
line: Anyway, enough of this nonsense. It’s nothing but conjecture. Baseless. Worthless. I want to cut open my skull and excise the part of my brain that comes up with these delusions.

name: Kurisu
line: Listen, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: You can’t save both of us. Correct?

name: Kurisu
line: No matter how you struggle, it’s one or the other.

name: Rintaro
line: But...

name: Kurisu
line: No buts. My answer won’t change.

name: Kurisu
line: Save Mayuri.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you telling me to give up!? To abandon you!?

name: Rintaro
line: I could never do that!

name: Kurisu
line: You can, and you must! There’s no other way.

name: Rintaro
line: No! You’re our friend! I won’t abandon you!

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe!

name: Kurisu
line: Is there another solution? There isn’t, is there?

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t want to live if it means sacrificing Mayuri!

name: Kurisu
line: If you don’t save her, I’ll never forgive you!

name: Rintaro
line: Guh...

name: Rintaro
line: But you’re right here!

name: Rintaro
line: Why does it have to be this way!?

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe...

name: Kurisu
line: Thank you. I know you’re hurting for me.

name: Kurisu
line: But you’ve done enough. I’m fine, so just think about Mayuri, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: ...I’m sorry.

name: Rintaro
line: I want to save Mayuri... more than anything.

name: Rintaro
line: I... can’t save you.

name: Kurisu
line: ...I know.

name: Kurisu
line: Well then.

name: Kurisu
line: I’m heading back.

name: Rintaro
line: Back? Where?

name: Kurisu
line: The lab, of course. I need to dry my clothes. I wanna take a shower, too.

name: Kurisu
line: You stay here and soak for a while.

name: Kurisu
line: Understand?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Understand.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh... heh heh heh...

name: Mayuri
line: Anyone here?

name: Mayuri
line: It’s Okarin!

name: Rintaro
line: What’s up?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh, nothing. I just decided to stop by. Ehehe♪

name: Mayuri
line: You know, I haven’t talked much with Okarin lately.

name: Mayuri
line: But you know, I don’t want to be a burden on Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: Did you take a shower?

name: Mayuri
line: You smell good, like shampoo.

name: Rintaro
line: S-stop that!

name: Mayuri
line: You know... I didn’t go to ComiMa today.

name: Rintaro
line: Hm? Why?

name: Mayuri
line: I was thinking about Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: When I got to Ariake, I remembered how sad you looked, and then I thought, ’I shouldn’t be having fun at ComiMa.’

name: Mayuri
line: So I turned around and came all the way back.

name: Rintaro
line: Oh... Sorry for making you worry.

name: Mayuri
line: You know, I haven’t talked much with Okarin lately.

name: Mayuri
line: Maybe Mayushii’s getting a little lonely.

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri. How would you feel... if I said I was keeping a secret from you?

name: Mayuri
line: You mean like... Okarin and Chris-chan are actually dating?

name: Rintaro
line: Where did that come from?

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin and Chris-chan get along really well, right? I think you two are meant for each other.

name: Rintaro
line: ...No, it’s nothing like that.

name: Mayuri
line: Oh... okay...

name: Mayuri
line: You don’t have to tell me everything, if you don’t want to.

name: Mayuri
line: Besides, it’s normal to keep secrets from your hostage.

name: Rintaro
line: This isn’t the time for that!

name: Mayuri
line: ...Mayushii doesn’t want to be a burden.

name: Mayuri
line: So I’ll wait until Okarin’s ready to tell me.

name: Mayuri
line: Just like I said yesterday, remember?

name: Rintaro
line: ...And if decide to never tell you?

name: Mayuri
line: Well, I’d be curious... really curious... but if that’s what you want...

name: Rintaro
line: Even if my secret involves you?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii?

name: Rintaro
line: I haven’t told you because I don’t want to hurt you.

name: Mayuri
line: ...Is that why Okarin looks so sad all the time?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, then I do want to know.

name: Mayuri
line: I don’t like it when Okarin’s sad.

name: Rintaro
line: Even if it means you might get hurt?

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii doesn’t want to be a burden.

name: Mayuri
line: When Mayushii was sad because of what happened to Granny, Okarin took Mayushii hostage, remember?

name: Mayuri
line: That’s why Mayushii always thought. That whenever Okarin’s sad, she could lend her strength to him, you know?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii might not be useful, though...

name: Mayuri
line: Finally... Mayushii was...

name: Mayuri
line: useful... to Okarin...

name: Mayuri
line: I don’t want to see you hurting...

name: Rintaro
line: ...Very well.

name: Rintaro
line: Take a seat.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, can I get some snacks?

name: Rintaro
line: This is serious, remember?

name: Mayuri
line: Oh... right.

name: Mayuri
line: Okay, ready.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Everything I’m about to tell you is true. It’s related to those dreams you had.

name: Rintaro
line: I plan to sacrifice one of our friends for your sake.

name: Mayuri
line: Eh? Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: Heh heh heh... you will soon regret your curiosity, my dear. For the deeds of the great Hououin Kyouma are many and terrible! Muhahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: By sacrificing Makise Kurisu, I will embark upon a journey to a glorious new world!

name: Rintaro
line: And that is the plan most grand and devious of the insane mad scientist, Hououin Kyouma! I call it... Made in Heaven! Muhahahaha!

name: Rintaro
line: ...What’s the matter?

name: Mayuri
line: The whole time you and Chris-chan were hurting...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii was making costumes... like nothing was wrong...

name: Mayuri
line: I feel so stupid!

name: Mayuri
line: I didn’t know anything!

name: Rintaro
line: O-of course you didn’t! That’s how I planned it.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you disappointed in me, Mayuri? Sorry, but this is who I am. I will do anything, sacrifice anyone to accomplish my goals. Whether you like it our not, you’re coming with me to the Beta worldline.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re my hostage, and you have no say in the matter. Heh heh heh!

name: Rintaro
line: Let chaos descend upon the world! That is the choice of Steins Gate!

name: Rintaro
line: Where are you going!?

name: Mayuri
line: I need to see Chris-chan!

name: Mayuri
line: Please, Okarin. I have to talk to her!

name: Kurisu
line: Thanks for coming to see me off.

name: Rintaro
line: Does that suitcase mean what I think it does?

name: Kurisu
line: Hm? Oh. Yeah, it does.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re going back to America.

name: Kurisu
line: I was supposed to go back at the beginning of the month. But then I ran into a certain mad scientist, and ended up staying longer than planned.

name: Kurisu
line: There’s nothing else I can help you with anyway. And I don’t want to be a liability.

name: Kurisu
line: What’s wrong, Mayuri? Are you feeling sick?

name: Rintaro
line: C’mon, Mayuri.

name: Mayuri
line: Chris-chan!

name: Kurisu
line: W-whoa, what’s going on!?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii doesn’t want Chris-chan to disappear!

name: Mayuri
line: You can’t disappear. Not for Mayushii! Okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Mayuri...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii doesn’t want to live if Chris-chan has to die!

name: Rintaro
line: This is the way it has to be. I chose you, Mayuri. You have an obligation to live.

name: Rintaro
line: Kurisu and I made a pact. She agreed to trade her life for yours. If that sacred covenant is broken, this world is doomed!

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t put Kurisu’s feelings to waste, Mayuri!

name: Mayuri
line: But... but...

name: Kurisu
line: Thank you, Mayuri.

name: Kurisu
line: But this was my decision too. I’m okay with it. Really.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe loves you, you know.

name: Mayuri
line: Wha...?

name: Rintaro
line: Wh-wh-wha-what are you saying!?

name: Kurisu
line: It’s true, isn’t it?

name: Kurisu
line: It would make him really sad if you died. You don’t want him to be sad, do you?

name: Mayuri
line: But if Chris-chan goes away, it’ll make Mayushii sad...

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah... I know. It makes me sad too.

name: Kurisu
line: But this was going to happen eventually. I had to go back to America sooner or later.

name: Kurisu
line: So even if you move to another worldline, just think of me as being in America. It’s practically the same thing.

name: Mayuri
line: That’s not the problem! I don’t want Chris-chan to disappear!

name: Mayuri
line: Let’s stop this, okay? Don’t make Chris-chan disappear!

name: Kurisu
line: You have to listen to us now, Mayuri.

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe. Don’t ever let go of her again.

name: Rintaro
line: ...I know.

name: Kurisu
line: Well, I’m off.

name: Kurisu
line: Thank god I’ll never have to see your silly face again!

name: Mayuri
line: Don’t go, Chris-chan! Please, don’t go!

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t follow me!

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t want pity. It will only make it worse.

name: Kurisu
line: This is my decision. Nothing you can say will change my mind.

name: Kurisu
line: ...Goodbye.

name: Kurisu
line: Promise me, Mayuri. Promise me you’ll find happiness.

name: Mayuri
line: I’m sorry... I’m sorry... I’m sorry...

name: Rintaro
line: You have nothing to apologize for. This was my decision, and mine alone.

name: Rintaro
line: Kurisu will disappear, for I chose not to save her.

name: Rintaro
line: I chose... to bring chaos to the world.

name: Rintaro
line: You can’t forgive me, can you, Mayuri? Then hate me.

name: Rintaro
line: But even then, you’re staying with me to the end.

name: Rintaro
line: I have chosen.

name: Rintaro
line: To save you, I will let Kurisu die.

name: Rintaro
line: So hate me, loathe me, curse my name...

name: Rintaro
line: But I... will not turn back.

name: Rintaro
line: Nobody can stop me now.

name: Mayuri
line: Sniff... Okarin?

name: Mayuri
line: Tell me how you really feel...

name: Mayuri
line: I want to know what’s in your heart... your honest feelings...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii doesn’t want to be a burden any more.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re not a burden! How can you think that!?

name: Rintaro
line: This is about me. Because I want to save you, because I can’t bear to lose you!

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah... Thank you, Okarin... thank you...

name: Mayuri
line: I’ve been having scary dreams lately.

name: Mayuri
line: In those dreams, you always try to save me.

name: Mayuri
line: They weren’t dreams, were they?

name: Mayuri
line: You were fighting to save Mayushii, weren’t you?

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Okarin? You know...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii loves you.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii can smile every day because you’re there for me.

name: Mayuri
line: Can we be together from now on, too?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course.

name: Rintaro
line: How can you ask that?

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t want to be apart from you either!

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii will find happiness.

name: Mayuri
line: Just like I promised Chris-chan.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah.

name: Mayuri
line: Let’s be happy together...

name: Rintaro
line: We will.

name: Mayuri
line: Never let go of me...

name: Rintaro
line: I won’t!

name: Mayuri
line: Let me love you forever...

name: Rintaro
line: Of course.

name: Rintaro
line: The time has come. We will now commence the final phase of Operation Verthandi.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru. You may begin.

name: Itaru
line: ...You sure?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah.

name: Itaru
line: Okey-dokey!

name: Itaru
line: Okarin, I found it! It’s really there!

name: Rintaro
line: The D-Mail I sent? It’s there!?

name: Itaru
line: It sure is, man.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s okay.

name: Itaru
line: Everything’s set. One press of the enter key, and that data’s gone.

name: Itaru
line: I leave that honor to you, Okarin.

name: Rintaro
line: Victory is at hand!

name: Rintaro
line: With unimaginable brilliance and unwavering conviction, I have defeated our vast and powerful enemy and now stand triumphant on the field of Ragnarok!

name: Rintaro
line: I give thanks to the comrades... whose sacrifice made this victory possible!

name: Rintaro
line: The coming world... is the world I wished for!

name: Rintaro
line: This is the choice of Steins Gate!

name: Rintaro
line: El Psy Kongroo!

name: Rintaro
line: Let the world be reborn!

name: Mayuri
line: What’s wrong, Okarin?

name: Rintaro
line: Say, Mayuri.

name: Mayuri
line: Yeah?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Who was Lab Mem 004 again?

name: Mayuri
line: 004? But Okarin, there’s only three lab mems, remember? Okarin, Mayushii, and Daru-kun.

name: Rintaro
line: Yeah... right. Our lab doesn’t have a fourth member. It never did...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin? Something really sad happened, didn’t it?

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii is here for you, Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin... don’t cry...

name: Rintaro
line: Please don’t leave me, Mayuri... Please... stay by my side... forever...

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii will always be with you...

name: Mayuri
line: Always. Just like this...

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin♪

name: Mayuri
line: Ah... sniff...

name: Rintaro
line: Wh-why are you crying!?

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin came to pick me up...

name: Mayuri
line: You waited for Mayushii... I’m so happy!

name: Rintaro
line: Don’t get so happy over every little thing.

name: Mayuri
line: Ehehe♪

name: Mayuri
line: So Mayushii class-changed from Hostage to Girlfriend, right?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Indeed.

name: Mayuri

name: Kurisu

name: Kurisu

name: Kurisu

name: Rintaro

name: Kurisu
line: Kuh...

name: Kurisu
line: Have it your way! But I’m not helping. I’m going back to America, and that’s that.

name: Rintaro
line: Kuh...

name: Kurisu

name: Kurisu
line: Running away?

line: Why...

line: Time leaping is just running away.

name: Rintaro

line: I feel like I’m losing my humanity.

name: Rintaro

name: Rintaro
line: Or maybe I just haven’t mastered it yet. Maybe I haven’t tapped into its full potential.

name: Kurisu
line: Running only makes it hurt more.

name: Kurisu
line: I should know.

name: Kurisu
line: Look at yourself, Okabe. You look like you’ve aged a decade.

name: Kurisu
line: Your heart can’t take it anymore. You don’t need to beat yourself up like this. Just accept the truth.

name: Kurisu
line: Like I said, you can’t stay here.

name: Kurisu
line: Go to the Beta worldline. Go to the world where Mayuri doesn’t die.

name: Kurisu
line: Not just for your sake, but for mine as well.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey! Could you not talk about me like that? I’m perfectly fine.

name: Kurisu
line: Let’s say we wanted to make a machine that could physically transport people through time. What would we need?

name: Kurisu
line: Who the hell’s Christina!? I never said that!

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t want to deny who I’ve been. Because even my failures are a part of who I am today.

name: Kurisu
line: We may have created a monster here...

name: Kurisu
line: You said I was your friend, remember? You said I was important to you. That made me really... happy, I guess...

name: Kurisu
line: Once we’re done upgrading the PhoneWave... I want you to come with me.

name: Kurisu
line: I want to be your strength.

name: Kurisu
line: Thank you. I know you’re hurting for me.

name: Rintaro
line: ...can’t save you.

name: Rintaro
line: I’m sorry...

name: Rintaro
line: Why does it have to be you? Why!?

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: Once you go to the Beta worldline, Mayuri and Hashida will forget the time we spent together, right?

name: Kurisu
line: Will you... remember me?

name: Rintaro
line: Of course I’ll remember you. Of course I will!

name: Rintaro
line: There’s no way I could ever forget the girl most important to me!

name: Kurisu
line: Eh? Y-you mean...

name: Kurisu
line: Wh-what the hell are you saying!?

name: Rintaro
line: The truth.

name: Kurisu
line: B-but... proof. I need proof. I can’t come up with a formula otherwise!

name: Kurisu
line: When the anterior pituitary gland hypersecretes ACTH, and gamma waves induce stochastic resonance, we can assume an infinite Hausdorff dimension for the Hilbert curve.

name: Kurisu
line: That is, we can measure the asymptotic line with positron emission tomography...?

name: Rintaro
line: Kurisu.

name: Rintaro
line: I love you.

name: Rintaro
line: And you?

name: Kurisu
line: Eh!? Wh-what!?

name: Rintaro
line: Do you, uh... How do you feel about me?

name: Kurisu
line: Y-you want to know?

name: Kurisu
line: Close your eyes!

name: Rintaro
line: Why close my--

name: Kurisu
line: Just shut up and close them!

name: Kurisu
line: nn...

name: Rintaro
line: Wha... wha...

name: Kurisu
line: I-it’s not like I did it... because I wanted to or anything.

name: Kurisu
line: It’s just... you promised... that you wouldn’t forget about me.

name: Kurisu
line: Research shows that memories are harder to forget when coupled with intense emotions.

name: Kurisu
line: Y-you’re a virgin and a perv, so I was sure you’d have an elaborative rehearsal on your first kiss, instantly making it a long-term memory you’d never forget... so...

name: Kurisu
line: I just don’t want you to forget about me, Okabe. No matter what.

name: Rintaro
line: S-sorry to disappoint you.

name: Rintaro
line: That wasn’t my first kiss.

name: Kurisu
line: W-why you... You’re just a cherry boy!

name: Rintaro
line: Shut up, virgin.

name: Kurisu
line: So it wasn’t your first...

name: Rintaro
line: Right. So it only left a weak impression. Probably not enough to become a long-term memory.

name: Rintaro
line: So, once more.

name: Kurisu
line: Wha...

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t ever want to forget... so let’s make doubly sure.

name: Kurisu
line: Th-then I guess there’s no choice...

name: Kurisu
line: Just a kiss... okay?

name: Kurisu
line: Be gentle... okay?

name: Kurisu
line: Okabe...

name: Kurisu
line: Mm...

name: Kurisu
line: Don’t forget me...

name: Kurisu
line: mm...

name: Kurisu
line: It’s too fast...

name: Kurisu
line: Time is going by too fast.

name: Kurisu
line: I could really use a word with Einstein right now.

name: Kurisu
line: Time is not absolute.

name: Kurisu
line: Einstein proved that time could be fast or slow, depending on the observer.

name: Kurisu
line: Hey, Okabe.

name: Kurisu
line: The theory of relativity is so romantic...

name: Kurisu
line: ...and so sad, don’t you think?

name: Kurisu
line: ...Well then.

name: Rintaro
line: Are you sure I shouldn’t call Mayuri and Daru?

name: Kurisu
line: ...I think that would just make it harder.

name: Kurisu
line: But you, I have no trouble leaving behind.

name: Kurisu
line: ...That was a joke.

name: Rintaro
line: This is a souvenir. Take it.

name: Kurisu
line: Uh... no thanks.

name: Rintaro
line: Just take it. It’s not even that bulky.

name: Kurisu
line: Oh, fine. I guess I’ll take it.

name: Rintaro
line: Sorry I couldn’t go with you to Aomori...

name: Kurisu
line: Yeah...

name: Kurisu
line: But these two weeks were fun, in their own way.

name: Kurisu
line: Give my regards to Mayuri and Hashida, okay?

name: Kurisu
line: Hang in there, Okabe.

name: Rintaro
line: ...Stay well.

name: Rintaro
line: I will remember you, Makise Kurisu. I will remember your warmth.

name: Rintaro
line: I will never forget!

name: Rintaro
line: The time has come. We will now commence the final phase of Operation Verthandi.

name: Rintaro
line: Daru. You may begin.

line: ...You sure?

name: Rintaro
line: ...Yeah.

line: Okey-dokey!

line: Okarin, I found it! It’s really there!

name: Rintaro
line: The D-Mail I sent? It’s there!?

name: Itaru
line: It sure is, man.

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin...

name: Rintaro
line: It’s okay.

name: Itaru

line: I leave that honor to you, Okarin.

line: Victory is at hand!

line: With unimaginable brilliance and unwavering conviction, I have defeated our vast and powerful enemy and now stand triumphant on the field of Ragnarok!

name: Rintaro
line: I give thanks to the comrades... whose sacrifice made this victory possible!

name: Rintaro
line: The coming world... is the world I wished for!

name: Rintaro
line: This is the choice of Steins Gate!

name: Rintaro
line: Let the world be reborn!

line: Goodbye.

line: Okabe, I lo--

line: ...Hey, who was Lab Mem 004 again?

line: Okarin, there isn’t a 4th lab mem, remember?
