line: Are you going to introduce a new member? Requesting cute girl.

name: Rintaro
line: Heh... heh heh... MUHAHAHAHA!

name: Rintaro
line: The last battle of Ragnarok is won!

name: Rintaro
line: I, the insane mad scientist Hououin Kyouma, with an IQ rivaling that of Einstein himself, have thwarted the Organization, outsmarted SERN--

name: Rintaro
line: And conquered the whole of space and time! Now, at the moment of my triumph, I stand before you as a god!

name: Rintaro
line: This brave new world is the fruit of my ambition! The hated System shall collapse, and chaos shall rule the Earth!

name: Rintaro
line: This truly is the choice of Steins--

name: Mayuri
line: Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: It’s okay now.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha... what are you saying? I must proclaim our glorious victory, that all may--

name: Mayuri
line: But Okarin... you look like you’re about to cry.

name: Mayuri
line: You don’t have to try so hard, okay? I know you’re doing it for me, but I don’t want to be a burden.

name: Mayuri
line: So you don’t have to pretend anymore, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: If you’re hurting, just say so. Like normal Okarin would.

name: Rintaro
line: But... I...

name: Mayuri
line: You don’t have to worry about Mayushii anymore.

name: Mayuri
line: Mayushii is fine.

name: Mayuri
line: So you can cry if you want to, okay?

name: Mayuri
line: I don’t know what happened...

name: Mayuri
line: But it’s okay to cry now.

name: Itaru
line: Whoa, man. Are you really crying?

name: Rintaro
line: Phew. That’s that.

name: Itaru
line: Man, what a waste. That thing was worth a fortune.

name: Mayuri
line: And now we don’t have a microwave...

name: Mayuri
line: How will Mayushii eat her Juicy Chicken Number One?

name: Rintaro
line: Come on. I’ll get you a new microwave.

name: Kurisu
line: I don’t want to deny who I’ve been. Because even my failures are a part of who I am today.

name: Kurisu
line: Going to the past is possible right now. Look into the sky at night, and you can see how things were tens of thousands of years ago.

name: Rintaro
line: No way...

name: Mayuri
line: Wow! What’s that?

name: Itaru
line: It’s a robot, right? The transforming kind?
...Okabe Rintaro?

name: Rintaro
line: Suzuha!

name: Rintaro
line: Why are you here!?

name: Suzuha
line: Are you Okabe Rintaro? I need to know.

name: Rintaro
line: Y-yeah...

name: Rintaro
line: Hold on. Just hold on one second.

name: Suzuha
line: I’m a time traveler from the year 2036. I have a request for Uncle Okarin.

name: Mayuri
line: You’re an uncle?

name: Suzuha
line: This worldline is headed for World War Three!

name: Suzuha
line: I need your help to prevent it! Please, help me change the future!

name: Rintaro
line: Wha... what the...

name: Rintaro
line: What the hell are you talking about!?

name: Mayuri
line: World War Three? Oh no! That’s really bad!

name: Itaru
line: Uh, are you really a time traveler? You’re not just messing with us here?

name: Suzuha
line: Stay out of this, Dad.

name: Itaru
line: D-Dad!?

name: Itaru
line: W-whoa... that was a shock. I mean, it’s not every day a mysterious beauty calls me dad. Though to be honest, I’d prefer to be called big brother.

name: Rintaro
line: Wait! Everyone just wait! Let me think!

name: Rintaro
line: Is that thing a time machine?

name: Rintaro
line: Your father built it?

name: Suzuha
line: That’s right.

name: Rintaro
line: Where did you come from?

name: Suzuha
line: The year 2036.

name: Suzuha
line: I stopped in 1975 and 2000 first.

name: Rintaro
line: You... what?

name: Rintaro
line: That time machine can travel to the future!?

name: Suzuha
line: It wouldn’t be much of a time machine otherwise.

name: Rintaro
line: You’re... from a different future?

name: Suzuha
line: A different future?

name: Rintaro
line: What’s going on in 2036? What about SERN’s dystopia?

name: Suzuha
line: SERN? What’s that?

name: Rintaro
line: You said something about World War Three?

name: Suzuha
line: Right. In my time, humanity has been reduced to less than a billion people.

name: Itaru
line: Less than a billion? But the population now is like 6.7 billion. Are you saying 5.7 billion people died!?

name: Suzuha
line: That’s what happens when you use nuclear weapons.

name: Suzuha
line: It was just like the Cold War. Only this time, they were fighting over time travel technology.

name: Suzuha
line: It started with a race between the EU and Russia. Then the Americans got involved, and things really went to hell.

name: Suzuha
line: They were all desperate to stop anyone else from being first to build a time machine. Whoever controls time controls the world, right?

name: Suzuha
line: By 2036, the war’s over, but it left the Earth in ruins. We won’t survive for long, not as things are.

name: Rintaro
line: This can’t be happening...

name: Mayuri
line: Are you okay?

name: Rintaro
line: Why is this happening!?

name: Rintaro
line: You lied to me! You said a peaceful future was waiting for us on the Beta worldline!

name: Suzuha
line: We’re at a point of great divergence, when--

name: Rintaro
line: I know that already!

name: Suzuha
line: Then you understand! 5.7 billion people are going to die, and the survivors will be left with no future! No hope!

name: Suzuha
line: I came here to prevent that. And to do that, I need your help, Uncle Okari--

name: Rintaro
line: I refuse!

name: Rintaro
line: I came here from the Alpha worldline. I had to sacrifice the girl I loved to make it this far!

name: Rintaro
line: I don’t care if 5.7 billion people die! I won’t let her... I won’t let Kurisu’s sacrifice be in vain!

name: Suzuha
line: Wait. You mean you’ve been to another attractor field?

name: Suzuha
line: Wow. So that’s the power of Reading Steiner.

name: Rintaro
line: ...How do you know about that?

name: Suzuha
line: Dad told me. And I’ve met you before, Uncle Okarin. In the future, that is.

name: Rintaro
line: You’ve... met me?

name: Suzuha
line: I see... so the me of that attractor field went to the past too...

name: Suzuha
line: Uncle Okarin. I know you don’t want to, but--

name: Rintaro
line: No. I won’t let Kurisu’s death be in vain. I won’t let Mayuri die.

name: Mayuri
line: Huh? Mayushii dies?

name: Suzuha
line: By Kurisu, I assume you mean Makise Kurisu?

name: Suzuha
line: Listen, Uncle.

name: Suzuha
line: Let’s say -- hypothetically -- that the only way to change the future of this worldline is to go to July 28th, 2010, the day Makise Kurisu dies...

name: Suzuha
line: ...and save her. What would you do?

name: Rintaro
line: What!?

name: Rintaro
line: Your time machine... We can use your time machine!

name: Suzuha
line: The worldline I’m aiming for isn’t... what did you call it? The Alpha worldline? It’s not that.

name: Suzuha
line: What we’re aiming for...

name: Suzuha
line: Is the space between attractor fields.

name: Suzuha
line: There lies a worldline unaffected by any attractor field.

name: Suzuha
line: A worldline known as Steins Gate.

name: Rintaro
line: Wha...

name: Suzuha
line: I was told that Steins Gate is a brand new worldline, one no one has ever observed.

name: Itaru
line: But didn’t someone have to observe it to know it’s there?

name: Suzuha
line: Nope. It’s never been observed. That’s what makes it new.

name: Suzuha
line: But Dad and Uncle Okarin were able to calculate its divergence.

name: Suzuha
line: -0.086109% relative to the current worldline.

name: Suzuha
line: That’s where we’ll find Steins Gate.

name: Rintaro
line: And to reach that worldline, we have to save Kurisu?

name: Suzuha
line: Exactly.

name: Suzuha
line: She’s the key to averting World War Three. As long as she lives, the war won’t happen. Or at the very least, 5.7 billion people won’t die.

name: Rintaro
line: Why?

name: Suzuha
line: Huh?

name: Rintaro
line: Why Kurisu? I mean, I know she’s a genius, but are you telling me she’s the hero who’ll save 5.7 billion people?

name: Suzuha
line: ...I don’t know.

name: Rintaro
line: You don’t know? And you expect me to go along with this!?

name: Suzuha
line: Hey, I’m just following Dad’s plan.

name: Suzuha
line: And apparently, you’re the one who came up with it in the first place.

name: Suzuha
line: If there’s a flaw in your plan, then we’re all in trouble.

name: Rintaro
line: It sounds like you didn’t hear it from me. Is that right?

name: Suzuha
line: You passed away ten years ago -- 15 years from now, that is. The year 2025.

name: Suzuha
line: So I don’t know the whole story. What I do know is that my dad continued your work. After you died, he built this time machine all by himself just to see your plan through.

name: Suzuha
line: Uncle Okarin.

name: Suzuha
line: Like I said, Steins Gate is unobserved. Nobody knows what future awaits us there.

name: Suzuha
line: There’s a chance that a dystopia rises from the ashes of World War Three.

name: Suzuha
line: There’s a chance that Makise Kurisu dies just two days after you save her.

name: Suzuha
line: There’s a chance that you don’t die in 2025, but next week.

name: Suzuha
line: But there’s also a chance that when 2036 comes, there will be no dystopia, no world ravaged by war.

name: Suzuha
line: There’s a chance that everyone, including Makise Kurisu, will still be alive.

name: Suzuha
line: There’s a chance that a wonderful future awaits.

name: Suzuha
line: At least it won’t be the future I came from. And it won’t be the future the other me came from. That much is certain.

name: Suzuha
line: It’s completely unknown, completely unpredictable.

name: Suzuha
line: But if you’re willing to try. If you’re willing to come with me to July 28th...

name: Suzuha
line: Then take my hand.

name: Mayuri
line: Um, Mayushii doesn’t understand any of this...

name: Mayuri
line: But this Makise person was very important to you, wasn’t she?

name: Mayuri
line: I think you should go for it!

name: Itaru
line: 5.7 billion people, man. I can’t even imagine.

name: Itaru
line: But don’t sweat the small stuff. Just save the girl, and you’re set for life! It’s the dream of every otaku!

name: Rintaro
line: I’m in.

name: Rintaro
line: Fate wants me to take your hand. Who am I to argue?

name: Rintaro
line: Let’s go.

name: Suzuha
line: Thank you, Uncle Okarin.

name: Suzuha
line: Hop aboard!

name: Rintaro
line: Can this thing even fit two people?

name: Suzuha
line: Of course it can. It’s my Dad’s masterpiece!

name: Rintaro
line: Daru, your daughter really loves you.

name: Itaru
line: I don’t get it, but stop calling me Dad. I’d rather be your big brother, if you know what I mean.

name: Mayuri
line: Be sure to come back, okay? I don’t want you to disappear, okay?

name: Rintaro
line: I’m not going to another world. It’s just a short hop to the past.

name: Suzuha
line: Give me your phone.

name: Rintaro
line: Hey!

name: Suzuha
line: It’s better not to bring it. It’ll cause interference.

name: Suzuha
line: Shut the hatch.

name: Suzuha
line: That should do it.

name: Rintaro
line: That’s cutting it awfully close.

name: Suzuha
line: This time machine can’t physically move.

name: Rintaro
line: Meaning?

name: Suzuha
line: No matter what time we travel to, we’ll always arrive at the exact same coordinates. In other words, on the roof of Radi-Kan.

name: Suzuha
line: I mean, it’s a little more complicated than that, but there’s no time to explain.

name: Suzuha
line: Anyway, we could leap to the day before the presentation. But if we attract too much attention, they could close Radi-Kan and cancel the presentation. That’s why we’ve gotta cut it close.

name: Rintaro
line: I see...

name: Suzuha
line: Uncle, this is your first time time traveling, right?

name: Rintaro
line: Okay, first, stop calling me Uncle.

name: Rintaro
line: And yes. I’ve made more time leaps than I want to remember, but I’ve never time traveled before.

name: Rintaro
line: According to John Titor, the G-forces are pretty strong. You feel like you’re being stretched out.

name: Suzuha
line: Yeah, I wrote that.

name: Rintaro
line: The John Titor stuff?

name: Suzuha
line: Right. Back when I leapt to 2000.

name: Rintaro
line: I see...

name: Suzuha
line: You don’t sound surprised.

name: Suzuha
line: I’ll go over the mission one more time. Once we arrive, there’ll be no time for chitchat.

name: Suzuha
line: The objective is to prevent Makise Kurisu’s death.

name: Rintaro
line: What about attractor field convergence?

name: Suzuha
line: That day’s a turning point, remember?

name: Suzuha
line: Meaning the probability of Makise Kurisu’s death is roughly 50%.

name: Rintaro
line: So convergence won’t happen?

line: There’s not much fuel left. We barely had enough to begin with. There’s not even enough for a return trip to 2036.

name: Suzuha

name: Suzuha

name: Female Reporter
line: Russian authorities announced today that a fire broke out on Russian Airlines Flight 801, en route from Narita to Moscow.

name: Female Reporter
line: The flight departed Narita Airport at 11:05 Japan time, but a fire broke out in the cargo hold shortly before arrival.

name: Female Reporter
line: The flight made an emergency landing at Domodedovo International Airport, where the passengers were evacuated. No one was injured.

name: Female Reporter
line: One of the passengers on Flight 801 was a Japanese physicist who had declared his intention to seek asylum in Russia.

name: Rintaro
line: Doctor Nakabachi!

name: Female Reporter
line: Doctor Nakabachi, real name Makise Shouichi, made these comments to the press earlier today.

name: Nakabachi
line: I am delighted to have arrived safely in this wonderful country. My deepest gratitude to the Russian government for accepting me.

name: Nakabachi
line: When the cabin filled with smoke, I remained perfectly calm. Some passengers panicked, but they settled down after I gave them a talking to.

name: Nakabachi
line: My compliments to the pilot for his safe landing. He’s a hero, for he saved not only my life, but my historic thesis as well.

name: Nakabachi
line: Indeed. If this thesis had been lost, it would have set scientific progress back a century.

name: Nakabachi
line: This thesis will change the course of human history!

name: Nakabachi
line: This thesis describes the first practical theory of time travel! Do you understand!? Time travel! I, Doctor Nakabachi, have succeeded where countless others have failed!

name: Nakabachi
line: This envelope contains the future of mankind! Soon, all of our dreams shall be realized! When I present this thesis to the scientific community, the world will change forever, and I will be known as the father of the time machine!

name: Kurisu
line: You’re stealing my work? I didn’t think even you would do something like--

name: Nakabachi
line: Originally, this envelope was in my checked baggage. If it had stayed there, then it would have burned up in the cargo hold, and humanity’s dreams along with it.

name: Nakabachi
line: However! Fate intervened on my behalf, as if God himself had decreed that my greatness should be known across the world!

name: Nakabachi
line: Behold the vessel of God’s grace! Because this was inside the envelope, it set off the metal detector.

name: Nakabachi
line: As a result, I had to take the envelope with me on the plane!

name: Nakabachi
line: The pilot is a hero, yes. But the true hero, the savior of humanity’s future, is this tiny figurine!

name: Mayuri
line: AHHH!

line: You should be able to see it.

name: Itaru

name: Okabe
line: Did you get my email? Then go watch the news. If you already have, then keep listening.

name: Okabe
line: Greetings. It’s been fifteen years, I suppose you could say.

name: Mayuri
line: Wow, your voice is so deep and cool!

name: Okabe
line: The year is 2025. I’m sending this video by a process similar to D-Mail.

name: Okabe
line: You dismantled the PhoneWave. So did I. But not one year later, I -- which is to say you -- turned back to time travel as my last hope.

name: Okabe
line: I’ve spent fourteen years researching time travel.

name: Okabe
line: Along the way, I managed to design a D-Mail transmitter that wasn’t bound by the 36-byte limit.

name: Okabe
line: The fact that you’re watching this means that you failed to save Kurisu.

name: Okabe
line: It hurts, doesn’t it? I know how you feel. After all, I went through it myself fifteen years ago.

name: Okabe
line: That’s right. I failed too.

name: Okabe
line: I’ve lived with that failure for fifteen years.

name: Okabe
line: Do you understand why you had to fail?

name: Okabe
line: It was necessary. Necessary to give me the proper motivation.

name: Okabe
line: You failed to save Kurisu. You killed her with your own two hands.

name: Okabe
line: Your guilt, your self-loathing, have driven me for fifteen years. They gave me the focus I needed to complete my plan.

name: Okabe
line: Without your failure, you would not be watching this message now.

name: Okabe
line: As you know, this worldline is subject to attractor field convergence.

name: Okabe
line: Time travel alone cannot save Kurisu.

name: Okabe
line: That is why you had to fail. To create the chain of causality that linked you to me.

name: Okabe
line: Because you failed, I spent the last fifteen years researching time travel.

name: Okabe
line: As the revelations Nakabachi unleashed sped the world towards nuclear war, I continued my research in secret.

name: Okabe
line: Suzuha’s time machine is the result. Although the finishing touches were Daru’s and mine, its design was based on the theory that SERN first developed...

name: Okabe
line: ...and that Kurisu improved on the worldline you undid.

name: Okabe
line: Its model number is C204. C for Christina. I believe you understand what that signifies.

name: Okabe
line: Now that the causal link has been established, allow me to explain the final stage of the plan.

name: Okabe
line: The purpose of this plan is to change divergence and reach the unknown worldline called Steins Gate.

name: Okabe
line: By the way, I’m the one who named it Steins Gate. You, of all people, know why I chose that name.

name: Okabe
line: Because it sounds cool. Isn’t that right?

name: Okabe
line: There are two conditions you must meet to reach Steins Gate.

name: Okabe
line: First, you must save Makise Kurisu.

name: Okabe
line: Second, you must destroy the Nakabachi Paper.

name: Okabe
line: I know what you’re thinking. Convergence won’t let you change the past. No matter what you do, Kurisu will die.

name: Okabe
line: But rest assured, there is a way.

name: Okabe
line: You can save Kurisu.

name: Okabe
line: Listen carefully.

name: Okabe
line: On July 28th, the first you went to Nakabachi’s presentation blissfully unaware of what was about to happen.

name: Okabe
line: You must not change what the first you saw.

name: Okabe
line: Those events have been established. They are the result upon which this worldline converges.

name: Okabe
line: However.

name: Okabe
line: There is room for deception.

name: Okabe
line: You don’t understand, I know. Calm down. I’ll explain.

name: Okabe
line: You’re going to deceive yourself.

name: Okabe
line: The first you saw Kurisu lying in a pool of blood.

name: Okabe
line: If you were to change that fact, it would render everything that you have done since -- as well as everything that I have done -- a paradox.

name: Okabe
line: After finding Kurisu’s body, you sent a D-Mail, which was intercepted by Echelon, which tipped off SERN.

name: Okabe
line: Recall your experiences on the Alpha worldline.

name: Okabe
line: You saw more than just Mayuri’s death.

name: Okabe
line: You saw Kurisu alive and well. You made her a lab member despite her protests, and together, you built the Time Leap Machine.

name: Okabe
line: It was only three weeks, but she was there, beside you.

name: Okabe
line: Those memories are yours. Those memories are mine. They are the proof that we did not live only on this worldline, where Kurisu died on July 28th.

name: Okabe
line: You traveled to the Alpha worldline.

name: Okabe
line: You met Kurisu and fell in love.

name: Okabe
line: You sacrificed the dreams of those closest to you.

name: Okabe
line: But still, you fought to give Mayuri a future.

name: Okabe
line: For three weeks, you fought. And now, those memories are part of you.

name: Okabe
line: If you had not seen Kurisu’s body in the hallway of Radi-Kan...

name: Okabe
line: You would not have sent that first D-Mail. SERN would not have found you.

name: Okabe
line: When you encountered Kurisu later, you would not have been shocked to see her alive.

name: Okabe
line: You would not have spoken the words that led her to your doorstep.

name: Okabe
line: Without those memories...

name: Okabe
line: You would not now be willing to travel through time to save her.

name: Okabe
line: I would not have spent my life searching for a path to Steins Gate.

name: Okabe
line: I would not have recorded this message.

name: Okabe
line: Daru and I would not have completed the time machine.

name: Okabe
line: Suzuha would not be standing beside you now.

name: Okabe
line: You must not reject the three weeks you spent drifting between worldlines.

name: Okabe
line: You must not undo the past!

name: Okabe
line: Those three weeks made you who you are, a man who would do anything to save the woman he loves.

name: Okabe
line: Your desperation made me who I am, a man who has given everything to make that dream come true.

name: Okabe
line: This moment would not be possible if not for the memories that you and I share!

name: Okabe
line: The man you were trying to create, a man with none of those memories to drive him, could never stand where you stand now.

name: Okabe
line: It all meant something.

name: Okabe
line: My preparations are complete. The rest is up to you.

name: Okabe
line: The final phase of Operation Skuld will now commence.

name: Okabe
line: Your mission: change the outcome without changing established events.

name: Okabe
line: You saw Makise Kurisu lying in a pool of blood. That has been established.

name: Okabe
line: But at the same time, only that has been established.

name: Okabe
line: Deceive yourself.

name: Okabe
line: Deceive the world.

name: Okabe
line: That is the choice which will lead you to Steins Gate.

name: Okabe
line: Good luck, mad scientist.

name: Kurisu
line: And thank goodness you’re alright.

name: Rintaro
line: It’s me. Why is she here? Reading Steiner didn’t activate.

name: Rintaro
line: What? Protect her!? Heh... that’s a tall order, my friend.

name: Rintaro
line: But if that is the choice of Steins Gate... then so be it. El Psy Kongroo.

name: Rintaro
line: We meet again, Christina.

name: Kurisu
line: How many times do I have to tell you!? I’m not Christina, or your assistant or--

name: Kurisu
line: Eh?

name: Kurisu
line: Huh? I... why did I say that?

name: Kurisu
line: Words just... popped into my head...

name: Rintaro
line: Welcome back, my assistant, Makise Kurisu -- no, Christina.

name: Rintaro
line: This is the choice of Steins Gate.
